headline: Chirwere cheTyphoid Chovhiringa Vakawanda muMbare
text: Chirwere che typhoid chanyuka muHarare zvakare zvave kupa kuti veruzhinji vatyire hupenyu hwavo sezvo kanzuru iri kutadza kutakura marara pamwe nekugadzirisa pombi dzinotakura tsvina munzvimbo dzakawanda muguta iri. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti zvipatara zvekanzuru yavo zvarapa vanhu vakawanda mumusha unogara veruzhinji weMbare mushure mekuwanikwa vaine chirwere che typhoid. Kunyange hazvo pasina vati vafa nechirwere ichi, vagari vemuMbare vakaita saMuzvare Vongai Mbedzi vanoti chirwere che typhoid hachingarege kubata vanhu sezvo pombi dzinotakura tsvina yemuzvimbuzi dzichigara dzakatushuka. Mumwe mugari wemuMbare makare, VaTitus Nhongonhema, vanoti kusatakurwa kwemarara nekusagadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina kuri kukonzerawo kuti zvirwere zvakaita se typhoid zvipfunye chisero muMbare vachiti vave kutyira kuti chirwere ichi chichapararira neguta rose kana dambudziko iri rikasagadziriswa. Zvichakadai, VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo yakaisa dumba riri kushandiswa sechipatara kuMatapi muMbare richange risingavharwe kunyange nehusiku kuti vanhu vakwanise kurapwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMeya weHarare kuti tinzwe kuti sei kanzuru yavo iri kutadza kutakura marara pamwe nekugadzirisa pombi dzinotakura tsvina yemuzvimbuzi. Asi mumwe kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare, VaCharles Nyatsuro, vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasarasire marara pese pese vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti chirwere che typhoid nezvimwe zvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekusashambidzika kwenzvimbo zvisapararire. VaNyatsuro vati kanzuru yavo iri kutadzawo kutakura marara sezvo isina motokari dzakakwana kunyange hazvo vakatenga dzimwe motokari svondo rapera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo richashanda zvakasimba nekanzuru yeHarare kuedza kupedza chirwere chetyphoid kuMbare. Gore rapera pane vanhu vaviri vanonzi vakaurayiwa nechirwere che typhoid muHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Dzamara neVamwe Vake Vanorohwa Zvakaipisisa
text: Mutori wenhau Itai Dzamara nevamwe vake vana vaari kushanda navo mukukurudzira kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye chigaro, varohwa zvakaipisisa nevarume vanofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzevechidiki veZanu PF. Vaona zvichiitika uye vari munyori mukuru wegungano raDzamara reOccupy Africa Unity Square, VaCharles Nyoni, vanoti Dzamara nevamwe vake vanoti Tafadzwa Charumbira, Jerry Mugweni, Allan pamwe naBothwell, vapambwa pavanga vachimhanya vari mumugwagwa weKwame Nkrumah. VaNyoni vanoti varume ava vakandzwa mumotokari nhatu dzinosanganisira imwe yerudzi rweToyota Corolla ine ruvara rwuchena, idzo dzinonzi dzabva dzasimuka nekukasika. VaNyoni vanoti Dzamara nevamwe vake vaendeswa kukahofisi kebato reZanu PF kari kuna 4th Street uko varohwa zvakaipisisa. Mushure mekurohwa varume ava vazonosiiwa vakandwa kumapurisa eLaw and Order paHarare Central Police Station. Vashanu ava vanonzi vazoendeswa kuchipatara cheAvenues Clinic neshamwari dzavo uko vanonzi vanga vachirapwa vachionekwa navanachiremba. Dzamara, uyo akatanga kuratidzira kwake munaGumiguru, pamwe negweta rake, VaKennedy Masiye, vakamborohwa zvakaipisisa nemapurisa mwedzi wapera mushure mekuungana munzvimbo yavo yavari kuratidzira vari yeAfrica Unity Square. No media source currently available

headline: Quantam Global Reseach Inoti Mitemo yeZiimbabwe Yokanganisa Hurongwa hweKukwezva veMabhizimisi veKunze
text: Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reQuantam Global Research Lab iro rinoongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika dzemuAfrica panyaya yekukwezva vekunze vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika iri kuratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri kutatarika kuti ikwanise kukwezva vekunze ava. Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube chizvarwa cheZimbabwe ndivo chipangamazano sangano reQuantum Global Research Lab iri. Izvi zvakabuda muongororo inonzi Africa Investment Index 2018. Nyika dzinonzi dziri kuita zvinounza budiro dzinosanganisa Morocco, Egypt, Algeria, Botswana neCote d’ivore, South Africa, Ethiopia, Zambia, Kenya neSenegal. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechimakumi mana nemashanu panyika makumi mashanu neina dzemuAfrica dziri kutatarika kukwezva vekunze. Dzimwe nyika dzisiri kuita zviri nani dzakafanana neZimbabwe dzinosanganisa Central African Republic, Liberia, Somalia, Eritrea, Equatorial Guinea, Gambia, Sierra Leone, Guinea uye Sao Tome and Principe. Ongororo iyi yakaburitswa kumucheto wemusangano wevakuru wemabhizimisi wakaendwa masvondo apfuura nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Global Quantum yakambobatsirawo VaMnangagwa kusangana nevamwe vakuru vemabhizimisi kubva kuSwitzerland kumucheto wemusangano wekuDavos muna Ndira. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mitemo yayo kuti ikwezve vekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Meya weBulawayo Okurudzira Vanotengesa Kuita Hutsanana
text: Vanoita mabasa ekutengesa muguta reBulawayo vaita musangano wekuonesana nekunzwana pfungwa nameya weguta iri, uye vari kanzura weWard 3, VaMartin Moyo. Nyaya dzakurukurwa mumusangano uyu dzinosanganisira dzekutorerwa kunoitwa vanotengesa zvinhu ava nemapurisa, mitero, nzvimbo dzekutengesera, mitemo mitsva inonzi iri kuda kudzikwa pamwe nehwaro hungatungamira vanotengesa ava huri kuronga kuumbwa. Asi vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu vanonzi vakurudzirawo kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo kuti ikoshese raramo yevanhu, kwete kukoshesa kuchengetedzwa kwezvivakwa pamwe nemigwagwa vachikanganwa vanhu. Asi VaMoyo vanoti kanzuru yavo yanzwisisa zvose zvataurwa mumusangano uyu, asiwo vati zvakakosha zvikuru kuti vanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu ava vakoshesewo nzvimbo dzavanoshandira kuburikidza nekudzichenesa. Meya Moyo vanoti guta ravo harisati zvaro rasangana nedambudziko revanotengesera mukati meguta zvisina mvumo, sezvo vanotengesa zvinhu ava vachitengesera munzvimbo dzavakapiwa dziri kumucheto kweguta. Musangano uyu wapindwawo nevamiriri vemasangano anosanganisira reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, pamwe neBulawayo Agenda. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Yonetsana neHurumende neMari Inosvika Mabhiriyoni Gumi neZviuru Mazana Matanhatu eMadhora
text: Paita ropa rakaipa pakati pehurumende nevebato rinopikisa reMDC panyaya yemari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora yakashandiswa nemamwe mapazi ehurumende isiri mubhajeti uye pasina mvumo yedare reparamende sezvinotarisirwa kuitwa pamitemo yenyika. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakaunza kudare svondo rapera bhiri rinonzi Financial Adjustment Bill kuti dare iri ritambire kuti mari iyi itorwe sechikwereti chehurumende chinozobhadharwa nevanhu vose munyika kuburikidza nemitero. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvemari muhurumendfe yemubatananidzwa, VaTendai Biti, avo vanova nhengo yeMDCuye vari sachigaro wekomiti yedare reparamende inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzehurumende, vanoti pane chikiribidi chiri kuitika sezvo pasina ari kuziva kuti mari yose iyi yakashandiswei. Asi VaNcube,avo vatisina kukwanisa kubata panharembozha yavo, vanoti mutemo unovapa mvumo yekuenda kudare kana pakashandiswa mari isiri mubhajeti. Imwe nhengo yeparamende yakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti zviri kutaurwa naVaBiti hazvina kuipa asi zvinoda kuzeyiwa mudare reparamende kwete kuti vangorova bembera vachimborega kuuya kudare nebato ravo reMDC. Nhengo yeZanu-PF vari muzvinabhizimisi, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaNcube zvekuuya kuzosuma dare hazvina kuipa sezvo vati pamutemo gurukota rinogona kuita izvi. Asi mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development kana kuti ZIMCODD, Muzvare Janet Zhou, vanoti zviri kuitwa izvi zvinodzosera nyika kumashure uye nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika havazive kuti chii chaizvo chakashandiswa mari iyi muzvipatara musina mishonga. Vati sesangano vakagadzirira kuita hurukuro nenhengo dzedare reparamende nezvenyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi,uye vachishanda nesangano ravana chipangamazano re Labor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanotiwo nyaya yekuti hurumende inoshandisa mari dzisiri mubhajeti inokanganisa zvirongwa zvose zvekumutsiridza hupfumi. Nyaya yekuti hurumende inodya kudarika zvayakohwa yagara ichipa kuti zvinetse kudyidzana nemabhanga akaita saana International Monetary Fund neWorld Bank anoti izvi hazvifanire kuitwa. Asi vehurumende vanoti vanoguma voita izvi nenyaya yekuomerwa nehupenyu zvichikonzerwa nezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi vakatemera zvirango vanoti zvakatemera vatungamiri vashoma vanotonga nedemo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanopikisa Hurumende Voronga Kuratidzira muKupera kweMwedzi Uno.
text: Mapato anopikisa, masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, masangano evashandi pamwe nevamwe vemakereke vanonzi vari kuronga kuratidzira kwevana veZimbabwe nyika yose musi wa 31 Chikunguru, unove mwedzi uno, vachinyunyutya nekwavanoti kutadza kutonga kwehurumende yeZanu PF. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, uye vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF yakundikana kumisa huwori pamwe nekumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika, izvo zvaisa vana veZimbabwe mukutambura kukuru. VaNgarivhume vanoti vari kushanda nemapato ose anopikisa nemamwe masangano anomirira vana veZimbabwe mumapoka akasiyanasiyana mukuronga kuratidzira uku, vachiti kunyange nhengo dzeZanu PF dziri kukokwawo kuti dzibatane nevamwe vanoda hutongo hwakanaka munyika. Asi mutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzai Mahere vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harina kunge rakokwa zviri pamutemo, kunyange hazvo, sezvakataurwa nemutungamiri wavo VaNelson Chamisa neSvondo, vachabatana nevose vanoda kuti munyika muve neshanduko. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaKhalipani Phugeni vatiwo bato ravo harisi muhurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu. VaNgarivhume vanoti vane hurongwa hwekuzivisa mapurisa nezvekuratidzira kwavo neChipiri, uye vanotarisira kuti vacharatidzira murunyararo. No media source currently available Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richibvumidza vanhu kuratidzira, zviri kurongwa nevanopikisa izvi kutungana kwembudzi. VaMugwadi vanoti vari kurongwa kuratidzira vari kuziva kuti kune mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu nekuda kwechirwere che Covid-19 ndipo powoona vamwe vachida kupinda mumigwagwa kuti zvinhu zviparadzwe nekubiwa. Vanoti vanochengetedza mutemo havasi kuzorega zvakadaro zvichiitika. VaMugwadi vanoti kunyange hazvo nyika iine matambudziko ekushaikwa kwezvakawanda, hapana asingazive kuti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumawirira. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakachengetedzwa kuBulawayo Vachiongororwa Covid-19 Vanoti Hurumende Iri Kuvabata neKuseri kweRuoko
text: Vamwe vevanhu vakachengetedzwa nehurumende kuBulawayo vachiongororwa kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete, vanoti havasi kufara kuti vari kuramba vakaiswa mu quarantine iwo mazuva avo anobvumirwa nemutemo kunge vakachengetedzwa, akapera. Vanhu vataura neStudio7 vanoti vava nemazuva makumi maviri nematatu vari mu quarantine, asi hurumende haisi kuvaudza kuti vachanzi vaende kudzimba dzavo riini. Vanhu ava vanotiwo vari kushungurudzwa nemapurisa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. MuBulawayo munonzi mune vanhu vari kugara paBulawayo Polytechnic, nepaUnited College of Education vakabva kuBotswana mushure mekunge nyika iyi yadzosera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kumusha kwazvo pakatanga kunetsa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vevanhu ava vanoti vakamanikidzwa kubuda muBotswana, vamwe vakasiya midziyo yavo. Pavakabviswa kuBotswana, vanhu ava vakatanga vambogariswa paPlumtree High School, uye vanonzi vaisvika zana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu. Asi vakazoendeswa kuBulawayo senzira yekudzikisa kumanikidzana kwavanga vakaita kuPlumtree. Mumwe wevanhu vakabva ku Botswana vachiita zvekumanikidzwa musi wa 7 Kubvumbi, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake, anoti hurumende iri kuvabata nekuseri kweruoko. No media source currently available Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Nick Mangwana, vati hurumende yakamirira kuona zvakabuda muongororo yekuti vanhu ava vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. VaMangwana vatiwo vanhu ava vanotarisirwa kuenda kumisha yavo munguva pfupi inotevera kana zvakabuda muongororo zvichiratifdza kuti havana hutachiwona hweCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yava nevanhu makumi mana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu vana, vakatoshaya nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Voita Misangano Mikuru kuBritain
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata cheMDC-T uye vari mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, nevamwe vatungamiri vari mumubatanidzwa wavo vari kuBritain uko vari kuenderera mberi nekuita misangano nevakuru muhurumende iyi, vanopikisa uye vemabhizimisi. Nezuro manheru VaChamisa, nevamwe vavo vari muMDC Alliance vanosanganisa VaTendai Biti, naVaDavid Coltart vakaita misangano nevamwe vakuru vehurumende yeBritain avo vasina kuda kudoma nemazita. VaBiti vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutambirwa zvakanaka nevakuru vakuru muhurumende yeBritain. VaChamisa vakatambirwa zvine mutsindo nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muBritain kumusangano mukuru wavakaita kuBedford Jubilation Centre nemusi weSvondo. VaChamisa vakabata nyaya dzakawanda pamusangano uyu kusanganisa nyaya dzehupfumi uye dzesarudzo. Mumwe mutsigiri webato iri, VaRufaro Masango, vanoti vakafadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aVaChamisa. Vanhu vakawanda vakauya kumusangano uyu vairatidza kufarira zvakataurwa naVaChamisa uyezve vari kuti ngakugadziriswe nyaya yediaspora voting kuti vavhote vari kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro nyanzvi munezvamatongerwo enyika uye vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Huddersfield kuBritain, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti zvirongwa zvaVaChamisa zviri kutambirwa nevakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anoyambira Vari Kubvarura Maposita Kuti Vachasungwa
text: Mapurisa ari munyaya dzesarudzo anoti haasi kufara nekubvarurwa kana kubviswa kwemapepa ekutsvaga rutsigiro emapato ezvematongerwo enyika achapinda musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda wemapurisa muHarare, mukuru wekomiti yemapurisa irikuona nezvesarudzo, Senior Assistant Commissioner Erasmus Makodza, vati mapurisa haasi kufara nevemapato mapato ezvematongerwo enyika vari kubvisirana mapepa ekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo kana kuti campaign posters. VaMakodza vati vose vachabatwa vachibvisa mapepa aya vachasungwa vagorangwa zvakaomarara maererano nemutemo unobata nyaya dzesarudzo weElectoral Act. Mashoko aya anouyawo apo mapato akaita seZanu PF neMDC Alliance ari kugunun’una kuti ari kubvisirwa mapepa ekutsvaga rutsigiro mapato aya achinakurirana nyoka mhenyu. VaMakodza vati ivo semapurisa pamwe nemasoja vachachengetedza runyararo pachaitwa sarudzo vakati nyaya dzekutakurwa kwemagwaro anenge avhoterwa pamwe nezvimwe zvese zvine chekuita nesarudzo zvinhu zvicharamba zviri mumawoko ekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Zvichakadai, mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vanoti semapurisa vari kufadzwa nerunyararo rwuri munyika panguva ino yesarudzo kana zvichienzaniswa nezvaiitika musarudzo dzakapfuura. Amai Charamba vakurudzirawo vatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vose kuti vaparidze nyaya yerunyararo pose pavanoita misangano nevatsigiri vavo. Amai Charamba vati mhirizhonga zhinji iri kuitwa nenhengo dzemapato dzinenge dzichirwisana pachezvadzo kwete kuti nhengo dzerimwe bato dzinge dzichirwisana nedzerimwewo bato. Panyaya yekukandwa kwechombo kuWhite City Stadium masvondo maviri adarika uko kwakazokonzera kufa kwevanhu vaviri pamwe nekukuvara kwevanhu vanodarika makumi mana, Amai Charamba vati mapurisa ari kuBulawayo ari kushanda zvakasimba kuti apedze kuferefeta kwaari kuita nyaya iyi. Amai Charamba vati vachazozivisa zvavanenge vawana mutsvagiridzo yevari kuita semapurisa panguva yakafanira. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yotaura Pamusoro peMari Dziri Kubatirwa Vanhu neMabhanga
text: Nhengo dzedare reparamende kubva kumapato ese dzinoti hadzisi kufara nenyaya yekuti kubvira zvakatanga kushandiswa mari yema Bond Notes gore rapfuura, vezvitoro vave kuchaja mitengo yakasiyana uye vanotenga nemari iyi kana kushandisa makadhi ndivo vari kubhadhariswa mari yakawanda. Nhengo idzi dzinotiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vakati maBond Notes akafanana nemadhora ekuAmerica, izvi handizvo zviri kuitika. Mumiriri weBuhera South, VaJoseph Chinotimba veZanu PF, vabvunza gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kuti sei hurumende iri kurega vanhu vachibirwa nevanhu vezvitoro nemabhanga. VaFanni Munengami VeMDC-T vachimirira Glen View North vatsigirana naVaChinotimba vachiti hurumende yakangonyarara vanhu vachirasikirwa nemari. Asi VaChinamasa vati vese vasina kubatwa zvakanaka nevezvitoro kana mabhangi vanofanira kuenda nehumbowo hwavo kubhanga guru renyika. Asi nhengo dzeparamende dzatiwo mukuru webhanga iri, VaJohn Mangudya, havasi kubatika kuti vatsanangure kuti sei vemabhizimisi nemabhanga vasiri kutevedzera zvavakataura. Muzvare Irene Zindi veZanu PF vachimirira Mutasa South vaudza VaChinamasa kuti VaMangudya vanofanira kuonekwa kuti vatsanangure nyaya dzavo dzemashandiro emaBond Notes. VaChinamasa vati VaMangudya munhu anoonekwa uye vachaita kuti vese vanoda kuvaona vakwanise kuvaona. Vatiwo bhiri riri kuvandudza mutemo wemashandiro ebhanga renyika, iro rave kuzeiwa neparamende, richaranga vese vemabhizimisi nemabhanga ari kuomesera vanhu. Zvichakadai, mumiriri weHarare West, VaTerence Mukupe, vakumbira hurumende kuti irange vakomana vetimu yebhora yemaWarriors nekuvavharira muchitokokis chemasoja mushure mekunge vaburitswa mumakwikwi eAfrican Cup of Nations awo ari kuitwa kuGabon. Asi gurukota rezvemitambo, VaMakhosini Hlongwani, vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika uyewo vakumbira ruregerero kunyika yese nekutadza kwakaita maWarriors vakati vave kutogadzirira makwikwi eAfcon anotevera. Asi vamwewo vakaita saVaInnocent Gonese vati hurumende yakaratidza rusarura nekupa maWarriors mari yakawanda chose apo vakaenda kuAfcon asi ikanyima kana kupa timu yema Mighty Warriors, iyo yakapihwa mari shoma apo yakaenda kuAfcon yemadzimai pamwe nekuenda kuRio Olympics. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yave Bhasikiti raTizirai paNyaya yeBhonasi
text: Zvinhu muhurumende hazvisina kumira zvakanaka zvapa kuti vakawanda vaone kunge rave bhasikiti raTizirai rekuti uku riri kurukwa uku riri kurudunhurwa. Svondo rapera, gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vakazivisa kuti hurumende yainge yaronga kugumura vashandi vayo basa, kuvabvisira mabhonasi uye kuwedzera mari dzemitero dzavanotambira. Asi nemusi weChipiri, gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaChristopher Mushowe vainge voimba rumwe rwiyo vachiti VaChinamasa vainge vaita fungira mumoyo rwendo rwemba vachitaura zvakange zvisina kuwiriranwa mudare remakurukota. VaMushowe vakati zvose zvainge zvataurwa naVaChinamasa hazvimiririre hurumende. Asi aka hakasi kekutanga VaChinamasa vachisiiwa pamhene mushure mekuti vashandi vehurumende havaizopihwa mari yebhonasi. Gore rapera vakambodaro asi vakazorova nhendeshure mushure mekunge mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vati vaifanira kupa vashandi mari dzebhonasi. Mashoko aVaMushowe ari kuuya apo masangano evashandi vehurumende azivisa kuti aizogona kuramwa mabasa kana nhengo dzavo dzikanyimwa mari dzemabhonasi nekugurirwa mari dzemihoro. Nyaya yekuvharwa kwemakambani yapa kuti VaChinamasa vatatarike kubhadhara mari dzevashandi vehurumende sezvo kusina mari dzemitero dzakawanda dziri kubhadharwa. Chimwe chanetsawo inyaya yevechidiki veZanu-PF vari mumatunhu ose vanosvika zviuru gumi vanonzi vari kungopihwa mari vachiswera havo vachipura nyemba nemusana. Nyanzvi munya dzezvehupfumi dzinotiwo nyaya yekutonga nedemo nehuori ndizvo zvimwe zvapawo kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo.

headline: Varimi Vachena Vopihwa Imwe Mari yeKubatsirikana neHurumende
text: Hurumende yatanga kupa vamwe varimi vachena vakatorerwa mapurazi mari yekubatsirikana vakamirira kupihwa mari yemuripo wezvivakwa nezvekurimisa zvainge zviri pamapurazi avakatorerwa kutanga muna 2000. Asi varimi ava vari kuchema nerekuti mari yavari kutambiriswa haisisina simba sezvo RTGS riri kushaya simba zuva nezuva zvichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica. Varimi makumi maviri nevasere ndivo vapihwa mari kusvika parizvino pavarimi mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nevanomwe vari kutarisira kupihwa mari iyi. Murimi mumwe chete ari kupihwa mari inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nemamashanu kana kuti 55 000 RTGS. Mukuru weCFU VaBen Gilpin vanoti varimi vari kutambira mari asi vari kunetseka nekushaya simba kwayo. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Votambira Kurudziro Yekuti Vashandirwi Vasangomisa Vashandi Mabasa
text: Danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekusimbisa nyaya yekuti makambani asangomisa vashandi mabasa pamadiro asina kuratidza kuhurumende kuti azama zvose zvingatarisirwa kuti aite asati atora danho iri, riri kutambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevashandi. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira vanoti kunyange hazvo pasina zvitsva zvaiswa nehurumende, zvakakosha zvikuru kuti iratidze rutsigiro rwayo, zvikuru panguva iyo vashandi vari kurasikirwa nemabasa zvakanyanya. Gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Priscah Mupfumira vakati makambani anenge achida kumisa vashandi nekuda kwekuomerwa anofanirwa kutora matanho akaita sekudimura mari dzinotambirwa nevamwe vakuru-vakuru kuti dziende kumihoro yevashandi asati afunga zvekuderedza huwandu hwevashandi. Makambani anonzi anofanirwa kutanga aendesa chikumbiro chekumisa vashandi mabasa ku bhodhi rinoona nezvekumiswa mabasa, riri pasi pebazi rezvevashandi nemabasa, reRetrenchment Board, iro rinozotambira kana kuramba chikumbiro ichi. Asi vaimbowe mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, VaCalisto Jokonya vanotiwo semaziviro avo, makambani mazhinji ari kutevedzera mutemo wekumisa vanhu mabasa uyu. Vanotiwo makambani mazhinji akatedza zvose zvekudimura mari dzemihoro yevashandi vepamusoro asati asvika pakumbomisa vepasi ava mabasa. VaShamuyarira vanoti vari kunyanya kutyora mutemo vachingomisa vanhu mabasa pamadiro ndevaya vari mune zvematongerwo enyika, avo vati vari kushandisa zvinzvimbo zvavo kuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Otaura Kubatwa Chibharo Kwaakaitwa Munguva yeGukurahundi
text: Sangano reNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission, NPRC, rakanzwa nemusi weChitatu zvinhu zvinotyisa pamwe nekubudisa misodzi zvakaitika kune vamwe vanhu vakabatwa neGukurahundi kuKezi kuMatabeleland South. Mamwe madzimai ekuKezi mudunhu reMatabeleland South nedzimwe nzvimbo dziri pedyo vakawana mukana wekutaura zvakaitika kwavari uye zvavakaona zvichiitika kune vamwe vanhu panguva yeGukurahundi pamusangano wakaitwa neboka reNPRC paMaphisa Growth Point nemusi weChitatu. Pamusangano uyu, uyo wakaitwa kure kwemeso nenzeve dzeveruzhinji uye vatapi venhau vachirambidzwawo kupinda mauri makomishina eNPRC akanzwa zvinhu zvinotyisa uye zvimwe zvisingataurike pamhepo zvakaitika panguva yeGukurahundi. Mumwe wemadzimai vakataura pamusangano uyu avo vatisingakwanisi kudoma nezita vakaudza vatapi venhau kuti vaive mhandara panguva yakaitika Gukurahundi munzvimbo yavo yeMadwaleni mugore ra1984. Vakati rimwe zuva mumwedzi waKukadzi panguva dzemangwanani munzvimbo mavo makabhombwa nemasoja achishandisa chikopokopo vakati mushure menguva, masoja aya akazouya achikokorodza vanhu kubva mumisha yavo. Vakati pane vanhukadzi vane chitsama kusanganisira ivo, vakarohwa uye kubatwa chibharo ukuwo vamwe varume vane chitsama vakauraiwa musi uyu. Amai ava vakati vakafara kuti vakawana mukana wekutaura zvinhu zvavange vasingakwanise kutaura kwenguva yakareba. Mumwe wemakomishina eNPRC, Amai Netty Musanhi, vakabvuma kuti zvimwe zvakabuda mumusangano uyu zvange zvisingagoneki kudzokororwa paruzhinji. Vakati musangano uyu uri kuitwa mushure memumwe musangano wakadaro wakaitwa kuTsholostho pasi pechirongwa chavanoti Safe spaces for women, icho vanoti chakanangana nekubastira kuti vanhukadzi vataure zvakaitika kwavari vasingatye. Amai Eunice Nqindi Dube vanove Sadunhu Nqindi pasi paIshe Masuku kuKezi kwekare vakati musangano uyu wabatsira kukura nzira yekuti vanhu vakwanise kupora maronda avainawo nekuda kweGukurahundi vachitiwo zvakakosha kuti avo vane chekuita neGukurahundi, vatambanudze maoko avo vapinde muvanhu vachikupmbira ruregerero kuti pagokwanisa kuve nerunyararo rwechokwadi. Amai Musanhi vakati chirongwa chekuti zvakaitika panguva yeGukurahundi uye dzimwe nguva dzakaitika mhirizhonga ine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika zvitaurwe, chakakosha sezvo chichibatsira kugadzirisa kunyunyuta kwevanhu pamusoro penyaya idzi. Makomishina eNPRC aenderera mberi nekunzwa kubva kuvanhu munzvimbo yeKezi nhasi uye vanotarisirwa kuzoita mimwe misangano yakadai muBulawayo vasati vaenda kudunhu reMidlands. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, kusanganisira, remakereke reCatholic Commission for Justice and Peace, akaita ongororo munguva yeGukurahundi akabuda negwaro rinoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru makuni maviri vakaurayiwa munguva iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yopomera MDC Alliance Mhosva yeKusvipisa Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa
text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, zvakare vari munyori musangano rinomirira vakarwa hondo yerusununguko, reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaVictor Matemadanda, vanoti bato reMDC Alliance ndiro riri kukonzera kushorwa kuri kuitwa pamwe nehurumende yeZanu PF sezvo risiri kufara mushure mekukundwa neZanu PF musarudzo dzapfuura. VaMatemadanda vaudza vatori venhau muHarare nhasi kuti zvese zviri kuitika zvave nenguva zvichirongwa uye zvakatanga mushure mekunge MDC Alliance yakundikana musarudzo dza2018. Vati MDC yave kushanda neshamwari dzayo dziri muno nekunze kwenyika ichisvibisa hurumende nebato reZanu PF ichashandisa vanhu vakaita semutungamiriri webato rinopikisa kuSouth Africa reEconomic Freedom Fighters, VaJulius Malema, pamwe nevaimbove mutungamiriri weBotswana, VaIan Khama. VaMatemadanda vatiwo MDC iri kushandawo nenyika dzakaita seBritain neAmerica idzo Zanu PF yakakunda muhondo yerusununguko. Vati zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuSADC nemu Africa dzizive kuti kunyange nhasi iri Zimbabwe, mangwana i Botswana kana South Africa icharwiswa nenyika idzi. Vatiwo muZimbabwe hamuna mhirizhonga vachiti vanoshamiswa kuti vari kunze vakaita saVaMalema naVaKhama vanoda kutaura nezveZimbabwe asi vasina zvavanoziva. Vatiwo vaimbove nhengo dzeZanu PF vakaita saVaJonatahna Moyo naVaSaviour Kasukuwere ndivo vari kutaura manyepo pamusoro peZimbabwe vachiti vakashungurudzwa asi ivo ari matsotsi anofanira kudzoka kumusha kuti azotongwa nemhosva dzaakapara. Asi mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vaudza Studio7 kuti VaMatemadanda pachavo vanoziva kuti hurumende nebato ravo zviri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu uye zvavari kutaura manyepo. VaBiti vati zvisinei nezviri kutaurwa naVaMatemadanda, bato ravo rinofara kuti nyika dzemuSADC dzave kusvinura maziso adzo panyaya yeZimbabwe. VaBiti vati vanogamuchira danho rakatorwa nemutungamiriri we South Africa, VaCryil Ramaphosa, rekudoma nhumwa mbiri dzichauya kuZimbabwe kuzogadzirisa zviri kunetsa. VaBiti vati rwendo runo havasi kuzobatwa kumeso sezvakaitika nguva yaVaThabo Mbeki, avo vakayananisa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika pakaumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kuti ruzha rwave kutikita munyika pamwe nekunze pamusoro pemabasa ehurumende yeZimbabwe nebato reZanu PF rwunoratidza kuti hurumende yapesana nezvido zveveruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yeZanu PF ichiti hapana chakaipa chiri kuitika munyika, vana veZimbabwe, nyika dzepasi rese pamwe nemasangano akasiyana siyana kusanganisiraSADC neUnited Nations havasi kufara nembatirwo ari kuitwa vanhu nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations, VaAntonio Guterres, vakanyorawo vachikurudzira hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti ichengetedze kodzero dzevanhu. Vakakurudzirawo kuti mapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika, pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira atange nhaurirano murunyararo senzira yekupedza matambudziko ari muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: MDC T Yoshora Mashoko eGurukota reDunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Chimene
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC-T rinoti riri kunyorera mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, tsamba yenyunyuto pamusoro pemashoko anonzi akautaurwa negurukota rinoona nedunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Mandiitawepi Chimene, ekuti vachavharisa mabhizimusi everudzi rwechi India kana vakaramba vasingapinde mumisangano yavari kushevedzera. Vachitaura pamashoko avo ekutambira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, mudunhu ravo svondo rapera, Muzvare Chimene vakati vemabhizimusi ava vari kuramba kupinda mumisangano yavari kushevedzera, vakati vari kuvapa mazuva mashanu chete ekuti vasangane navo, kutadza kwavo kuita izvi mabhizimusi avo aizovharwa. Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti mashoko aMuzvare Chimene ane rusarura, uye vanhu ivava ndivo vashoma vevasara vachiri kuwanisa vanhu mabasa munyika zvichitevera kuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda. Studio7 yaedza kubata Muzvare Chimene asi tanzi tivabate neChipiri sezvo vanzi vanga vari mumusangano. VaGutu vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga kuti Muzvare Chimene vatyisidzire vanhu. Vanoti pavakainda muhofisi, Muzvare Chimene vakatyisidzira vemakambani anochera mangoda kwaChiadzwa kuti vasapinze nhengo dzeMDC mabasa, vachinzi vakati vanenge vatsaudzira vaizotorerwa marezinesi avo. VaGutu vanoti gurukota iri rakatyisidzira zvakare vekanzuru yeMutare nemashoko ekuti rinoda kuumba imwe kanzuru inenge iri pasi paro, isina nhengo dzeMDC. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeHarareYoronga Kuwanisa Vanhu Mvura Munguva Dzakasiyana
text: Kanzuru yeHarare yazivisa kuti ichatanga kugovera mvura nguva dzakasiyana nekuda kwekuderera kwemvura pamwe nekuwanda kwetsvina munyanza yeLake Chivero. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti yatarisana nematambudziko akawanda munyanza iyi zvekuti ichatanga kugovera vanhu mvura mwedzi uno sezvo isisakwanise kuti mugari wese muguta awane mvura yakachena. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa pachigayo chemvura cheMorton Jaffrey Water Works, VaPaul Chabata, vati mvura iri mudhamu yasviba zvakaipisisa nekuda kwetsvina inobva kuHarare nezvimbo dzakatenderedza guta iri izvo zvave kuita kuti kanzuru ishandise mari yakawanda pakuchenesa mvura iyi. Vatiwo tsvina iyi inokonzerwawo nevanhu vanoredza hove zvisina mvumo mudhamu yave kukanganisa kanzuru pakupomba mvura. Mabharani mukuru wekanzuru, Engineer Hosiah Chisangno, vati vari kukurudzira vagari kuchengetedza mvura uye kanzuru yavo ichatanga kugovera vanhu mvura kutanga mwedzi uno. Vatiwo kunzuru ichavhara chigayo cheMorton Jaffrey mukupera kwesvondo kuitira kuti vabvise tsvina irimo uye izvi zvichawedzera huwandu hwemvura kubva pa 360 mega litres kusvika pa 450 mega litres pazuva. Vagari vemuHarare vanoshandisa 800 mega litres muchando ne1200 mega litres panguva yezhizha pazuva rega rega. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti havabvumirani nematanho ari kuda kutorwa nekanzuru ekugovera mvura vachiti zvichaita kuti vagari vabatwe nezvirwere. VaMudzingwa vati kanzuru inofanira kutora mvura kubva kune mamwe madhamu akaita seDarwendale kuti mvura ikwanire munhu wese. Muzvina bhizimisi vashanda padhamu iri kwenguva yakareba, VaGarry Stafford, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuzara kwejecha mudhamu kuri kukonzerwa nekurimwa kuri kuitwa mumatoro nedzimwe nzvimbo muHarare nenzvimbo dzakatenderedza guta uye zvakakosha kuti zvisaitwe kuti dhamu reChivero risaparare. Vati dhamu iri range rakadzika mamita makumi maviri nemasere asi pari zvino rakadzika mamita gumi nemasere chete sezvo razara jecha. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemvura dzinoti tsvina yakawanda iri kupinda muLake Chivero iri kukonzerwa nekanzuru yeHarare iyo iri kutadza kugadzirisa mapombi anotakura tsvina. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuendeswa kwetsvina isina kuiswa mishonga inodzora hukasha hwetsvina munzizi dzakaita seMukuvisi neManyame kuri kuwedzerawo kuipa kwemvura yemuLake Chivero. Muna Kurume 2015 kanzuru yeHarare yakawanikwa nematare edzimhosva iine mhosva yekudira siweji muna Mukuvisi isina kucheneswa sezvinodiwa nemutemo ikafaindiswa zviuru zana zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Kanzuru yeHarare yakabatwa nemhosva yekutyora mutemo weEnvironmental Management Act kuburikidza nekudira tsvina munzizi dzinoti Mukuvisi, Marimba, Ruwa neNyatsime, nzizi dzine mvura inopedzisira yapinda muLake Chivero. Nyanzvi mukuvakwa kwemaguta dzinoti guta reHarare rakavakirwa panzvimbo isina kunaka sezvo riri munzvimbo inofamba nemvura inopinda muLake Chivero, izvo zvinoita kuti mvura iyi isvibe zvakanyanya. Pari zvino guta reHarare rinoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu emadhora semari yekutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura pamwedzi wega wega. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vovhura Musangano kuMasvingo Team Lacoste ne G40 Zvichisvotesana
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, Va Robert Mugabe, nhasi vazvionera pamhino sefodya kurwisana kuri kuitika mubato ravo apo zvikwata zviviri zviri kurwisana zvanga zvichitsvinyirana pamberi pavo. Mutungamiri wenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, Va Robert Mugabe, nhasi vazvionera pamhino sefodya kurwisana kuri kuitika mubato ravo apo zvikwata zviviri zviri kurwisana zvanga zvichitsvinyirana pamberi pavo. Zvikwata zviri kurwisana zve Lacoste ne G40 zvatanga kuimba nzviyo dzine zvirevo uye zvichisvotesana apo mutungamiriri wenyika vange vave kudanwa kuti vaende pamberi kuzotaura mashoko avo ekuvhura musangano. Chimbo ichi chaimbwa nematunhu e Masvingo neMidlands vachiti kumagumo kune nyaya uye VaMugabe vanofamba pamusoro pemvura havanyuri. Chimbo ichi chinonzi chinoreva zvinoenderana nemumwe mutevedzeri wevatungamiri venyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, avo vanonzi vanotsigirwa nechikwata che Team Lacoste. VaMnangagwa vanozivikanwa nerekuti Ngwena inogara mumvura zvichireva kuti hainyudzi VaMugabe vave kusvika kumagumo, kuitira kuti ivo vozotongawo. Ukuwo matunhu eHarare neekuMashonaland ange achiimbawo kuti anofamba naGushungu vachiratidza rutsigiro kune mudzimai waVa Mugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, avo vanonzi vanotsigirwa neG40. Izvi zvapa kuti VaMugabe vabvume kuti pane vamwe vasisavadi kuti varambe vachitungamirira Zanu PF apo vavhura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo . Dzimwe nhengo dza Zanu PF dzataura ne Studio 7 parutivi pemusngano uyu dzati mashoko aVa Mugabe aratidza kuti vave kuzviziva kuti mubato ravo vamwe vave kuda kuti vachisiya chigaro chehutongi. Asi VaMugabe vati ivo vachiri pachigaro hakuna kwavanoeda. Vashoropodza vechimwe chikwata chinoda kuzovatsiva mhosva yekushaya rukudzo nekusateera. Kurwisana uku kwaonekwa zvakare apo vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri ve Team Lacoste vauya vakapepfeka hembe dzanga dzichishora huori dzakanyorwa kuti Zanu PF say no to Corruption. Mashoko aya anofungirwa kuti anga akanangana nenhengo dze G40 kunyaya Va Jonathan Moyo varo kupomerwa mhosva yekuba mari yebazi re Zimdef. VaMugabe vakumbira vatsigiri vavo kuti vapinde mugore ra 2017 vakabatana kana musangano wavo uchida kuramba uchitonga nyika. Musangano we Zanu PF wakatarisana nenguva yakaoma gore rinouya nerinotevera apo masangano anopikisa ari kuita nhauriranwa dzekubatana kuti vapinde musarudzo dza 2018 vakasimba. Musangano weZanu PF unopera neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Youmba Komiti Inotsvaka Nzira Dzekushandisa Kubhdhara Zvikwereti
text: Hurumende yaumba komiti ichaona kuti Zimbabwe yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti komiti iyi ichange iine vakuru kubva kubazi rezvehupfumi, African Development Bank, World Bank ne International Monetary Fund, IMF. Zimbabwe iri kuda zvimwe zvikwereti kuti igadzirise hupfumi asi hapana ari kuda kusungirira mari pagumbo rengwe sezvo kubhadhara zvikwereti izvi kuri kunetsa. Gore rapera mukuru wezvirongwa zveIMF muZimbabwe, VaDominique Fanezzi, vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzopihwa zvimwe zvikwereti uye hapana kutsukunyuka padanho iri. Zvikwereti izvi zviri kuboka rinonzi Paris Club rinosanganisira Germany, France, Britain, Japan neAmerica. Kune zvikweretiwo kuIMF, African Development Bank neWorld Bank. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongwero enyika dzinoti chikwereti cheZimbabwe ndicho chimwe chikonzero chiri kutadzisa nyika kuti ibudirire. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vanoti Zimbabwe ikakwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo, inenge yokwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi.

headline: VaTrump Voraswa neMamwe Maseneta eBato Ravo
text: Zvinhu hazvina kumirira zvakanaka kumutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, zvichitevera mashoko nezviri kuitwa nevanhu vebato ravo, reRepublican Party, muparamende yeAmerica. Bepanhau reNew York Times rinoti mutungamiri wenhengo dzedare reSenate, dze Republican Party, VaMitch Mcconnell, vaudza bepanhau iri kuti VaTrump vakapara mhosva dzinofanirwa kutongwa. Svondo rapera, vatsigiri vaVaTrump vakapinda zvechisimba mudare reCongress yeAmerica vakapwanya misuwo, mahwindo, matafura nemacheya vachitsvaka mutevedzeri waVaTrump, VaMike Pence, pamwe chete nenhengo dzeparamende idzo dzakazvivharira mune dzimwe dzimba dzikavanda pasi pamatafura. Vamamwe vatsigiri vaVaTrump vanoti zvinotaurwa nemukuru wavo zvekuti sarudzo dzakabirwa ndezvechokwadi. Imwe nhengo yedare reSenate, Amai Liz Cheney, vakati nhasi Chitatu, vachavhota kuti VaTrump vatongwe neparamende pamusoro pemhosva dzavanonzi vakapara mukukurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vakonzere mhirizhonga paCapital Hill nemusi weChitatu pakafa vanhu vashanu. VaTrump vari kuramba vachiti vakabirwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika kunyange hazvo matare edzimhosva makumi matanhatu akarasa zvichemo zvaVaTrump achiti hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti sarudzo yakabirwa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vari mugari wemu Washington D.C. Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato raVaTrump sezvo makambani mazhinji abuda pachena achiti haachapi mari kunhengo dzebato iri dzakakwikwidza kuti VaJoe Biden vakasarudzwa nevanhu pasina kubirirwa kwakaitwa. Makambani eSocial Media mazhinji, anosanganisa Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Google nemamwe akavhara kuti VaTrump vasashandisa madandemutande awo. Doctor Guni vanoti mapurisa ari kushanda zvine simba kuitira kuti pakugadzwa nemusi weChitatu kwaVa Biden, pasave nebongozozo serakaonekwa svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotambira Dzimwe Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Kubva KuChina
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weMuvhuro yakatambira dzimwe nhomba dzedenda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina panguva iyo paine kurudziro yekuti hurumende ishande zvakasimba kuti nhomba idzi dzitengwe dzakawanda kuitira kuti dzikwanire veruzhinji. Zimbabwe yawana dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) dzeSinopharm dzabva kuChina. Nhomba idzi dzasvika munyika manheru ano mushure mekusvika kwenhomba zviuru mazana masere (800 000) dzakabva kuChina zvakare. Mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid 19 muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kushanda zvakasimba kuti nhomba dzeCovid 19 dziwande munyika kuitira kuti dzishandiswe mukurwisa denda iri. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachienda munzvimbo dzose dziri kubayiwa nhomba idzi kuitira kuti vakwanise kubayiwa vozvidzivirirawo kudenda reCovid 19. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kutenga nhomba dzakawanda nguva imwechete kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasanetseke kuwana nhomba idzi. Hurumende inoti vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yekutamba kusvika mukupera kwezuva reChitatu vave miriyoni imwe nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu (1 562 285) uye vakabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana manomwe zvine gumi nezvitatu nezana rimwe chete nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete (713 131). Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pachakatanga kupinda munyika ichi vave zviuru zana nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe (103 567) uye vapora vave zviuru makumi manomwe nechimwe nemazana matatu ane makumi masere nevatatu (71 383). Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matanhatu (60) vakafa nezuro zvabva zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe pazviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana (3 340). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba kuvanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Kuvharwa kweHurumende yeAmerica Kwoenderera Mberi Pasina Kuwirirana.
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vaita musangano nevakuru vedare reCongress vachiyedza kubuda nechibvumirano chekuti mapazi ehurumende akavharwa avhurwe. Mapazi aya ave nemasvondo maviri akavharwa sezvo VaTrump vakaramba kuisa runyoro rwavo pabhajeti rakapasiswa nedare reHouse of Representatives neSenate vachiti vanoda mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mashanu emadhora yekuvaka mudhuri pamuganhu weAmerica neMexico. Vashandi vehurumende vanosvika zviuru mazana masere vakambomiswa basa, uye vamwe vanosvika mazana mana ezviuru vari kungoshanda havo vasingapihwe mari yemuhoro. VaTrump nevamwe vebato ravo reRepublican Party vanoti mudhuri uyu unobatsira kuti vanotengesa zvinodhaka nevanopfurikidza mwero vasapinde muAmerica. Asi vebato reDemocratic Party vanoti kuvaka mudhuri mukore uno hakuna zvakunobatsira vachiti zviri nani kushandisa michina yechizvino zvino kurinda miganhu yeAmerica. VaZvidzai Ruzvidzo chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe chinogara kuOhio, uye vari sachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mudunhu reAmerica. VaRuzvidzo vanoti hakuna chinoitwa nehurumende kusvika vehurumende vawirirana. Vanotiwo mashandiro akadai ehurumende haangagoneki kuZimbabwe sezvo kuZimbabwe kuine masimba akwandisa kumutungamiri wenyika,. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuremekedza Kodzero dzeVanhu Isati Yatambirwa Kuva Nhengo yeCommonwealth
text: Chikwata chesangano reCommonwealth icho chiri munyika kuongorora kuti Zimbabwe yodzorwa musangano iri here kana kuti kwete, chiri kusangana nehurumende, mapato anopikisa nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika dzinoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nehutongi hwejekerere kuti kuti itambirwe zvakare muCommonwealth. Chikwata chenyika dziri mugungano reCommonwealth chiri munyika chiri kuenderera mberi nehurukuro nemapato nemasangano akasiyana siyana. Vataura neStudio 7 vakawanda vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti Zimbabwe idzorwere mugungano iri asi inofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. VaTabani Mlambo avo vanogara kuChipinge East, ndemumwe ane muonero uyu. Mukururu wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum iro raita hurukuro nechikwata ichi, Doctor Musa Kika vati vanotsigira kudzokera kweZimbabwe muCommonwelath asi.. Dr Kika vaudza Studio 7 kuti havashamisiki kuti nhengo gumi dzeCitizens Coalition for Change idzo dzange dzave nemwedzi mishanu dzichinyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso panyanya yadziri kupomerwa yekukonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime dzapihwa mukana uyu nhasi nekuda kwekuti chikwata cheCommonwealth chiri munyika. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haipindire panyaya dzinenge dziri kumatare. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaErnest Mudzengi vati zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vashande vakasungunuka Commonwealth isati ambundira Zimbabwe. Pari zvino chikwatai ichi chiri kuita musangano neZanu PF uye chiri kutarisirwa kuita hurukuro nemapato eMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora neCCC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWitness Dube, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rinoda chose kuti Zimbabwe ipinde muCommonwealth nekuti iri kurasikirwa zvikuru. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vati bato ravo richazivisa veruzhinhi parimire munguva inotevera. Mukuru mubazi reZanu-PF rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vat Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana kwenyika zvakare vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe ingona kudzorwa muCommonwealth kana pakatariswa nzira dzakashandiswa pakapinda dzimwe nyika dzakaita sana Rwanda. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutungamiriri wechikwata cheCommonwealth Muzvinafundo Luis Franschesci. Asi vachitaura mumusangano wavaakaita negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe, VaFrederick Shava nezuro vakati vachaedza nepavanogona kubatsira Zimbabwe kudzoka muCommonwealth. VaShava vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo asi Studio 7 ine hurukuro yayakaita nemutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba nezvenyaya iyi yatichakupai muzvikamu zvinotevera. VaCharamba vanoti donzvo reZimbabwe ndseekudyidzana nenyika dzose. Vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaburitsa Zimbabwe muCommonwealth mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yambomiswa kuve nhengo yesangano iri ichipomerw mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu muna 2003. Asi zvichitevera kupidigurwa kwehurumende yaVaMugabe, VaMangagwa vakaisa chikumbiro kusangano iri kuti Zimbabwe idzoke izvo zvazoita kuti Commonwealth itumire chikwata ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vechidiki muChinhoyi Votarisira Kuna VaChamisa?
text: Vagari vemuChinhoyi nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza guta iri vanoti vari kutarisira kunzwa kumutungamiri mutsva weMDC-T, VaNelson Chimisa, neSvondo kuti hurongwa hwavo kana vachinge vakunda musarudzo dzegore rino, hunenge hwakamira seyi. VaChamisa vachange vari mutauri mukuru vachitaura pamisangano yeMDC Alliance, kekutanga kubva pavagadzwa semutungamiri webato zvizere. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaGershem Dzoto, vati vange vasingaende kumisangano yezvematongerwo enyika, asi rwendo rwuno vachaenda kunonzwa kuti VaChamisa vachataura zvinobata vechidiki here. VaDzoto vati vachanzwa vatungamiri vose, vozosarudza kuti vanga vhotere ani. Mumwe wechidiki anogara muChikonohono, VaDarius Mhodzi, vati vanotarisira kuti VaChamisa vataure zvakadzama kuti vachaita sei nenyaya yehupfumi izvo zvinoita kuti vawane mabasa. Mutevedzeri wemurongi yemisangano muMDC-T, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti vanotarisira kuti vanhu vakawanda vachapinda musangano wemangwana nekuda kwaVaChamisa, avo vavati vari kugamuchirwa zvikuru nevechidiki pamwe nevakuru. VaChamisa, avo vachange vachimirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, vanotarisirwa kutatsurana namutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inobatana neDzimwe Nyika Mukucherechedza ‘World Aids Day’
text: Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe dzepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekukurudzira vanhu kuti vadzivirire kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kana kuti World AIDS Day. United Nations yakatara musi 1 Zvita gore rega rega semusi wekucherechedza zuva iri. Dingindira reWorld Aids Day gore rinoti “Ending the HIV/AIDS Epidemic: Resilience and Impact”. Vachitaura panhepfenyuro yeZBC neMuvhuro manheru, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati gore rino, kucherechedzwa kwe zuva iri kunokosha nekuti nyika dzepasi pose dzakatarisana nechirwere che Covid-19. VaMnangagwa vakati hazvigoni kuti Zimbabwe inangane nekurwisa AIDS/HIV chete isingatarisi mamiriro akaita zvipatara nezvose zvinoshandiswa mukuunza hutano kuvanhu. Vakati hurumende yavo iri kugadzirisa mamiriro ezvehutano munyika kuti ikwanise kubatsira vanhu nekukurumidza. VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kuti hurumende ichabudirira muchirongwa che 90/90/90 sezvo Zimbabwe ichitove mberi muzvizhinji zvezvinangwa izvi. Zvinangwa izvi ndezvekuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vazive vavhenekwe uye kana vavhenekwa vapinde muchirongwa chekupihwa mapiritsi. Zuva reWorld AIDS Day rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988. Rinopa mukana kumasangano nevanhu pasi pose kuti vabatane mukurwisa mukondombera uyu, uye kukurudzira ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere ichi, pamwe chete nekubvisa pfungwa yekusarudza vanenge vabatwa nacho. Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoshanda mudunhu reNorth Carolina, muAmerica, vaudza Studio 7 kuti senyika, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuona kuti chirwere che Covid-19 hachikanganisi basa riri kuitwa mukurwisa HIV/AIDS.  No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende yeSouth Africa Inowedzera neMwedzi Mitanhatu Nguva yeKuti Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvigadzirise Magwaro Azvo
text: Mashoko atichangotambira anoti bazi rezvemukati menyika muSouth Africa rawedzera nemwedzi mitanhatu nguva yekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine magwaro eZimbabwe Exemption Permits akasvika kumagumo zvigadzirise rugaro rwazvo munyika iyi. Mwedzi mitanhatu iyi inobvira musi wa 31 Zvita, 2022 kusvika musi wa 30 Chikumi 2023. Magwaro eZEP akaguma kushanda muna Zvita 2021, asi hurumende yeSouth Africa yakapa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe gore rimwe chete kuti zvinyorere mamwe mavhiza anozvibvumidza kugara munyika iyi zviri pamutemo kusvika musi wa 31 Zvita gore rino. Asi Vazhinji vevaifanirwa kunyorera mavhiza aya vanoti hurongwa hwacho kakomo kasina ukwiriko sezvo vanhu vanoda kusvika zviuru zvisere chete pazviuru zana nemakumi masere zvine magwaro aya ndivo vakakwanisa kunyorersa chete kusvika pari zvino. Izvi zviri kuuyawo panguva iyo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kutambiswa chamutavanhava nezvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zviri kuda kuti zvibude munyika iyi, uye kuti zvisarapwa pachena muzvipatara zvehurumende.

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vanofa neCOVID-19 paNguva Iyo Huwandu hweVari Kuwanikwa Vaine Denda Hwakwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano razivisa neChipiri mangwanani kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neMuvhuro neCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vakawanikwa vaine denda iri Muvhuro wakare hwakakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 2 555. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu vafa neCovid-19 vave pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu, kana kuti 4 713, kuchitiwo vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 kubva patanga chirwere ichi munyika vakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe namazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 141 601. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nezvitatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 3,882 255 vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 pakupera kwezuva neMuvhuro. Vamwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 2,892 366, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri sezvinokurudzirwa. Huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 uhwu huri kukwira kubva pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 523, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri nemusi weSvondo, kuchitiwo neMugovera vanhu chiuru nemakumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 082, vakawanikwawo vaine Covid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti hutachiwana hweOmicron hwakanga hwawanikwa munyika pavanhu makumi mashanu vakavhenekwa kuMasvingo. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira hutano hwakanaka munharaunda, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti havasi kushamisika nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 mazuvano sezvo paine kuvarairwa kweveruzhinji kwakanyanya. VaRusike vanoti nekupinda munyika kwehutachiwana hweOmicron, veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera nzira dzekudzivirira nadzo kupararira kweCovid-19, dzakaita sekugeza maoko, kupfeka mamasiki, kugara madaranganwa pamwe nekusaenda munzvimbo dzakawanda vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Kunetsa kweZvekufambisa Kunonzi Kwave kuKanganisa Nyaya dzeMagariro eVanhu Pamwe neHupfumi hweNyika
text: Dambudiko rezvekufambisa mumadhorobha makuru emunyika rinonzi nevamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nevanoongorora zvehupfumi rave kutowedzera zvakanyanya kukanganisa magariro evanhu pamwe nehupfumi hwenyika sezvo vashandi vave kumanikidzwa kunonoka kusvika kumabasa pamwe nekusvika kudzimba. Vazhinji vevanofamba nemabhazi, zvikuru muHarare neBulawayo, vanonzi vari kuzopedzisira vofamba netsoka sezvo kambani yakapiwa mvumo nehurumende yekutakura vezurizhinji, yeZUPCO, iri kunzi yakundikana kuzadzisa chirevo ichi. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kupawo mukana kune vane dzimotokari diki avo vanonzi vave kutakura vanhu vachivachaja miripo iri pamusorosoro, kunyange hazvo ivo vasina marezinesi ekutakura veruzhinji. Mapurisa nemamwe mapazi ehurumende vanonziwo vari kusunga nekurambidza vemotokari vasina marezinesi ava, avo vanozivikanwa nerekuti 'mishikashika', izvo zvinonzi zviri kusvitsa pakuti vamwe varaisikirwe nehupenyu nekuda kwetsaona dziri kuitika apo vatyairi vanenge vachiedza kutiza mapurisa. Nekuda kwedambudziko iri, vamwe vanhu vanonzi vave kutokwira pamusoro pemabhazi nemarhorhi vamwe vachipinda mumabhutu emabhazi kuti vakwanisenkusvitswa kudzimba dzavo, izvo zvave kuvaisa munjodzi. Hurumende neChitatu yakabvuma kuti ZUPCO yakundikana, asi yakavimbisa kuti iri kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuburikidza nekuita kuti mabhazi anofamba pakati pemaguta akaita seharare nemamwe ange achizobatsira kutakura vanhu munguva dzaanenge adzoka muHarare. Asi munyori anoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu mubato rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, CCC, vari zvakare mumiriri weMbizo mudare reparamende, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vanoti hurumende yakundikana zvakanyanya uye yapererwa. VaChikwinya vanoti hurumende yakapindira munyaya dzekutakurwa kwevanhu ichihwanda nedenda reCovid-19, asi iyo iine chinangwa chekushandisa vemabhazi kuti vaende pasi peZUPCO isingavabhadhare nenguva uye ichivabhadhara nemadhora emunyika, ayo asina chaachatenga. Kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, VaChikwinya vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kubvumidza vamwe vedzimotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji kuitawo basa iri,pamwechete neZUPCO yacho, uye kubhadhara vane mabhazi ari kushanda ari pasi peZUPCO nenguva kuitira kuti vakwanisewo kugadzirisa mabhazi avo. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF vari munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mudunhu reHarare DCC 3, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanoti hurumende iri kuita zvose zvainokwanisa kugadzirisa dambudziko rezvekufambisa iri kuburikidza nekutenga mabhazi matsva akawanda kubva kuBelarus. VaDzikiti vanoti dambudziko harisi pahurumende, asi kuti vemabhazi vari pasi peZUPCO, avo vavanoti vari kunyanya kushanda vaine chinangwa chemari yavanoda kubata pazuva zvekuti kana vangosvitsa mari iyoyo vanobva vatomisa mabhazi avo vogara zvavo pamimvuri vanhu vachitambura. VaDzikiti vanoti kuti dambudziko iri rigadziriswe, ZUPCO inofanirwa kugadzirisa mashandiro ayo, vachitiwo dambudziko remabhazi riri kuwedzerwawo nezvirango zvavanoti zviri kutadzisa kupinda munyika kwezvinodiwa kugadzirisa mabhazi anenge afa. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Redzimhosva Roshorerwa Kutambira Zvakaitwa NeMauto
text: Dare guru redzimhosva rinoti kutora masimba nechisimba kwakaitwa nemauto svondo rapera kuri pamutemo. Vachitaura neChishanu mushure mekunzwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nevesangano rakarwa hondo yerusununguko, mutongi Justice George Chiweshe, vakati zvakaitwa nemauto, achitungamirwa nemukuru wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, zvinobvumidzwa neChikamu 212 che bumbiro remitemo weZimbabwe. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Va Dewa Mavhinga, vanoti nyaya iyi haina kuziviswa kune veruzhinji uye haina kubatwa zvakanaka. Va Mavhinga vanoti hapana akapiwa nguva yekutaura akamirira rimwe divi. No media source currently available

headline: VaJob Sikhala Vanonyimwa Mukana Wekubvisa Mari Yechibatiso
text: Mutevedzeri wa sachigaro ve MDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, nhasi vanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. VaSikhala, avo vakavharirwa mu Chikurubi Maximum Prison, vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira vanhu kuratidzira nenzira inokonzera bongozozo. VaSikhala varikuramba mhosva iyi. Vachuchusi ve National Prosecuting Authority vaudza Jaji Ndebele kuti VaSikhala vasapiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso, vachiti VaSikhala vakambotiza vakavanda apo vaitsvakwa nemapurisa, naizvozvo vanogona kuita izvi zvekare. Mutauriri wesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbamwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachuchusi ava vaudza dare redzimhosva kuti VaSikhala vakange vari munhu waitsvakwa nemapurisa asi havana kuzvipira kumapurisa. Vati, pamusoro paizvozvo, VaSikhala havakodzeri kupiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Asi magweta aVaSikhala, anosanganisa VaJeremiah Bhamu, VaHarrison Nkomo naVaEric Matinenga, vashora mashoko evachuchusi vachiti VaSikhala vakatofonera mukuru wemapurisa vachiti vakanzwa kuti varikuvatsvaka apo vakaudzwa kuti havasi kutsvakwa, izvo zvinonzi zvakatsinidzirwa nerimwe gweta raVaSikhala, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, avo vanonzi vakaenda kumapurisa vakaudzwa kuti VaSikhala havasi kutsvakwa nemapurisa. Dare redzimhosva ratonga kuti VaSikhala vacharamba vari muhusungwa kuChikurubi kusvika musi wavachatongwa. Zvichakadaro, mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, uyo akapiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso, amiswavo mberi kwedare redzvimhosva akaudzwa kuti adzoke kudare musi wa 19 Gumiguru, kana kuti October. Magweta aChin’ono vaudza dare redzimhosva kuti panodzoka Chin’ono kudare iri, vanoda kuziviswa zuva richatongwa mhosva ya Chin’ono. Pakarepo, mutungamiri we Zimbabwe National Students Union, (ZINASU), VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, vapiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inoita zviuru zviviri zvemadhora emu Zimbabwe kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi Vanoratidzira Vachiramba Mitengo yeFodya
text: Mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga adaidzwa kuzodzimura mhirizhonga inonzi yatadzisa kutengeswa kwefodya pazuva rekutanga kumusika wefodya weBoka Tobacco Auction Floors. Varimi varatidzira vachiramba mitengo yanga iri pasi yanga ichida kutengwa nayo fodya yavo. Mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga anonzi azodaidzwa kuti adzimure kuratidzira uku mushure mekunge varimi vatanga kuimba vachiita mhirizhonga. Musika wefodya wavhurwa zviri pamutemo kuBoka Auction Tobacco Floors negurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaMike Bimha. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, VaWonder Chabikwa, avo vanga varikowo kuBoka pavhurwa zviri pamutemo musika wefodya, vanoti bhero rekutanga ratengwa nemadhora matatu nemasendi makumi mashanu pakirogiramu. VaChabikwa vanoti mamwe mabhero azotevera mumashure azenge otengwa nemitengo yanga yaderera zvakanyanya zvekutosvika kumasendi makumi maviri pakirogiramu, izvo zvinonzi zvazotsamwisa varimi. Gore rapera fodya yakatengwa nemadhora mana nemasendi makumi masere nemashanu pakirogiramu pazuva rekutanga rekutengeswa kwefodya. Gore rino varimi vane misika mitatu yavanokwanisa kunotengesera fodya yavo inoti Boka Auction Floors, Tobacco Sales Auction Floors pamwe nePremium Tobacco Auction Floors. Studio7 yakundikana kubata mukuru weTobacco Industry and Marketing Board, VaAndrew Matibiri, kuti tinzwe kuti fodya yatengeswa yakawanda zvakadii sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Asi Vamwe Varairidzi Vachiramwa Mabasa neNyaya yeMihoro
text: Zvikoro zvakavhurwa neMuvhuro kune vadzidzi vari kunyora bvunzo mukupera kwegore kunyangwe hazvo vamwe varairidzi vatotanga kuramwa mabasa vamwe vachitiwo hurumende haisi kupa zvikwanisiro zvakakwana kuvadzidzi kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Muzvikoro zvine chitsama zvakashanyirwa neStudio 7 muBulawayo kusanganisira Milton Primary, McKeurtan Primary, Lobengula Primary, Eveline High pamwe eGifford High, vana vechikoro vange vauya kuchikoro uye vadzidzisi vange vachiita basa ravo. Pazvikoro izvi, vana vadzidzisi pamwe nevamwe vanhu vose vanenge vasvikapo vange vachitanga vaongororwa kupisa kwemiviri yavo uyewo kugezeswa maoko nema sanitiser. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chemuBulawayo uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Moyo, ati afara kuti zvikoro zvavhurwa asi akomekedza kuti hurumende itore matanho akasimba ekuti vana pamwe nevadzidzisi vadzivirirwe mukubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Tsvakurudzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti kuzvikoro zvakawanda zvekumamisha vadzidzisi vakawanda havana kuenda kubasa. Mumwe mudzidzisi anodzidzisa kuBinga achigara muBulawayo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kubuda pamhepo achityira basa rake ati haazi kukwanisa kuenda kuchikoro kwaanodzidzisa nekuti mari yake yemuhoro haikwane kuti aite izvi. Masangano anomirira vadzidzisi akawanda ari kuti vadzidzisi havazi kukwanisa kudzokera kumabasa nekuti mari yavo haivakwanire. Mutungamiri wesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaObert Masaraure vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi vanosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vekumaruwa havana kuenda kubasa vachiti izviz hazvishamise nekuti havana mari yekuti vakwanise kuita izvi. Vatsidza kuti vadzidzisi havazi kuzodzokera kuchikoro kana nyaya yavo yemuhoro isati yagadziriswa. Svondo rakapera gurukota rezvedzidzo VaCain Mathema vakati vadzidzisi vanotadza kuenda kubasa vanogona kudzingwa basa.\nMukuru wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti PTUZ VaTakavafira Zhou vashora danho rehurumende vachiti kutyisidzira vashandi hakuna zvakunobatsira. Mukuru wesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano emuzvikoro reNational Association of School Development Associations, kana kuti NASDAC, VaBanny Manokora vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara kuti zvikoro zvavhurwa asi vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai hurumende yakadzirisa gakava riri pakati payo nevahsndi vayo kusanganisira vadzidzisi kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe zvakanaka muzvikoro. Tabata mutauriri webazi redzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro kuti tinzwe maonero ebazi ravo pazuva rekutanga regore rino rekuvhurwa kwezvikoro asi vati vange vari mumusangano. Asi gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti nhaurirano nevarairidzi dziri kuenderera mberi nekudaro hapana chikonzero chekuramwa mabasa. Vati hurumende yakazvipira kuwedzera vashandi mari. Pave nenguva yakareba vadzidzisi vachichema chema nenyaya yemuhoro pamwe nemashandiro uye vamwe vanoti kusagadziriswa kwenyaya iyi iri kuita kuti dzidzo yemunyika idzokere kumashure. No media source currently available

headline: Bhodhi Idzva reZimra Rinogadzwa Richitungamirwa naVaCallisto Jokonya
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakazivisa neChitatu mazita evanhu vatanhatu vachange vari mubhodhi idzva reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra. VaNcube vakati sachigaro webhodhi iri vachange vari muzvinabhizimisi ane mukurumbira, VaCallisto Jokonya, mutevedzeri wavo ari Amai Josephine Matambo. Dzimwe nhengo dzebhodhi iri ndiVaGeorge Guvamatanga, VaIsaac Kwesu, Memory Nguwi naDoctor Morris Mpofu. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga vachitengesa reInternational Crossborder Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange havo vachiremekedza VaJokonya semunhu anoziva zvemabhizimisi, VaJokonya havangakwanisi kupedza huori huri kuZimra nekuti huori uhu hunobva kumusoro soro kwehurumende kunove iko kunofanirwa kutanga kugadziriswa. VaJokonya vaudza Studio7 kuti vanga vari kunze kwenyika uye havakwanisi kutaura nesu. No media source currently available

headline: Makanzuru Anoti Vagari Ngavabhadhare Mitero Yakakwira Sezvo Mari yemaRTGS Iri Kushaya Simba
text: Makanzuru akawanda munyika ari kuchema chema kuti mitemo yehurumende pagwara rezvehupfumi iri kungovandudzwa nguva nenguva negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, uye gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, yave kukanganisa mashandiro ayo zvekuti vave kuda kuti mari dziri kubhadharwa nevagari semutero pamwedzi dziwedzerwe. Hurumende yakambotanga yati mari yemaRTGS nedhora rekuAmerica zvakayenzana isati yati huremu hupimwe nemabhanga zuva nezuva. Izvi zvinonzi nemakanzuru akawanda zvavhiringidza mabasa avo sezvo mitengo yabva yawedzerwa zvakanyanya. Asi vagari vanoti havana mari iri kutaurwa kuti vawedzere. Meya weguta reHarar, VaHerbert Gomba, vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kuda kuti vagari vawedzere mari dzemitero nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nameya weguta reKweke, Amai Angeline Kasipo, vatendawo kuti kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura nezvimwe zvikwanisiro zvave kuomera kanzuru yavo. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollins Maboke, vanoti zvinhu kukanzuru yavo zvakaita mhidigari zvekuti havachwakwanise kuita mabasa avanotarisirwa nevagari. Mumwe kanzura wekuChitungwiza atiwo kanzuru yaremerwa nemutoro wekutadza kuwana mari. Ko vagari vari kuonawo sei nyaya yekuti mari iwedzerwe? Mukuru weChitungwiza and Manyame Rural Residents' Association, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vanoti zvinhu zvakaomera vagari vazhinji. Mutungamiri weHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vati havatenderana zvachose nezviri kuda kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuti vabhadhare mari yakawanda yemitero. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naVaAnoziva Muguti vanove mukuru weMasvingo Residents and Ratepayers Association. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti zvinhu zvikasagadziriswa mumaguta umu munotanga kupararira zvirwere zvakaita setyphoid nekorera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kana hupfumi hwenyika husina kugadziriswa, makanzuru acharambawo achitatarika. Gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vari mumusangano uye vachapindura mibvunzo yedu panyaya iyi svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havadzokeri kuBasa Kusvika Hurumende Yagadzirisa Zvichemo Zvavo
text: Apo kuramwa mabasa kwaana chiremba kwasvitsa masvondo maviri nemusi weChitatu, vamwe vana chiremba vamboratidzira kwekanguva kadiki pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals. Studio7 yasvika pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, UBH, kuratidzira uku kuchangopera. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti kuratidzira uku yange iri nzira yekuyeuchidza hurumende kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvaana chiremba. Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende munyika yose. Vati kunyange zvakadaro, vana chiremba vadiki havazi kuzodzokera shure panyaya yekuramwa mabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo, sezvo vati pave nenguva vachiudzwa kuti zvichemo zvavo zvichagadziriswa asi pasina chinobuda. Mumwe mukoti mukuru paUBH uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kutaura pamhepo sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatapi venhau, ati vanhu vari kungorapwa pachipatara apa ndevaye vanenge vachirwara zvakaipisisa, sezvo vana chiremba vakawanda kunyanya vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo, vari kuramwa mabasa. PaRichard Morris Hospital, chinove chikamu cheUBH panorapwa vanhu maziso, vamwe vanhu vange vauya kuzorapwa vange vachiudzwa kuti vadzokere kumba sezvo panga pasina vana chiremba vanga vachikwanisa kuvaona. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 paMpilo Central Hospital, chimwezve chipatara chikuru muBulawayo, yaratidzawo kuti kuchikamu chechipatara ichi chinorapa vanhu vachibva kumba - kana kuti Outpatients Department - kwange kusina vanhu. Chiremba mukuru paMpilo, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vari kungokwanisawo kurapa vanhu vari kurwara zvakaipisisa, zvinhu hazvina kunyanya kuipa sezvo vana chiremba vakuru nevamwe vanoshanda vachibva kunze, kana kuti consultants, vari kushanda semazuva ose. Dr Solwayo Ngwenya vabvuma mashoko ekuti vana mukoti vanonzi vari kuda kutanga kuramwawo mabasa mangwana, asi vakurudzira vana chiremba pamwe naana mukoti kuti vakoshese varwere sezvinotarisirwa mubasa ravo. Studio7 haina nkukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, kanawo kunzwa kugurukota rezvehutano, Va David Parirenyatwa. Vana chiremba naana mukoti vanogara vachiramwa mabasa nguva nenguva vachitsutsumwa pamusoro pemashandiro avo uye mari shoma yavanowana. Nekune rimwe divi hurumende inogarawo ichichema nerekuti haina mari. Asi Fortune Moyo, mumwe mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, ndemumwe wevanhu vanoti matambudziko ana chiremba pamwe nemamwe ane chekuita nezvehutano munyika anogona kugadziriswa, kana hurumende ikakoshesa nyaya yehutano munyika sezvainofanirwa kuita. Kunze kwemari yavanohora, zvimwe zvezvichemo zvaana chiremba ava zvinosanganisira nyaya yekushaya zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa muzvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Mashanu Obatwa neCoronavirus
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti pane mapurisa mashanu akabatwa nechirwere cheCovid19 nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMangwana havana kutaura kuti mapurisa aya akatapurirwa chirwere ichi sei. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro kuBritain, Dr Edgar Munatsi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kubatwa kwemapurisa aya nechirwere ichi hakusi kuvashamisa nekuti vanofamba vari mumarori vasingatevedzere mitemo yekuti vasatapurirwe chirwere ichi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika hwakwira kusvika pamazana mashanu nemakumo mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 591. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa nechirwere ichi kwevamwe vanhu gumi nevanomwe nezuro. Pavanhu ava pane gumi nevatatu vakabva kuSouth Africa, vatatu vakatapurirwa munyika uye mumwe chete kubva kuBotswana. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika zana nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 162. Vanhu vafa vachiri vanomwe. Kuwedzera kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuuya apo vashandi vemuzvipatara vakawanda kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti havasi kufara nemari dzavari kutambira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo sesvo vasati vapindura mashoko atakavatumira nezvenyaya yekuramwa Mabasa kwevashandi vehurumende. Mumashoko kuvashandi vose vehurumende, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakati vainge vawedzera vashandi mari zvakapetwa zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana uye kuti vaizovapa mamwe madhora manomwe nemashanu ekubatsirikana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 383,000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 9,691. Vapora vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 183,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 10,3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neBrazil. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 127, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu, 2,6 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemasere kana kuti 508,000.  \nVapora vachidarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 5,2 million.

headline: Vechidiki Vanoti Amai Makarau Ngavasiye Basa
text: Vechidiki vesangano riri kuzvidaidza kuti National Youth Action Alliance varatadzira muHarare vachiti sachigaro wekomisheni inowona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo, Amai Rita Makarau, ngavasiye basa. No media source currently available Vechidiki vanga vachisvika zana ava varatidzira kubva pamahofisi ekanzuru mu Harare kusvika kumahofisi ekomisheni inowona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo ye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC. Vechidiki ava vanga vachimba nekuridza pembe vari pakati pemugwagwa. Vechidiki ava, avo vanga vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana, vasvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kumahofisi asachigaro we ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vachiti Amai Makarau vanofanira kusiya basa nepamusana pekuti havana simba negwaro revavhoti. Pavasvika pamahofisi aya, mapurisa anochengetedza apa abva avhara mikova yose inopinda pamahofisi aya asi mumwe wevechidiki ava anga atopinda kare kunosiya gwaro renynyuto iri. Ataura pachiitiko ichi, Va Job Sikhala, avo vaimbova mumiriri we St Marys muparamende uye vari nhengo ye MDC-T, mumwe weavo vakasaina gwaro renynyuto rasvitswa kuhofisi kwaAmai Makarau. VaSikhala vati havasi kufara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa basa naAmai Makarau panyaya yekunyoreswa kwevanhu sevavhoti. Va Sikhala vati Amai Makarau vanofanira kusiya basa izvozvi uye kuratidzira uku hakusi kuzomira kusvika sachigaro we ZEC asiya basa. Mumwe ataurawo pachitiiko ichi uye vari mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzi re Zinasu, Va Gilbert Mutubuki, vati havasi kuda kuti veruzhinji vagopinda musarudzo dzemuna 2018 pachishandiswa gwaro revavhoti rakagadzirwa namabharani wehurumende anowona nezvekutoreswa kwemagwaro, Va Tobaiwa Mudede. Amai Makarau vanonzi havana kubata basa ravo zvakanaka gore rapera apo vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, vakatoreswa mhiko yekuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. Zvinonzi Amai Makarau vaifanirwa kudaidzira sarudzo ye by election yekutsiva Amai Mujuru semumiriri we Mt Darwin. Amai Makarau vakazoita izvi gore rino mushure mekunge paita kunetsana muZanu PF uko kwakasiya Amai Mujuru nevamwe vadzingwa muhurumende. Vakawanda vanoti Amai Makarau vanoshanda vakarerekera kune vari kutonga muZanu PF. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinotiwo Amai Makarau vakaratidzawo kuti maoko avo akasviba nemabatiro avakaita nyaya yevaimbova gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaGideon Gono, avo vakanga vadomwa nedunhu reManicaland kuti vatore chigaro chemuseneti chakasiyiwa namuchakabvu Kumbirai Kangai. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raAmai Makarau sezvo vasina kubatika. Zvichakadai, Amai Makarau vakaudza komiti yeparamende inowona nezvemitemo ye Justice, Legal and Parliamentary Affairs kuti ZEC yatotanga kugadzira gwaro revavhoti vachiti sarudzo dzechipiri dzichaitwa ku Chirumanzu-Zibagwe neku Mt Darwin West dzichaitwa pachishandiswa gwaro idzva revavhoti rakawumbwa nekomisheni yavo. Bumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika rinoti gwaro revavhoti rave kufanirwa kunyorwa ne ZEC kwete nevekuhofisi kwaVa Mudede. Vapedza kuratidzira pamahofisi aya pavatamba kongonya yakawomarara, varatidziri ava vaenderera mberi nekuratidzira pakati pedhorobha vakatakura mapepa avo. Asi varatidziri ava vazomhanyiswa nemapurisa anga akatakura zvombo vasvika padare reparamende pavanga vachida kusiya rimwe gwaro renyunyuto. Vamwe vakasaina gwaro renyunyuto iri vanosanganisira mutungamiri weMDC-T, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, mutungamiri we MKD, Va Simba Makoni, pamwe nemunyori mukuru mu MDC Renewal Team, Va Tendai Biti nedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende. Mune imwewo nyaya yakanangana nesarudzo, mukuru-mukuru wevatongi munyika, Chief Justice Godfrey Chidyausiku, vadoma vatongi vana vachange vachitonga nyaya dzine chekuita nesarudzo kwemwedzi mitanhatu iri kutevera. Vatongi ava vanoti Va Chinembiri Bhunu, Va Tendai Uchena, Va Martin Makonese pamwe naVa Andrew Mutema.

headline: Vakapotsa Vafa neCovid-19 Voyambira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba Nguva Ichiripo
text: Vamwe vanhu vakarwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasina kubayiwa nhomba vari kukurudzira vari kuzengurira kubayiwa kuti vaite izvi nekuti vakapotsa vaenda kwamupfiganebwe. Vaimbova mupurisa muZimbabwe Republic Police VaMalvern Mudyiwa mumwe akapona nepaburI retsono mushure mekubatwa nechirwere ichi vasina kunge vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMudyiwa vanoti vakatozonoponera kuchipatara cheParktowen uko vakange vopihwa mweya wekufema kwemavhiki matatu sezvo vainge vozarirwa uye vagarawo vaine chirwere cheasthma. VaMudyiwa vaendera mberi vachiti vakashamiswa apo vakapedza kugeza vakatarisa pachiringiro vakaona mufananidzo wavo wairatidza kuti vainge vasara mapfupa chete. Vamwe vakataura neStudio 7 ndiAmai Namatirai Mutemwa vanogara kuZambia vakabatwa neCovid-19 vagara vaine chirwere chemoyo. Vanoti kunyangwe vakaburitswa muchipatara vachiri kunetseka nekufema uye vakanzi nachiremba vavo kana vave nani vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare kuTynwald North VaProvidence Moyo vanoti vakabhadhara mari yakawanda zvikuru kuti varapwe chirwere ichi vari kumba kwavo. Vanoti chirwere chavasiya vasinganyatsogone kumira kwenguva yakareba zvekuti kuti vaende kuri kubayiwa nhomba kune vanhu vakawanda zvinovanetsa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano avo varikuita ongororo yemishonga yeCovid19 Muzvare Miriam Chemhanza vanoti vakabayiwa nhomba vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi havazonyanye kurwara sevasina. Nyanzvi munayay dzezvehutano Dr Tinashe Gede vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid 19 uye kuti vasateerera zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Vaendera mberi vachiti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Pane gwaro rakaburitswawo nehurumende rinonzi “Covid 19 Admissions and Community Deaths by Vaccination Status,” riri kutsinhirawo kuti vanhu vari kufa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid 19 vanhu vasina kubaiwa nhomba. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vana vadiki vave kunyanya kubatwawo nemhando yeCovid-19 iri kutenderera munyika yeDelta variant. No media source currently available

headline: CCC Inoti muNyika Maberekera Ingwe
text: Bato reCitizens Coalition for Change kana kuti CCC riri kuyambira kuti mhirizhonga iyi ikasagadziriswa nemasangano akaita seNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission uye Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission sarudzo dza2023 dzichaita mhirizhonga inotyisa. Izvi zvinotevera kurwiswa kwenhengo dzebato iri dziri kukwikwidza musarudzo dzekuva makanzura kuMashonaland Central nekuHighfield muHarare nedzinofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzeZanu-PF dzinonzi hadzisikusungwa sezvo mapurisa ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutora divi. Bato iri rakurudzira zec kuti ipindirewo nekuumba mubatanidzwa wemasangano ari kukwikwidza musarudzo kuti aise musoro pamwe chete. Asi svondo rapera sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vakaudza vatori venhau kuti maoko avo akasungwa uye bato ravo harina chari ngaite pamutemo kumisa mhirizhonga. Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzekuvakanzura kuGuwa, Bindura Mashonaland Central vakamirira bato reCitizens Coalition for Change VaOswell Shambare vanonzi vakapona nepasaka reshumba mushure mekunge vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vayedza kuvapisira mumba mavainge vakarara. VaShambare vakaudza vatungamiri vebato ravo vakavashanyira nemusi kuti vakanzwa mazwi evanhu vaiti vari kuda kuvaita kafirambere. Vatungamiri vebato iri vakavashanyira vanosanganisira vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori webato VaCharlton Hwende, vanoona nezve magariro evanhu Muzvare Maureen Kademaunga uye vanoona nezvekutsvaga rutsigiro kumaruwa VaHappymore Chidziva nevamwe. Muzvare Kademaunga vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaShambare vanonzi vakarasikirwa nemabhasikoro avo, uye chikafu chavaida kupa vanhu panyaradzo yaamai vavo avo vakashaya. Imwe nhengo yebato iri VaMaxwell Dutuma vari kukwikwidza muward 26 kuHighfield West vanonzi vakapambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vakarohwa zvakaipisisa asi pavakaenda kunomhan’ara vakabva vasungwa ivo uye vari kuLaw and Order nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvemhirizhonga. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.
