Asi sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratakarereka tabatawo mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vati bato ravo riri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kudzika Mitemo Inomanikidza Vanhu Kubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushandisa nzira dzose dzainokwanisa, kusanganisira kudzika mitemo inosungira kuti munhu wese abaiwe nhomba yekudzvirira denda reCovid-19 iro radzika midzi munyika. Mumashoko avo kugurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube,mushure mekunge VaNcube vazivisa mafambiro aita bhajeti regore rino kusvika pakati pegore kana kuti Mid Term Budget Review, Dr Labode vanoti nhomba dzapinda munyika pari zvino dzinoita kuti vanhu mamiriyoni matatu vabaiwa nhomba mbiri dzekudzivirira Covid-19. Dr Labode vanoti nekuda kwaIzvozvo hurumende inofanirWa kushandisa nzira dzose dzaiNOkwanisa, kusanganisira kumanikidza vanhu kuti vabaiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Dr Labode vanotiwo Covid-19 yaunza hurombo hwakanyanya munyika uye hurumende inofanirwa kumbomisa kubhadharisa vanhu muzvipatara zvayo nemamakanzuru zvisinei kuti munhu ane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Gwaro richangobva kuburitswa neWorld Bank rinoratidza kuti vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana masere vari kurarama muhurombo hunotyisa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. Munyori musangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association for Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Norman Matara, vanoti sesangano havabvumirani nenyaya yekuti vanhu vamanikidzwe kubaiwa nhomba vachiti izvi zvinofanira kuitwa chete sedanho rekupedzesera. Makambani akawanda munyika kusanganisira hurumende, ave kutomanikidza vanhu kubaiwa nekuomesera vaye vasina kubaiwa izvo zvave kuita kuti munhu wese aende kunobaiwa nhomba. Dr Matara vati Covid-19 iri kufamba nenzira dzinotyisa zvekuti kunyange munhu aine kodzero yekuramba kubaiwa, kodzero iyi inogona kuzopinza vamwe munjodzi. Nyika dzakawanda pasi rose dziri kuongorora mitemo yadzo dziine chinangwa chekumanikidza munhu wese kubaiwa nhomba senzira yekudzivirira zvachose chirwere ichi. Bazi rezvemitemo muAmerica, re Department of Justice, rakaita ongororo yemitemo rikabuda nechisungo charakapa muzinda weWhite House kuti hapana mutemo unorambidza hurumende kana makambani kubuda nezvisungo zvinoita kuti vanhu vasatapurirane zvirwere apo vanenge vari pabasa. Pane tsvakiridzo dziri kuitwawo nenyika dzakabudirira dzekupedza zvachose denda reCovid-19, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzichikurudzira kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba katatu sezvo vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba kaviri vari kubatwa zvakasimba nehirwere ichi. Zim,babwe inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vese munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. VaNcube vakaudza paramende nezuro kuti mwedzi unouya kuchauya dzimwe nhomba mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu uye dzimwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu dzichauya muna Gunyana. Mune imweo nyaya kambani yeOld Mutual inoti homwe yekusimbudzira vechidiki yeKurera-Ukondla Youth iyo yainge yambomiswa ichatanga zvakare munguva pfupi inotevera pasi pehurongwa hutsva. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvevechidiki, mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muOld Mutual, VaIsaih Mashinya, vati homwe iyi yakamiswa muna 2014 sezvo yainge isiri kufamba sezvainge zvakatarisirwa. Homwe iyi yakaumbwa muna 2011 iine mamiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica uye payakamiswa vechidiki vainge vaine zvikwereti zvemamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana mana zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Asi vati zvichitevera danho rekumisa kushanda kwehomwe iyi pakati pekambani yavo nebazi rezvechidiki, vakabvumirana kuparadza komiti kana kuti Trust yafambisa homwe iyi kuitira kuti vatange patsva izvo zvavave kuita pari zvino. Vati Trust ine nhengo dzeOld Mutual nebazi revechidiki yakatoumbwa uye basa rayo radzorerwa mushaure nedenda reCovid-19. VaMashinya vati bhanga ravo reCABS ndiro richaramba richipa zvikwereti kune vechidiki asi rwendo runo zvikwereti izvi zvichange zvave mumaRTGs. Payatanga homwe yeKurera-Ukondla yaipa vechidiki zvikwereti zvinotangira pamadhora mazana mashanu kusvika pazviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica. VaMashinya vati Trust yakaumbwa kumutsiridza homwe iyi ndiyo ichagara pasi yoona kuti homwe iyi ichange iine marii pamwe nekuti vanhu vangapihwa zvikwereti zvakakura sei. Mukuru wesangano revechidiki reZimbabwe Youth Forum, VaAshton Bumhira, vuadza Studio7 kuti vanotarisira kuti homwe iyi ichapa mukana kune vechidiki mumatunhu ese munyika kuitira kuti vatange mabhizimizi. Pakamiswa homwe iyi vechidiki zviuru makumi maviri nezveviri ndivo vainge vanyorera kuCABS vachida zvikwereti asi vakabudirira vaive zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu. Pavanhu ava zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvinomwe kubva muzana vaive varume zvikamu makumi matatu nezvitatu vari vakadzi. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vaive vemuHarare, ichiteverwa neBulawayo uye Matabeleland South ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vakabatsirikana pasi pehomwe iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Mashoko eRBZ Oratidza Pachena Kuti Hupfumi hweNyika Hwananga kuMawere
text: Bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe rakaburitsa mashoko nemusi weChipiri anoratidza kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zviri kuramba zvichienda kumaziva ndadzoka. Izvi zviri kuonekwa kuburikidza nemari yakawanda iri kukweretwa nehurumende kubva kumabhanga emunyika, kushomeka kwemari iri kukweretwa nevemabhizimisi, uye kushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga zvopa kuti vamwe vashaye chivimbo nemabhanga acho. Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe inoti mari yakweretwa nehurumende kusvika pari zvino inosvika pamabhiriyoni manomwe ichikwira nezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana kusvika muna Chivabvu zvichienzaniswa negore rapera. Nekushomeka kwemari munyika kunyange hazvo pakaparurwa mabond notes, RBZ inoti vanhu vakawanda vave kushandisa Real Time Gross Settlement Transaction kana kuti RTGS. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvemari uye vachitungamira bato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vayambira kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende izvi kuzvisikira moto muziso. VaBiti vati mumabhanga hamuna mari zvopa kuti pashandiswe RTGS asi izvi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti kukwereta mari kuri kuitwa nehurumende uku hakuna kunaka. Ko mari iri kukweretwa nehurumende iyi inobva kupi chaizvo kana vemabhanga vachiti havana mari. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti hurumende iri kungotora mari yevanhu iri mumabhanga. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaLuxon Zembe, vanoti nyaya yekuti hurumende iri kukwereta mari yakawanda yave kuomesera vemabhizimisi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naDoctor Kanyenze avo vati hurumende iri kukwereta mari yekubhdhara vashandi vayo kwete kuita mabasa ebudiriro ari kudiwa munyika. VaZembe vatiwo kukweretwa kuri kuitwa mari nehurumende kuri kupawo kuti mutengo wekuti vemabhizimisi vakwerete mari udhure. VaBiti vatiwo kuti zvinhu zvifambe munyaya dzezvehupfumi, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanofanira kuona kuti mabhizimisi awaniswa mari yekuita mabasa. Kuyange hazvo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuti hurumende haifanire kukwereta mari, VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende hakuna kumwe kwainowana mari sezvo isingakwanise kukwereteswa mari neInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, neWorld Bank. Hurumende inoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi veIMF neWorld Bank vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Mhuri Dzowana Raramo neKugadzira Zvinodzivirira Covid-19
text: Panguva apo vakawanda vari kusiya mabasa vamwe vachienda kumamisha nekuda kwekuvhingidzwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19, dzimwe mhuri dziri kuwana raramo yakanaka nekugadzira mamasiki ayo dzinotengesa. Mumwe mugari wekuSunningdale muHarare, Baba Edson Masoramuvari kugadzira pamwe chete nemudzimai wavo mamasiki avari kutengesera kumakambani pamwe neveruzhinji. Baba Musora, avo vane makore makumi matanhatu nemasere ekuberekwa, vanoti kosi yavakaita yekusona yakavavhurira mukana pakatanga kuvharirwa vanhu mudzimba nekuda kwechirwere cheCOVID-19. Lockdown yauya hatina kusvika pakuitwa lockdown nepfungwa zvese. Takatanga kugadzira ma washable masks taona kuti acho ari kugadzira ari kutengeswa achingoraswa mubhini. VaMasora, avo vane vana vanomwe vanoti bhizimusi ravo riri kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwemamasiki avo anomhanyirwa neveruzhinji nekuda kwemagadziro akanaka avanoaita pamwe nemutengo wakachipa. Takawana contract yema 100 masks ku Joiner City. Nzira dzekuti zvinhu zvedu zvimhanye ndezvekutsvaga ma orders kubva kuma kambani. Ndizvo zvinoita kuti zvinhu zvedu zvifambe. Mudzimai wavo, Amai Jennifer Masora, vanoti dambudziko ravari kuona nderekuti mamasiki ane ngozi pahutano hwevanhu vane huchapa uye vachifarira akagadzirwa nemicheka ine mavara matema. Ma mask akanaka anotidzivirira COVID asi dambudziko randiri kuona pane vakawanda nderekuti havasati vakuita hutsanana. Unonyatsotarisa oona kuti mask iyi yaane mazuva haizivi kuwachwa. Ndiro dambudziko randiri kuona. Amai Masora vanoti kushingairira pane zvavari kuita kwayambutsa vakawanda. Iye zvino murairidzi chaiye ndinotomukunda kuita mari, kunyanya iyo nguva ino yakaoma kudai. Vese vari mumahofisi ndinovakunda kurarama. Handiende mu queue ku bhanga kunotora mari. Munhu anouya nejira rake ndomusonera, oenda ku bank ouya ondipa mari. Mumwe mudzimai ari kurarama nekutengesa mamaisiki, Amai Naomi Chinhaire, vanoti zvekuzarirwa mumba ne lockdown zvakavapa mazano avakanga vasingambofungiri. Ndinoshandisa ma tailors ekumakambani mahombe vanondipa pfungwa dzekugadzira zvinhu zvakakodzera zvekuti kana uri kunze uku zvinhu zvako zvinotengwa zvakanaka. Ndinoshandisa pattern nyowani yekuti munhu anotenga asingagunun’une. Amai Chinhaire vanoti mhuri yavo yatove neraramo inodarika yavaive nayo kutanga kwegore rino. Handidi kunyepa, zvinhu zvangu zviri kufamba. Dzimwe nguva ndinobuda mumba kuma seven kuseni ndoenda pandinongomira. Panguva diki diki zvinhu zvangu zvinenge zvapera. Pamwe ndinobuda ndine ma masks anosvika 50 asi ndinodzoka ese apera. VaTitus Doyce vanofarira zvigadzirwa zvemamasiki Amai Chinhaire. Ma mask aya tinoada nekuti unonyatsofema zvakanaka, uye kana uri pane vanhu vanenge vachingokubvunza kuti wakaiwana kupi. Kana wakaburitsa mari unofanira kugutsikana nechinhu chaunenge watenga. Pasi pemutemo weZimbabwe munhu wese anofanira kufamba akapfeka masiki kumeso kwake kana ari pane veruzhinji, senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Sangano rehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti mamasiki chinhu chinofanira kugara chakashambidzika uye haifaniri kuchinjanwa. No media source currently available

headline: Voruzhinji Vopiwa Mukana weKupa Pfungwa Dzavo paBhiri reRBZ Amendment Act
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, nhasi vamisa hurongwa hwavo hwekuda kupasisa muparamende bhiri reReserve Bank Ammendment Act iro rinogadzirisa kushandiswa kwemari yemaBond Notes nechimbichimbi uye vati vatora danho iri mushure mehurukuro dzavaita nevakuru veparamende pamwe nevebato rinopikisa reMDC. NeChitatu VaChinamasa vainge vakumbira paramende kuti zvinhano zvese zvinodiwa kuti bhiri ripasiswe zviitwe musi mumwechete asi nhasi vati vabvisa chikumbiro ichi pamberi pedare reNational Assembly. VaChinamasa vaita izvi mushure menhaurirano dzavaita nemutauriri weNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda, avo vabva vazivisa kuti komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari nebhajeti ichatenderera nyika yese svondo rinouya ichinzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pebhiri iri, iro rakanangana nekushandiswa kwemari yemaBond Notes. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC T zvakare vari mumiriri weKuwadzana East mudare reNational Assembly, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vano bvumirana nedanho ratorwa naVaChinamasa rekupa veruzhinji mukana wekupa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pebhiri iri. Vanoti hazvina kunaka kuti hurumende ityore bumbiro remutemo apo ine mutemo wainenge ichida kugadzira vachiti bumbiro rinosungira paramende kuti ipe vanhu mukana apo inenge ichiumba mutemo. Vati kunyange hazvo vachiziva kuti hurumende haiteerere kana kutambirwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vataure zvavanoda. Kunyange hazvo veRBZ vange vari kushambadza zvemaBond Notes, VaChamisa vati nhengo dzeparamende ndidzo dzine mvumo yekubvunzurudza vanhu vadzinomirira. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaMalvin Mukudu vanoti nyaya yekunzwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji yakanaka chose kunyage hazvo pfungwa dzacho dzisingazotevedzwi. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi vanoti danho ratorwa neparamende rakanaka chose uye ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa pese panoumbwa mutemo. Kunyange hazvo mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakashandisa simba ravo pasi pemutemo we Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) Act kuti maBond Notes ashandiswe zviri pamutemo, mutemo weRBZ Act unofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuti uenderane neizvi. Nyanzvi dzemutemo musangano reVeritas dzinoti kana RBZ Amendment Act ikapasiswa inotanga kushanda musi wakagazetwa mutemo wemaBond Notes nemutungamiriri wenyika, musi wa31 Gumiguru gore rino. Mutemo wePresidential Powers uri kupikiswa nevanhu nemasangano anoti unopikisana nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvoramba Zvichidhura Kunyangwe Hurumende Yakabvumidza Kutengwa kweZvimwe kuSouth Africa neDzimwe Nyika
text: Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yakabvumidza vanhu kuti vatenge zvinhu kubva kuSouth Africa, Botswana, Mozambique, Zambia nedzimwe nyika ichiti zvichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu munyika iderere, zvinhu zvinenge zvave kutowedzera mitengo zvimwe nezvikamu mazana mashanu kubva muzana zvapa kuti vanhu vaomerwe nehupenyu zvakanyanya. Sangano reZCTU rinoti kuti zvinhu zvinakire vashandi vave kutoda kuwedzerwa mari inodarika zvikamu mazana matanhatu kubva muzana. Zvinhu zvekudya, michovha, mari dzechikoro dzevana nezvimwe zvawedzerwa mitengo zvakanyanya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti chiri kupa kuti zvinhu zvidhure inyaya yekuti vanotenga zvinhu kunze vanotenga mari pamukoto vozodhurisa. Mutemo wekurambidza kutengwa kwezvinhu kunze wakambenge wadzikwa muna 2016 senzira yekusimudzira maindustry munyika. Asi huruemnde gore rapera yakazoti yave kutendera kuti zvimwe zvinhu zvitengwe kunze sezvo yaipomera vemabhizimisi mhosva yekudhurisa zvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekwaMutare Vochema Chema neKukwidzwa kweMitero muBhajeti reKanzuru
text: Vamwe vagari vekwaMutare vari kunyunyuta nemitero yavari kunzi vabhadhare nekanzuru yeguta iri iyo vanoti yakawandisa apo vazhinji vasiri kuenda kumabasa. Bhajeti regore rino nderemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematatu kana kuti US$33 million yekuAmerica kwete regore rapera raive remamiriyoni makumi matatu nerimwe emari yemunyika kana kuti US$31,1 million Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reMutare Residents and Ratepayers Association VaDavid Mutambirwa vanoti kanzuru yeMutare iri kuwedzera mitero sekunge isiri kuziva kuti hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka. VaMutambirwa vanoti bhajeti iri rakaitwa pasina kunzwa pfungwa dzevagari. Mukuru anoona nekufambiswa kwemabasa mune rimwe sangano revagari reUnited Mutare Residents and Ratepayers Trust, UMRRT VaEdison Mthulisi Dube vatiwo mitero yekunogara vazhinji nevekumisha yeshoroma yakanyanya kusiyana zvisineyi nekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyika. Meya weguta reMutare VaBlessing Tandi vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yavo inotosungirwa kuti ikwidze mitero kuti zvifambirane nezvinhu zvinenge zvichida kuitwa. Panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemutero wemvura, VaTandi vati mari yavakatara inokwana kuti vawanise vagari mvura nekutenga mishonga yekuichenesa. Vaimbove meya weguta reMutare uye vari muzvina mabhizinesi vaBrian Leslie James vanotiwo kukwidzwa kwemitero nekanzuru kunoshungurudza sezvo mabhizinesi asiri kushanda nemazvo panguva ino. VaJames vanoti vemabhizinesi vaifanirwa kunge vakaudzwawo kana kudeedzwa kumisangano iyi pasati paitwa chisungo chemitero ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimpapers Yoshorwa neKudzinga Vashandi Mabasa Zvisina Tsarukano
text: Masangano anomirira vatapi venhau munyika anoti haasi kufara nekudzingwa mabasa zvisina tsarukano kweshandi nekambani yeZimbabwe Newspapers uye masangano aya anoti achagara pasi nehurumende nechinangwa chekuti kambani iyi isiye katsika aka. Masangano aya, ayo ari pasi peMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe anoti anoshushikana zvikuru nekuti vashandi vekambani iyi vatatu vanoti, VaMunyaradzi Huni vanga vari mutevedzeri wemupepeti webepanhau rekambani iyi reThe Sunday Mail, nevamwe vakuru weimwe nhepfenyuro yekambani iyi yeCapiTalk VaNapoleon Nyanhi naMuzvare Ruvheneko Parirenyatwa vakadzingwa mabasa mazuva mashonana apfuura pasina zvikonzero zvakajeka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuZimpapers panyaya iyi asi vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti kudzingwa kwevatatu ava kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Zvinonzi mashandiro evatatu ava haana kufadza vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nemabatirwo akaikaitwa nyaya yevatatu ava. Vanoti vaitarisira kuti zvinhu zvichashanduka muhurumende itsva yaVaMnangagwa asi hapana chasanduka sezvo vatapi venhau vari kuramba vachidzvinyirirwa. VaNyamutumbu vakurudzirawo vatapi venhau kuti vaite basa ravo pachena vasina divi ravakarekera uyewo vati makambani ese ezvekutapwa kwenhau anofanira kuvhara kana asingade kuremekedza kodzero dzevatapi venhau dzavanopihwa nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Imwe nhengo yebhodhi rinomirira vapepeti venhau munyika reZimbabwe National Editors Forum, VaBarnabas Tondhlana vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa nekambani yeZimpapers hazvina kunaka. Vanoti kunyange mutapi wenhau akakanganisa anofanirawo kubatwa zvine hunhu kwete kubatwa sembwa. Media Alliance of Zimbabwe inoti zvaitwa neZimpapers zvinoratidza pachena kuti hurumende itsva iyi haina hurongwa hwekuti vatapi venhau vashande vakasununguka uye inoti zvakaoma kuti munhu aite mutapi wenhau muZimbabwe. Pakapinda VaMnangagwa panyanga muna Mbudzi gore rapfuura Zimpapers yakadzinga vamwe vatori venhau vaifungidzirwa kuti vainge vakarerekera kuvanhu vanonzi ndivo vaifurira vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaita sevaive gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro VaJonathan Moyo. Nhengo dzesangano reMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe dzinosanganisira masangano anoti Media Monitoring Project Zimbabwe, Media Institute of Southern Africa (Zimbabwe chapter), Zimbabwe Union of Journalists (ZUJ), Zimbabwe National Editors’ Forum (ZINEF), Gender and Media Connect (GMC), the Media Centre, the Zimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations (ZACRAS), the Voluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe (VMCZ) and the African Community Publishing Development Trust (ACPDT). No media source currently available

headline: Mhuri yeVaShona Iri muKenya Yotarisira Kuvhota Kekutanga neChipiri Kubva Zvayawaniswa Magwaro eKuve Zvizvarwa zveNyika iyi Muna 2020
text: Mhuri yeVaShona iri muKenya ichange ichivhota kekutanga musarudzo dzenyika dziri kuitwa nemusi weChipiri 09 Nyamavhuvhu 2022, mushure mekupiwa magwaro ekuve zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Mutauriri wemhuri yeVaShona iyi, VaOliver Muregerera, vanoti vari kufara zvakanyanya nekukwanisa kushandisa kodzero dzavo dzevhota sezvimwe zvizvarwa zvemuKenya, vachiti chinhu chakatarisirwa nevanhu vose. Vabereki vemhuri idzi vakapinda munyika yeKenya vachibva kuZimbabwe makore anodarika makumi matanhatu adarika vakagara pasi pehutungamiri hwakasiyanasiyana, asi hapana akakwanisa kuvapa magwaro aya, kusvikira mugore ra 2020 pavakazocherechedzwa nekupiwa magwaro aya nemutungamiri wenyika, VaUhuru Kenyatta. Mhuri dzingangoda kusvika kuzviuru zvina dzinonzi dzakakwanisa kunge dzichipiwa magwaro aya. VaMuregerera vanoti kuwaniswa magwaro uku hakuna kungovapa mukana wekuvhota chete, asi kuti vave kukwanisawo zvakare kuvhura mabhuku ekumabhanga, kukwereta mari kumabhanga, kuenda kuzvikoro zvepamusoro, nezvimwe zvakawanda. Vanotiwo nekuda kwekuti vave nemagwaro ekuve zvizvarwa zveKenya, vanotarisirawo kuti musarudzo dzichatevera vana vavo vari kuchikoro pari zvino vachazokwanisawo kukwikwidza muzvigaro zvakasiyanasiyana. No media source currently available

headline: Mushonga weCovid-19 Wakawanikwa Asi Zvichatora Nguva Kuti Usvike kuZimbabwe neDzimwe Nyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzavekutarisira kuti kuwanikwa kwemishonga yekurapa chirwere cheCovid-19 kuchabatsira kuti vanhu vasafe vakawanda pasi rose. Nemusi weMugovera vanoona nezvemishonga muAmerica veFood and Drug Administration kana kuti FDA vakapa mvumo kuti mushonga unonzi Regeneron wakapihwa mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump pavakarwa neCovid-19 uchitange kupihwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvikuru vana uye vakwegura. Mamwe makambani maviri akati agadzira nhomba yekurapa chirwere ichi anoti Pfizer ne Moderna akamirira kupihwa mvumo neFDA. Asi zviri kutarisirwa kuti zvichatora nguva kuti munhu wose abaiwe nhomba pasi rose sezvo mushonga wacho wakawandirwa. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti kuuya kuZimbabwe kuchatora nguva nekuti haisi nyika ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa kana kufa nechirwere ichi. Vati vanoona sekuti America, India, South Africa neBrazil ndidzo dzichatanga kuwana mushonga nekukasika. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira neMugovera kusvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe anezana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 9,172 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mashanu nevaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi havana nhoroondo yekubuda munyika uye vakawanda vacho vari muguta reBulawayo. Vanhu vari kurwara mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 672 uye pavanhu ava, mazana maviri negumi nevashanu vari muBulawayo, zana nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 164 vari kuMatabeleland North, Harare ine makumi masere nevatanhatu 76, Matabeleland South makumi matanhatu nevashanu uye Mashonaland East ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vari kurwara pamatunhu ose vanove gumi nevaviri. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemazana maviri ane makumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 8, 235 mushure mekunge vanhu gumi nemumwe vapora neMugovera. Vanhu vafa vachiri mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 265. Bepanhau reSunday Mail rinotiwo kutanga svondo rino National Institute of Health Research kana kuti (NIHR) ichapinda munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana mumadhorobha nemumaruwa ichiita ongororo yekuona kuti chirwere cheCovid19 charuura munzvimbo dzipi chaidzo. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi National Sero-Prevalence Survey for Covid-19 uye chichapetwa musi wa30 Zvita. Vanhu vari mudzimba zviuru zvimomwe mumatunhu makumi mashanu nemana dzichavhenekwa hutachona uhu. Mapurisa anotiwo achasimbaradza kusunga vasiri kupfeka zvekuzvidzivirira kana kuti maface mask. Vanhu zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana vanonzi vakasungwa kubva muna kurume pakatanga kupararira chirwere ichi munyika. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 49,121. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1, 7 million. South Africa ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu kana kuti 765 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemasere kana kuti 58 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica chete vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu kana kuti 256,000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri kana kuti 12 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemasere kana kuti 37 million.

headline: United Nation Population Fund Yokurudzira Zvirongwa Zvekubatsira VeChidiki Kuti Vasatapurirwe HIV
text: Bazi reUnited Nation Population Fund kana kuti UNFPA riri kukurudzira kuti mabasa ekuti vechidiki vasatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV asimbaradzwe kuitira kudzikisa huwandu hwevari kutapurirwa kana kuti prevalence rate huri pazvikamu gumi nezviga zvitanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 14,6%. Vachitaura mushure memusangano nemukuru wenational Aids Council Dr Tapuwa Magure, mukuru weUNFPA munyika Dr Ester Muia vakati kuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi, zvakakosha kuti vose vari mubasa iri vashande nevechidiki. VaMagure vakati hurumende yakazvipira kuzadzikisa kurudziro iyi. Mutauriri weNational Aids Council Amai Tadiwa Nyatanga-Pfupa vati sangano ravo rine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvekubatsira vechidiki. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti 2017 Richava Gore Rakaoma Zimbabwe Ikasavandudza Zvinhu
text: Gore rapera ra2016 igore range rakaomera vazhinji pamwe nehurumende. Munyika makaita dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari zvakapa kuti bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe riparure mari yemabond notes asi asiri kubatsira kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Hurumende yaitadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo mihoro paine nguva uye nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nematongerwo enyika dzinoti vanhu vanofanira kusunga dzisimbe nekuti 2017 igore richange rakaoma kudarika gore rapfuura. Hupfumi wenyika hauna kukura sezvange zvakatarisirwa uyewo mari yaitarisirwa kuwanikwa nehurumende yakadzikira zvakanyaya mugore richangopfura. Hurumende yakashandisa mari yakwanda kudarika mari yaya kawana izvo zvakaita kuti isare iine chikweretti chemadhora anodarika bhiriyoni. Zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri kubva muzana zvemari yehurumende zviri kuenda kumihoro yevashandi izvo zvopa kuti zvinhu zviomere hurumende. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kupinda munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzira muno kana kuti Statutory Instrument 64, nyika iri kuramba ichitenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kudarika zvainotengesa nekuda kwekuti maindasitiri haasi kushanda zvakanaka. Izvi ndezvimwe zvinonzi zvakakonzera kushaikwa kwemari munyika zvikazoita kuti Reserva Bank of Zimbabwe iunze mhando yemari yemaBond Notes muna Mbudzi wegore rapera. Mubhajeti ravo regore rino, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanotarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakura nechikamu chimwe nechidimbu kubva muzana (1.7percent) Vanonoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti ramangwana reZimbabwe harina kujeka nekuti zvese zvakakanganisika muna 2016 pamwe nevakazvikanganisa vachiripo uye havana shanduko yavari kuita. Vanoti vano bvumirana nemaonero emasangano akaita seInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank ekuti hupfumi hwenyika hucharamba huchidzikira mugore rinouya. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo VaChinamasa vane matanho avakaparura mubhajeti regore rinouuya ekukwezva vekunze kuti vauye kuzosima mari yavo muno pamwe nekusimudzira mabhizimisi havawoni izvi zvichiiitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvekunetsa kwemari. Vanotiwo zvikwereti zveZimbabwe kumasangano akaita se World Bank, African Developement Bank nedzimwe nyika ndizvowo zviri kutadzisa nyika kuwana mari yekusimudzira maindasitiri ayo. VaKuchera vanoti havaoni vemabhanga, masangano nenyika dzekunze vachisunungura homwe nekuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inoratidza kuti haisati yazvipira kuita zvinodiwa kuti ikwanise kutanga kukwereteswa mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vano bvumirana naVaKuchera vachiti kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro rwemari inofanira kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. Vanoti pari zvino Zimbabwe haikwanisi kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvino darika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora nekuti maindasitiri ayo haasi kushanda uyewo n nyaya yehuwori mukutengeswa kwezvicherwa. VaJohwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yemitemo isina kujeka pamwe nemakakatanwa ari mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF ndizvo zvimwe zviri kuvhiringa hupfumi hwenyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanotiwo nyaya dzematongerwo enyika asina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvikuru sei muZanu PF ndidzo dziri kuita vekunze vasauye munyika pamwe nekuti mabhizimisi emuno asashande zvakanaka. Vanoti semaonero avo kurwisana muZanu PF kuchaenderera mberi mubato iri gore rinouuya izvo vati zvichavhiringidza hupfumi zvakanyanya. Kunze kweizvi, munyori anoona nezvehupfumi mubato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai vachimirira Hatfield mudare reparamende, Dr Tapiwa Mashakada, vaudza Studio 7 kuti huwori ndiwo humwewo huri kuvhiringa mabasa ezvehupfumi munyika. Vanoti kana nyaya iyi ikasagadziriswa havawoni chinosanduka munyaya dzehupfumi mugore rinouuya. Asi vanomirira rimwe sangano remabhizimisi reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu vanoti vanoona sekuti gore rinouya rinenge rakanaka nekuda kwemitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende zvikuru sei mutemo wekudzivirira zvimwe zvinogadzirwa kunze westatutory instrument 64 pamwe nekushandiswa kwemaBond Notes. Asi vanoti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari rinofanira kugadziriswa.  Asi VaJohwa naVaKuchera vanoti maBond Notes haana zvanobatsira uyewo hurumende iri kutadza kutobhadhara vashandi vayo zvisinei nekuti pave kushandiswa maBond Notes. VaMashakada vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti vashandi vazhinji vehurumende vakatamba Kisimusi vasina mari dzavo vachiti kana maBond Notes acho haasikuwanikwa. Asi vanomirira Highfield West mudare reparamende VaPsychology Mazivisa veZanu-PF vanoti zvirango ndizvo zviri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugwadame. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi nematongerwo enyika dzinotiwo nyaya yesarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2018 ndiyo ichavhirindidza nyaya dzehupfumi uye vanofunga kuti vakunze nevamabhizimisi vanogona kumirira kusvika sarudzo idzi dzaitwa vasati varonga kuti vasime mari yavo munyika. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende yavo inoda chose kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rese pamwe nemasangano akaita seWorld Bank neIMF uye ndosaka yakaumba hwaro hwekuti ingabhadhare zvikwereti zvayo sei kumasangano aya nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano Rakazvimirira reCOTRAD Rombomiswa Kushanda neHurumende
text: Hurumende yambomisa sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reCommunity Tolerance and Reconciliation Development Trust kuita basa mudunhu reMasvingo ichiti inoda kuongorora kuti inemagwaro ari pamutemo here kuti inge ichishanda munyika. Ve Cotrad vanoti izvi zvine zvematongerwe enyika mukati sezvo sangano ravo ruchita basa rekurwira kodzero dzevanhu uye range richiteverwa kubva muna ndira pakamboita ratidziro yakavharisa nyika. Vachitaura ne Studio 7 VaBrighton Ramusi mushandi weCotrad vati vagamuchira tsamba kubva kuna mudzviti wedunhu reMasvingo VaRay Hove ichivaudza kuti vambomire basa. VaRamusi, avo vakambosungwa nevamwe vashandi vesangano iri muna Ndira vanoti hurumende yagara isingafaire basa ravanoita. Vatiwo zviri kuratidza kuti hurumende iripo haina hutongi hwejekere sezvo ichida kuvhara mikana yekushanda kumasangano anodzidzisa vanhu zvekodzero dzavo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri VaZivanai Muzorodzi vati kumiswa kushanda kwavaitwa kuchakanganisa zvikuru vashandi vavo. VaRamusi vaenderera mberi vachiti nyaya yemagwaro haisiriyo yavari kurambidzirwa sezvo vane gwaro re Notarial Deed of Trust ravakanyoresa kuhurumende muna 2012 rine nhamba dzinoti MA1050/2012. Vanoti uku kumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzavo sezvo vachipomerwa mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwe enyika uye vachinzi vanotsigira bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. VaRamusi vati havasi kuzopeta maoko kodzero dzavo dzichi mbunyikidzwa nekudaro vachaendesa hurumende kumatare. VaHove varamba kutipa chikonzero chavamisira Cotrad basa parunhare vachiti vange vakabatikana apowo gurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira vati vange vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi. Vati tizovafonere asi havana kuzobatika panharembozha yavo. Vanoona nezve matongerwe enyika vakazvimirira VaMasimba Gonese, vati hurumende yatotanga kushungurudza masangano ainofunga kuti anovapikisa. Vati uku ndiko kutanga kwekuvharwa kwemasangano akazvimirira sekuzadzikisa mashoko akataurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuMwenezi. Hurumende inopomera masangano akazvimirira mhosva yekushanda nemapato anopikisa kuda kuipidigure nechisimba. Mugore ra 2013 hurumende yakambovharisa masangano akazvimirira makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe mudunhu reMasvingo. No media source currently available

headline: Kurohwa kwaCharles Manyuchi Kwoshamisa Vanhu Vakawanda muNyika
text: Vatsigiri vemitambo muZimbabwe vari kutyamadzwa nemaroverwo akaitwa Charles Manyuchi mumutambo wake wekudzivirira bhande rake resirivha reWorld Boxing Council. Nhanhasi vatsigiri vemitambo muZimbabwe vari kukatyamadzwa nezvakaitika kuna Charles Manyuchi uyo akadamburwa maminitsi maviri nemasekonzi makumi mashanu nematanhatu munharaunda yekutanga na Quadratillo Abduqaxarov weku Uzbekistan ndokutorerwa bhande rake reWorld Boxing Council resirivha. Mifananidzo yemutambo uyu yazara murunhare mbozha dzevakawanda muZimbabwe avo vasiri kunyatsobvuma kuti ndiManyuchi wavanoziva here uyo ari kupunzirwa pasi zvisina tsarukano. Vamwe ndivo vari kuti Manyuchi aive asina kunyatsogwinya zvekunorwa mumutambo uyu. Vamwewo ndivo vari kutaura zvimwe, vachinenedzera nyaya dzekubheja zvisiri pamutemo. Asi chokwadi ndechekuti Manyuchi haasisina bhande raaive anaro resirivha. Mutsigiri wemutambo wetsiva VaRobert Mupanduki vanoti vari kurwadzikana zvikuru kuti Manyuchi haasisina bhande iri sezvo vanga vachitarisira kuti gore rino aizotora bhande repamusoro soro regoridhe iro rina Keith Thurman wekuAmerica. Asi Manyuchi uyo ane makore makumi maviri nema achiri nenguva yekukwanisa kugadzirisa paasina kuita zvakanaka, nekurwira, pamwe nekutora bhande rake zvekare. Zvakamira zvakadai. Vatsigiri venhabvu havasi kufara zvekare mushure mekubuda muNational Sports Stadium nezuro vachigunun’una nematambiro akaita chikwata chemaWarriors icho chakaita mangange 0-0 neZambia mumutambo wekuedzana masimba. Chokwadi ndechekuti Zambia ingadai yakakunda nezvibodzwa zvakawandisa dai vasina kutambisa mikana yavakawana uyezve dai pasina mubati wepagedhe wemaWarriors Edmore Sibanda uyo akamuka chibhebhenenga. Asi murairidzi wemaWarriors Norman Mapeza anoti achitarisa kuti chikwata chake chakagadzirira kwemazuva maviri chete vatambi vake vakaita nepese pavanogona. Mapeza akawedzera uye kuti kusauya kwevamwe vatambi vaaive ashavedza pamutambo uyu kwakakanganisa zvekare marongero ake. Asi mumusha weCaps United mune mafaro mushure mekunge maGreen Machine akatora mukombe weZimbabwe National Army Charity Shield, svondo rimwechete vachangobudirira kupinda mumini league stage yeCaf Champions League. Makepekepe akarova Highlanders 3-2 nemapenareti mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 1-1. Mutsigiri wemaGreen Machine VaMunyaradzi Goro vanoti zvanga zviri pachena kuti Makepekepe anodambura Highlanders. Mukukunda uku, Caps United yakawana mari inoita zviuru gumi nezviviri. Highlanders yakatambidzwa zviuru zvisere zvemadhora.

headline: ZIBAWU Inoti Standard Bank Haina Chido cheKusimudzira Nyika
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga, re Zimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, rinoti Standard Bank iri kuvhara mabhanga ayo mumaguta madiki akaita se Hwange, Chiredzi, Chinhoyi nemamwe, nekuti bhanga iri haridi kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibudirire. Mashoko aya anotevera mashoko ebhanga iri ekuti riri kuvhara mabhanga aro mumaguta madiki nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vavo vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemabasa nepamusoro pemaitiro ebhanga iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reStandard Bank. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Vashandi Vakawanda Vogumurwa Mabasa
text: Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti nyaya yekudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi uye kushaikwa kwemari yave kupa kuti vashandi vakawanda munyika varasikirwe nemabasa. VaMutasa vanoti huwandu hwevashandi vari kuuya kusangano ravo nenyaya dzekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika hwawandisa. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaHenry Ruzvidzo, uye mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vakaudza Studio7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri. Vaviri ava vakatiwo huwandu hwezvinhu zviri kugadzirwa mumaindasitiri hwadzikira zvakanyanya nematambudziko akatarisana nenyika Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, sezvo vati vange vari kumusangano kuNyanga. Kurasikirwa nemabasa kuri kuitwa nevamwe vashandi kunoreva kuti huwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa hwakira kubva pahwakange huri gore rapera. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemabasa nehupfumi dzinoti vanhu vasina mabasa muZimbabwe vava kudarika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Vagara Vari Munyika Hwoshusha Nyanzvi dzeZvehutano
text: Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vasina nhoroondo yekubuda munyika vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 kunonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano chinhu chinofanirwa kuvhundutsa hurumende pamwe neveruzhinji kuti patorwe matanho nekukasika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ebazi rezvehutano akabuda nemusi weChina ekuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika hwakanga hwakwira kusvika pachiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri, kana kuti 1 362 pakupera kwezuva. Bazi iri rinoti huwandu uhwu hwakakwira zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 273, vaine chirwere ichi, mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 260, vari vanhu vagara vanga vari munyika, gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13, vari vanhu vakadzoka munyika kubva kunze. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa munyika hwakakwira kusvika pamakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 23, uye vapora vave mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevashanu, kana kuti 425. Vanhu vakaongororwa kana vaine chirwere ichi nemusi weChina vaisvika chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 1 551. Dunhu rinonzi rine vanhu vakawandisa vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi idunhu reBulawayo, iro rine vanhu vanosvika mazana mana negumi nevapfumbamwe, 419, richiteverwa neHarare ine vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 389. Pave nekutyirwa kuti sezvo guta reBulawayo riine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa vaine chirwere ichi, rinogona kunge risina kugadzirira zvakakwana kuchengeta vanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine Covid-19 ava. Asi zvipatara zviviri zvakagadzurudzwa mazuva apera aya kuti zvitambire varwere veCovid-19 zvinoti Thorngrove ne Ekusileni, zvinonzi zvatanga kushanda. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematatu nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 13.8 million vabatwa pasi rose, vafa vachidarika mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe ezviuru kana kuti 590 000. MuAmerica chete, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3.5 million vabatwa nacho uye vafa vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvisere kana kuti 138 000. South Africa, iyo inove ine vanhu vakawandisa muAfrica vane Covid-19, uye iri muvakidzani weZimbabwe, yave nevanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nezvina kana kuti 324 000 vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muSouth Africa vasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 4 669. Vazhinji vevanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine covid-19 vachibva kunze kwenyika vari kubva kuSouth Africa. Doctor Gilson Mandigo, avo vari muHarare, vanoti havasi vose vari kubva kunyika iyi vari kupinda nepamiganho iri pamutemo, sezvo kuine vamwe vari kusvetuka muganhu vachipinda munyika vasina kuvhenekwa. Vanoti izvi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zviri kuwedzera dambudziko iri munyika sezvo hurumende isingazokwanisa kuziva kuti apinda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo ndeupi. Doctor Mandigo vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa mutemo wekusafambafamba, zvikuru kurambida vanhu vanobva mumatunhu ane dambudziko guru rechirwere ichi kuti vasashanyira dzimwe nzvimbo. Hurumende iri kukurudzirwawo kuti iwedzere kuvhenekwa kwevanhu vagara vari munyika, zvikuru vari kumaruwa, uko kunoshanyirwa nevakawanda vanobva mumadhorobha nemaguta ane vanhu vari kubatwa vaine chirwere che covid-19. Vanotiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuita bandiko ravo kuburikidza nekupfeka zvekuvhara miromo nemhino kana kuti ma mask, kugeza maoko avo nesipo pamwe nekukoshesa nyaya yesiya mikaha pakati pavo uye kusangoungana. Doctor Mandigo vari kukurudzirawo hurumende kuti kana yodzamisa mutemo wekurambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu iisewo mukana wekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuwana chekudya, vachiti panogona kuzoguma pave nedambudziko rekufa kwevanhu nenzara, kwete necovid-19. Asi vanoti mitengo yezvekuvhara miromo nemhino iri pamusoro zvakanyanya muzvitoro zviri kutengesa, vakati dai pawanikwa zvinokwanisa kuwachwa kana zvashandiswa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasarasikirwa nemari yakawanda.  No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikaka neMadzimai Ari Kufa Achisununguka Vana
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chinogona kunge chapa kuti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka huti wedzerei. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvevana reUNICEF muna 2019, inoratidza kuti madzimai mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 462 pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vanofa vachisungunuka muZimbabwe. Huwandu uhu hwange hwakati derere pane madzimai mazana matanhatu negumi nevana kana kuti 624 vaifa vachisungunuka pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 muna 2017. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai reWomen’s Action Group, Amai Edna Masiiwa, vanoti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka hwakaderera asi kufa kwemudzimai kana mumwe chete kunoshungurudza. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kugara kure nezvipatara kunopa kuti hupenyu hwemadzimai huve munjodzi sezvo vachizosvika pakuda kusungunuka vasati vavhenekwa nachiremba sezvinokurudzirwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Tonotenda Michael Simemeza vatiwo zvimwe zvinokonzera kufa kwemadzimai zvinosanganisira denda remoyo uye zvimwe zvirwere zvinotapuriranwa pabonde. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vakurudzirawo zvakanyanya varume kuti vapote vacheperekedzana nemadzimai avo kuenda kumakiriniki kuti vanzwe zvinenge zvichitaurwa navanachiremba zvinozobatsira kuti madzimai asungunuke nyore. Vatiwo nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19, hurumende dzakawanda kusanganisirawo yeZimbabwe hadzichakoshese hutano hwemadzimai akazvitakura nezvimwe zvirwere. Mukuyedza kubatsira madzimai akazvitakura munyika yeZimbabwe, sangano reUnited Nations Population Fund kana kuti UNFPA, rakanyorerana chibvumirano nenyika yeJapan chekubatsira nemari inosvika miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana matatatu emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti USD1,3 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, vachishanda nesangano reUNFPA, Dr Edwin Mpeta vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira zvipatara nemakiriniki zvemumaguta eHarare neBulawayo sezvo muri imo makaonekwa kuti mune madzimai akawanda ari kufa achisungunuka. Doctor Mpeta vanoti zvipatara nemakiriniki zvichatengerwa zvinoshandiswa pakubatsira madzimai akazvitakura uye nezvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kweCovid 19 pakati pemadzimai akazvitakura nevakoti navanachiremba. UNFPA inoti pagore, madzimai zviuru gumi nezvishanu kana kuti 15, 000 vanosungunuka kuBulawayo ukuwo vamwe zviru makumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 45, 000 vachisungunuka muHarare. Pamadzimai ose aya, zviuru mapfumbamwe kana kuti 19, 000 vanoda kuvhiyiwa uye vachabatsirwa nemari yabva kuJapana iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala Vanoti Mota dzePOLAD Kutenda Vatsigiri vaVaMnangagwa Vasina Zvido zveRuzhinji
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC Alliance VaJob Sikhala vanoti motokari dzakapihwa vatungamiri vemapato madiki anopikisa vari mugungano rePolitical Actors Dialogue kana kuti POLAD kutenda vavanoti vari kushandiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kudzorera hutongi hwejekerere kumashure. Asi mutauriri werimwe bato riri mugungano iri reNational Constitutional Assembly VaMaddock Chivasa vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti nhengo dzePOLAD dzipihwe dzimotokari dzekushandisa mukuunza kubatana munyika. Nyaya yekuti hurumende yakatengera vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa ari mugungano rePOLAD zvikakarara zvemotokari dzemhando yeIsuzu D-Max izvo zvipatara zvakawanda zvisina mishonga, madhorobha akawanda asina maamburenzi yakonzerawo mutauro munyika. MuHarare semuenzaniso munonzi amburenzi nhanhatu pachidiwa makumi matatu nembiri uye vanhu vanoda kusvika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana vachinzi vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. Vari muPOLAD vanoti gungano iri rinobatsira asi vamwe vanopikisa vachiti riri kungopfukutawo mari yenyika uye harina meno. Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance harisi mumubatanidzwa uyu kunyangwe vamwe vakuru mubato reMDC-T rinotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora vari kuti vanenge vave mugungano iri mavhiki anotevera. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Youmba Hwaro hweKudzora Dhora reZimbabwe
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hurumende inofanira kusunga dzisimbe muhurongwa hwayo hwekugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi kunyanyawo dambudziko rekuti nyika yoshandisa mari ipi sezvo ikozvino iri sarura ude. Nezuro gavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya vakazotenda kuti huremu hwedhora rekuAmerica nemari yemabond notes uye yemaRTGS hauna kufanana. Vakabva vabatanidza mari mbiri idzi kuita yavanoti RTGS Dollars danho riri kuonekwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi sehurongwa hwekuda kudzosa dhora reZimbabwe. Nyika yakagumisira kunyatsoshandisa mari yayo muna 2009 mushure mekunge mitengo yezvinhu yatanga kuita chamurambamhuru. Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakatozivisa kuti vanoda kudzora dhora remunyika mukati megore. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumu Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke vakambova chipangamazano chevatungamiri venyika yeAmerica vanoti kudzora dhora reZimbabwe hakushande nekuti nyika iyi ine nhoroondo yekusatevedzera zvinoda kuitwa pamutemo kuti mari yayo ive nehuremu hwakafanira. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari vari nhengo yeMDC VaTendai Biti vanoti zvitori nani kuti Zimbabwe ishandise mari yemarands. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzira zvakawanda zvekutengesa kunze isati yafunga zvekudzora dhora reZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vane Mari yeKunze Votadza Kuiisa Mumabhanga Mamwe muZimbabwe
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema kuti vari kurasikirwa nemari yakwanda sezvo maForeign Currency Accounts (FCA) avakavhuriswa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe asingakwanise kuti vatumire mari yekunze kune mamwe mabhanga mukati menyika, vachiti mari iyi inosvika yave mabhondi notsi. RBZ yakaudza mabhanga ese munyika kuti apatsanure maAccounts evanhu vese kuitira kuti pave neNostro FCA iyo inopinda mari yekunze, neRealtime Gross Settlement kana kuti RTGS FCA NOSTRO, inoshandisa mabhondi. Asi vanhu vanoti ukatumira mari yekunze kubva kuNostro FCA kuenda kune imwe Nostro FCA kune rimwe bhanga, mari iyi inosvika yave maBondi Notes. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndemumwe mudzimai ati anonzi Amai Shumba avo vanoti havana kupihwa tsanangudzo inogutsa apo mari yavakatumirwa nemwana wavo kubva mubhanga rake achishandisa Nostro FCA yakasvika yave mabhondi. Vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira nhengo dzeparamende vanotiwo havazivi kuti sei izvi zviri kuitika kana RBZ ichiti pave nema Accounts anoshandisa mari yekunze chete. Vanoongorora zvehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kuti zviri pachena kuti vanhu vari kurasikirwa nemari dzavo nekutikuti RBZ yakaisa mutemo isina kuita gadziriro yakakwana. Mumwe mukuru mune rimwe bhanga uyo aramba kudomwa nezita rake sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau audza Studio7 kuti izvi zviri kuitika nekuti pari zvino hapana hwaro hwekuti mari yekunze ibve kune rimwe bhanga ichienda kurimwe ichisvika yakadaro. Ati pane vanhu vakawanda vari kuuya kubhanga ravo vachichema uye vari kudzorera mari kwadzinenge dzabva kune vaya vanenge vasingade kutambira mabhondi notes. Gavhuna weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vanoti vanoziva nezvedambudziko iri uye bhanga ravo riri kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Vanoti bhanga ravo rave nehurongwa hweDomestic Inter Bank Nostro FCA Settlement System uhwo huchaita kuti mari inenge yabva kune rimwe banga ari madhora ekuAmerica, isvike kune rimwe bhanga ari madhora ekuAmerica izvo zvisiri kuitika pari zvino. VaMangudya vanoti vakaita izvi mushure mekuteerera zvichemo zvakabva kune veruzhinji, mizinda inomirira nyika muno pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. VaMangudya vanoti hurongwa uhwu hunotarisirwa kutanga kushanda mukati memasvondo maviri ari kutevera

headline: Chinhoyi University of Technology Inonzi Yave Kumanikidza Vadzidzisi, Vadzidzi neVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Chikoro chikuru cheChinhoyi University of Technology -CUT- chiri kurambidza vadzidzi nevashandi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kupinda pachikoro. Vadzidzi avo vanga vauya kuzopedza zvidzidzo zvavo pamwe nekunyora bvunzo nemusi weMuvhuro vakashamisika vachinzi vaburitse kadhi rinoratidza kuti vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kuti vabvumirwe kupinda pachikoro. Mumwe mudzidzi asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti arambidzwa kupinda pachikoro achinzi haana kubayiwa nhomba audza Studio 7 kuti anoti chanyanya kumurwadza ndechekuti havana kunge vayambirwa nezvedanho iri. Munyori anoona nezvemagariro evadzidzi musangano rinomirira vadzidzi pachikoro ichi VaFrancis Nhete vanoti danho ratorwa nechikoro rakanaka sezvo vachiwirirana naro sevatungamiri vevadzidzi. Mutauriri weCUT Dr Tapera Musekiwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira vamwe vadzidzi nevashandi. VaTapera vanoti vabva vaisa nhomba pakiriniki yechikoro kuti zvive nyore kune vanenge vasarudza kubayiwa.Zvikoro zvakawanda zvepamusoro zvakatozivisa kuti vadzidzi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 havabvumirwe kudzidza kana kunyora bvunzo nevamwe. Asi danho iri riri kupikisawa nesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinoti kuita izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo. Gore rapera muna Mbudzi, chikoro cheCUT chakambovharwa mushure mekunge vadzidzi makumi mashanu nevanomwe vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Kongiresi dzeMatunhu eMDC Dzovhiringidzwa neKurwisana kweNhengo dzeBato
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa riri kuita misangano yekongiresi mumatunhu aro maduku ose, kana kuti ma district, risati rapinda mumakongiresi ematunhu makuru, kana kuti ma province. Kana rapeta misangano yematunhu iyi, bato iri rinozoita kongiresi yaro huru yenyika yose mwedzi unouya. Misangano yekongiresi iyi iri kushandiswa kusarudza hutungamiri hwematunhu aya kuburikidza nekuita sarudzo, idzo dzinokwikwidzana nhengo dzebato iri. Asi zvinonzi misangano mizhinji yaitwa kusvika pari zvino haisi kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwemhirizhonga, iyo iri kuona nhengo dzebato iri dzichirwisana zvinotyisa, zvekusvika pakukuvadzana. Kurwisana uku kunonzi kuri kuitika pakati pezvikwata zvinonzi zviri kutsigira vanotarisirwa kukwikwidzana pakongiresi huru, mutungamiri webato VaNelson Chamisa, nemunyori mukuru webato, VaDouglas Mwonzora. Mukupera kwesvondo, kurwisana uku kwakakanganisa sarudzo dzedunhu reChitungwiza, uko dzimwe nhengo dzinonzi dzakakuwara zvakaipisisa uye mapurisa akatosungawo vanhu vane chitsama vanosanganisira mumiriri weZengeza East muparamende, VaGoodrich Chimbaira. Kudunhu reChegutu kunonzi kwakaitawo kuriwsana, izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vana vasungwe nemapurisa, kuchitiwo kumatunhu eMasvingo, Sanyati neNorton kunonzi sarudzo dzakatadza kuenderera mberi zvakanaka nekuda kwemhirizhonga. Vamwe vanoti kusagadzikana kuri mubato iri ndiko kwakakonzera kuti rikundwe musarudzo ye by-election kuBulawayo, uko MDC yakakundwa neZanu PF. Vamwe muMDC vanoti kusagadzikana kuri mubato ravo kwakakonzerwa neZanu PF, iyo vanoti yakadira mari yekukanganisa kongiresi yavo, chiitiko chakarambwa neZanu PF. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti kunyange hazvo nhengo dzavo dzakarwisana, zvinovafadza ndezvekuti hapana kudeuka kweropa kwakaitika. VaMafume vanoti bato ravo riri kuongorora nyaya dzemhirizhonga mumatunhu matatu, uye vanenge vawanikwa vaine mhosva vachatorerwa matanho anokodzera. asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerukira kubato reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti kurwisana kuri kuitika mubato rinopikisa iri mucherechedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvichina kumira zvakanaka. Vanoti kupatsanuka kuri kuita MDC hakuna kutanga nhasi, zvekuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe zvatove kuvasemesa. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoshora Mhirizhonga Yakaitika muBato Ravo reMDC-T
text: Mutungamiriri weMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai vashoropodza mhirizhonga yakaitika kumahofisi ebato ravo kuBulawayo neSvondo uko kwakarohwa vamwe vatungamiri vebato iri. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, VaTsvangirai vati zvinosuwisa kuti mafaro avo ekubatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa vachiumba MDC Alliance agurisirwa panzira nekuda kwemhirizhonga yakaitika iyi. VaTsvangirai vati havadi zvemhirizhonga mubato ravo, vakati kunyangwe zvazvo mapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi, ivo sebato vari kuitawo tsvagiridzo dzavo. Vati kana pane nhengo dzavo dzakakonzera mhirizhonga iyi dzicharangwa nebato ravo zvakaomarara. Vakarohwa kuBulawayo vanosanganisira mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nasachigaro webato iri VaLovemore Moyo. Vatungamiri ava vaive vasipo pakaparurwa mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa neMugovera. Vachibvunzwa kuti vatungamiriri vebato reMDC vari kuwirirana here nezvemubatanidzwa, VaTsvangirai vati vakaita chibvumirano sebato chinosunga vatsigiri nehutungamiriri hwese. Mhirizhonga yakaitwa kubato reMDC T iyi yasvorwawo zvikuru nemasangano ano kurudzira runyararo munyika. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko vati havatarisire kuti kusawirirana mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika kugadziriswe nemhirizhonga kunyanya nyika yadongorera sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa gore rinouya. Kunyangwe zvazvo VaTsvangirai vati bato ravo hari kurudziri mhirizhonga, Muzvare Mukoko vati matanho achatorwa nebato reMDC-T kune vakaita mhirizhonga ndiwo acharatidza kuti bato iri rakamira papi panyaya yemhirizhonga. MDC T yakabatana nemamwe mapato matanhatu nemugovera kuumba mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance, uyo uchakwikwidzana neZanu PF musarudzo dza 2018 uchi tungamirirwa naVatsvangirai. Mutungamiri weMDC-T uyu atiwo vanhu vakaita mhirizhonga iyi vanoda kusvibisa zita rebato pamwe nemubatanidzwa uyu asi vati izvi hazvisi kuzobudirira. No media source currently available

headline: Harare Residents Trust Yoshushikana neKutyisidzirwa kweVagari Vane Zvikwereti
text: Sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust rinoti harisi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nekanzuru yeguta reHarare rekushandisa kambani yeWell Cash mukutevera zvikwereti zviri muvagari. Kanzuru yakapa basa iri kukambani yeWell Cash mushure mekukundikana kuwana mari dzayo dzinodarika mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora iri mumapazi ehurumende, makambani pamwe nevagari. Sachigaro webhodhi reHarare Residents Trust, VaRobert Mazula, vanoti danho iri riri kutyisidzira vagari uye kuti kanzuru haisi kunzwisisawo matambudziko akatarisana nevagari. Vanotiwo iyo kanzuru pachayo haisi kukwanisa kuwanisa vagari zvainofanirwa kunge ichivawanisa zvakaita semvura yakachena, kutakurwa kwemarara uye kufambiswa zvakanaka kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina. Kambani yeWell Cash inonzi iri kupa vagari maawa makumi mana nemasere ekuti vange vabhhadhara zvikwereti zvavo kukanzuru, kukundikana kwavo votorerwa midziyo kana kuendeswa kujeri kana vasina midziyo inoenderana nezvikwereti zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Voratidzira muHarare
text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa neChipiri vanopfuura mazana matatu vakaratidzira mu Harareku nyangwe hazvo mapurisa akayedza kuvarambidza kusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kudare reparamende. Vairatidzira ava vaipika kuti havasi kuzobvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa mavanoshandira pakati peguta kana hurumende isati yavapa nzvimbo dzekushandira dzakanaka. Varatidziri ava vakatangira kuratidzira pakatarisana nemahofisi ekanzuru yeHarare pana Rezende ndokupinda muna Nelson Mandela vakananga kuparamende apo pavazomiswa nemapurisa panosangana Nelson Mandela na Julius Nyerere kwenguva inokwana awa imwe chete mapurisa achiramba kuti varatidziri ava vaendese gwaro ravo renyunyuto kuparamende. Asi apo mapurisa ainge ari pakati pekurambidza varatidziri kuenderera mberi, mumwe wevanga vachitungamira varatidziri ava, VaJustice Munayi ,vanove munyori mubhodhi rerimwe remasangano anga achiratidzira aya re National Vendors Union Zimbabwe, kana NAVUZ, vakaudza varatidziri ava kuti sevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa havasi kuzofa vakabvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa musi weChishanu uyo wakatarwa nehurumende kuti vange vabva mumigwagwa. Zvakataurwa naVaMunayi zvakatsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weNAVUZ, VaSamuel Wadzai. Mumwe wevanga vachiratidzira ava uye vari nhengo yeMDC-T inomirira Bulawayo East muparamende, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kutanga yagadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti vanhu vari kutengesera mumigwagwa vawane mabasa. Varatidziri ava vakazobvumirana nemapurisa aya ainge akatakura zvombo kuti gwaro renyunyuto ravanga vainaro riendeswe kuparamende nevanhu vana chete uye kuti vamwe vese vasare vakamira panosangana Nelson Mandela na Julius Nyerere pavasara vachiimba zvakaomarara. Kuratidzira uku kunouyawo apo dare repamusoro ranga rabvumidza vanhu ava kuratidzira mushure mekunge mapurisa ange aramba neMuvhuro kuti vaenderere mberi nekuratidzira nyangwe zvazvo mapurisa akambenge abvuma. Zvichakadaro, sangano re Zimbabwe Informal Sector Organization kana kuti ZISO rasvitsawo gwaro renyunyuto kugurukota rinoona nezvematunhu, VaIgnatious Chombo. Sangano re Ziso riri kuda kuti hurumende isiyane nehurongwa hwayo hwekuda kudzinga vanotengesera mumigwagwa uye kuti igare pasi nevemasangano anomirira vanhu vese ava kuti vawirirane nzira dzokuti nyaya iyi yogadziriswa sei. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vochemachema neKushomeka kweMotokari dzeKanzuru Yavo Dzinotakura Varwere
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vari kuchema-chema nekushomeka kwemotokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere, kana kuti maamburenzi, dzinova idzo dzine muripo uri nani zvichienzaniswa nedzemakambani akazvimirira. VaTaurai Zviripamwoyo, avo vakarwarirwa mazuva mashoma achangodarika, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dziine muripo uri nani, hadziwanikwi zviri nyore. VaZviripamwoyo vanoti mamwe makambani ane motokari dzinotakura varwere akazvimirira anodhura zvakanyanya. Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe zvakare mugari wemuHarare, VaTanatsiwa Dambuza, vati kodzero yehutano iri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika haigoni kuzadzikiswa kana vagari vasiri kuwana motokari dzinotakura varwere dzine muripo uri pasi sedzekanzuru yeHarare. VaDambuza vakurudzira kanzuru kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri. Meya veguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vatendawo kuti motokari dzinotakura varwere muguta ishoma zvakanyanya vachiti pari zvino dzinogona kunga dziri nomwe kana sere. Vawedzerawo vachiti kanzuru yavo ichange ichizeya nezvenyaya yekushomeka kwemotokari dzinotakura varwere kuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti imotokari ngani dzingakwanira kanzuru, VaMafume vati kanzuru inoda mota dzinotakura varwere makumi maviri neshanu. Tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti motokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere ndidzo dzine mutengo yepasi inogonekwa nevagari vasina mari yakawanda. Pari zvino motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dzinobhadharisa makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$20.00, vagari vachitenderwa kubhadhara nemari yemunyika. Ukuwo, makambani akazvimiririra achibhadarisa varwere mari inogona kusvika kuzana remadhora kana kuti US$100.00, kutakura murwere panguva yega yega. No media source currently available

headline: Mnangagwa Uyu Ndiyani Chaizvo?
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kutevera zviri kuitika muZanu PF vanoti sezvo makakatanwa anga ari mubato iri ari kuratidza kunge apera, maziso avo ava pagurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka kumutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Vanhu ava vanoti kufumurwa kwakaitwa Amai Mujuru nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, svondo rino kunoratidza kuti Amai Mujuru nechikwata chavo chinonzi changa chichivatsigira kuti vazotore masimba kana VaMugabe vasiya basa, havachina rakajeka muZanu PF. Izvi zvinonzi nenyanzvi dzematongerwo enyika zvinosiya VaMnangagwa vari vega nechikwata chavo chinonzi chiri kuvatsigira kuti vatore masimba. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute uye vachiongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaPedzisai Ruhanya, vanoti VaMnangagwa munhu anokudza VaMugabe uye munhu anoonekwa sekunge asingadi kushanda nevanonzi vavengi venyika, zvinhu zvinodiwa naVaMugabe. VaRuhanya vanoti VaMnangagwa vanotoonekwa semwana naVaMugabe uye vanoti hapana musiyano pakati pevarume vaviri ava pamaitiro avo. Vamwe vanotiwo VaMnangagwa munhu anotyiwa zvikuru neveruzhinji uye vanofanira kuzvichenura zvikuru tikatarisa kuurayiwa kwakaitwa vanhu vakawanda kumatunhu eMatabeleland ne Midlands panguva yeGukurahundi. Munguva iyi VaMnangagwa ndivo vaive gurukota raiona nezvevasori, iro raikokera mabasa ekusora pane zvose zvaitika mumhirizhonga yenguva yeGukurahundi. Nyanzvi yezvematongerwo enyika inotaura yakazvimirira, VaBlessing Vava, vanotiwo nyaya yekuGurukurahundi nedzimwe inyaya dzinosvibisa zita raVaMnangagwa. VaVava vanoti VaMnangagwa vakaita rombo rakanaka rekuitwa mumwe wevatevedzeri vaviri vemutungamiri webato, kanawo kuzoita mutungamiri wenyika mune remangwana, vanofanira kutsvaga nzira dzekuzvichenura kana zvavanopomerwa ari manyepo. Vari kuita ongororo yezvemapato akarwira rusununguko rwenyika, VaTjenesani Ntungagwa, vanoti kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vakaenda kuhondo vakasviba zvekuti havakodzeri kupihwa chigaro chepamusoro soro mubato iri. Asi VaRuhanya vanoti nyaya yeGukurahundi handi yaVaMnangagwa chete asi kuti ndeye vanhu vese vaive muhurumende panguva iyoyo kusanganisira VaMugabe naAmai Mujuru. VaRuhanya navaVava vanoti VaMnangagwa munhu agara chose muZanu PF uye munhu anonzwana naVaMugabe kunyange hazvo vakambotosvorana muna 2004 apo VaMnangagwa vanonzi vakamboedza kuda kutora masimba vachishanda nechipangamazano chavo, VaJonathan Moyo, avo vaive gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko panguva iyi. VaMnangagwa, avo vanozivikanwa nerekuti Ngwena, vakaberekwa kuZvishavane kuMidlands muna 1949. Vakadzidzira zvehondo kuChina muna 1963 vakapedzawo zvidzidzo zvehugetwa kuZambia muna 1974. Vakatanga zvematongerwo enyika mubato reZimbabwe African People's Union pasati patangwa bato reZanu PF muna 1963. VaMnangagwa vakashanda vari pedyo naVaMugabe, kuhondo uyewo kubvira pakawana nyika rusununguko muna 1980. Vashanda muhurumende segurukota rinoona nezvevasori, vakamboitwa gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, gurukota rezvemitemo nemamwe mapazi. Vakabatawo zvigaro zvakasiyana siyana muZanu PF kubva muna 1980 kusvika pari zvino apo vane chigaro chemunyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato iri. Muna 2000 VaMnangagwa vakakundwa musarudzo dzemumiriri weKwekwe muparamende naVaBlessing Chebundo ve MDC. Mushure mekukundwa, VaMugabe vakakumbira vamwe vavo kuti vadome VaMnangagwa semutauriri weparamende. Asi nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakaramba sezvo VaMnangagwa ari munhu agara hake asina rutsigiro rweveruzhinji muZanu PF. Asi VaMugabe vakazoshandisa masimba avo vachityisidzira nhengo dzeparamende dzeZanu PF dzakanga dzasarudzwa kuti vanogona kuvhara paramende kana Zanu PF ikasatsigira VaMnangagwa kuti vave mutauriri weparamende. VaMugabe vakaudza nhengo dzeZanu PF idzi kuti havangarase mumwe wavo nekuti akundwa neMDC. Mushure mekuvhundutsirwa naVaMugabe, nhengo dzeZanu PF mudare reparamende dzakabvuma kuvhotera VaMnangagwa. Zvichitevera kushandura kwebumbiro reZanu PF nenzira iri kupikiswa nevamwe, VaMugabe ndivo vachadoma neMugovera vatevedzeri vavo vaviri pamwe nesachigaro webato iri. Remangwana raVaMnangagwa richibuda pachena parino vira neMugovera apo VaMugabe vachadoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri, pamwe nasachigaro webato.

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanoti Vanoda Ruzivo Pamusoro peNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vagari vemuHarare vakawanda vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kufara kuti kwave nenhomba yokudzivirira chirwere cheCovid 19, vazhinji vavo vanoti havasi kunyatsonzwisisa nezvemushonga uyu. Mumwe mugari wemuguta, VaAlbert Mwaengepi, vanoti kunynage hazvo gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakapaiwa chibaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm veruzhinji vachizviona, kutambirika kwenhomba iyi kuchanetsa muvanhu vakawanda munyika. Mutori wenhau, Henry Munjanja,anotiwo haasi kuzobaiwa nhomba iyi nechikonzero chokuti mushonga uyu wakangoerekana wamhara nendege pasina kana chenjedzo yokudzidzisa kana kuzivisa veruzhinji kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda sei. Asi nhengo yesangano reThe Aids and Arts Fondation, VaEmmaunel Gasa, vanoti vari kufara chaizvo nenyaya yenhomba yeCovid 19 yave munyika. Asi VaGasa vanoti zvainge zvakanaka zvikuru dai nhomba iyi yakatanga yaongororwa nenyanzvi dzehutano dzemunyika isati yabaiwa veruzhinji. Mumwe mugari wekuArdbernie, Amai Nakisai Murenje, vanoti vakakurudzirwa nehama neshamwari dziri mhiri kwemakungwa avo vakatobaiwa nhomba dzokudzivirira kutapuriranwa kweCovid 19, asi vanoti kutambirika kwenhomba yeSinopharm munyika kuchanetsa kana hurumende isina kupa veruzhinji mashoko akakwana ezvemashandiro emushonga uyu. Asi mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Robert Mudyiradima, vanoti pane hurongwa hwekushambadzira zvakadzama chirongwa chenhomba yeSinopharm kumativi mana enyika. Zimbabwe yakagamuchira neMuvhuro wapfuura nhomba dzinosvika mazana maviri ezviuru dzayakapihwa neChina pachena kuitira kuti ibaye vanhu kuitira kuti vazvidzivirire kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Zimbabwe iri kutarisira kuwana mwedzi unouya imwe nhomba inosvika mazana matanhatu ezviuru iyo yakatenga kukambani yekuChina ye Sinopharm. Hurumende inoti inotarisira kubaya vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yozadzisa Zviga zveUnited Nations?
text: No media source currently available No media source currently available Hurumende inoti Zimbabwe iri kubudirira zvikuru mukurwisa dambudziko reHIV/AIDS uye iri kukwanisa kuzadzikisa zviga zve Millenium Development Goals, MDGs, zvakatarwa neUnited Nations. Mashoko aya ataurwa nemukuru anoona nezve HIV/AIDS ne TB mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Owen Mugurungi, avo vanoti vari kufara nekuderera kwevanhu vari kubatwa neHIV/AIDS uye kuwanikwa kwemishonga nezvime. Zviga zve MDG’s izvi zvakatarwa muna Gunyana 2010 uye zvinofanira kunge zvazadzikiswa panopera gore rino. Chiga chechitanhatu che MDG’s ndechehutano chakanangangana nekurwisa zvirwere zvakaita sse HIV/AIDS, TB nezvimwe. Asi vamwe vanorarama neHIV vanoti nyaya yehupfumi isina kumira zvakana yave kupa kuti zvose zvange zvaitwa nehurumende zvidzokere kumashure. Vanoronga mabasa musangano re International Community of Women Living with HIV in Zimbabwe, Amai Martha Tolana, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi kuitira kuti zviga izvi zvizadziswe. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza dare reparamende muna Zvita pakuparura bhajeti regore rino kuti kubva muna 2011 makambani zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu ainge avharwa, uye vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvishanu vainge varasikirwa nemabasa kusvika pari zvino.

headline: Zvinhu Zvichakaminama Muzvipatara zveHurumende
text: Apo kudzokera kubasa kwavana chiremba kwange kusati kwaziviswa kune veruzhinji neChina masiakati, vamwe varwere vange vachiburitswa nehama dzavo muchipatara chepaChinhoyi vachinorapirwa kumba sezvo muchipatara ichi manga musina vana chiremba. Zvinhu zvanga zvasvika pakaoma pachipatara ichi izvo zvange zvave kumanikidza vamwe vanhu kuti vatore hama dzavo vachinodzirapisa kunana chiremba vakazvimirira. Muzvare Tariro Chinogwenya, avo vanogara na amai vavo mumusha unogara veruzhinji weChikonohono, vaudza Studio7 neChina masikati kuti amai vavo vakadimurwa gumbo nezuro nachiremba wavakatora kubva kuHarare uyo vakabhadhara madhora ekuAmerica mazana mana. Muzvare Chinogwenya vati amai vavo vakanonokerwa kurapwa sezvo vari murwere weshuga izvo zvakazokonzera kuti vadimurwe gumbo. Muzvare Chinogwenya vati vakaisa amai vavo muwadhi yakatsaurwa iyo vati inodhura sezvo vari kubhadhara madhora makumi matatu ekuAmerica pazuva. Mumwe mugari, Amai Cleopatra Tsomondo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vakaburitsa murume wavo muchipatara cheChinhoyi nekuti ainge asingarapwe zvakakwana. Amai Tsomondo vati mari yavari kubhadhara chiremba akazvimirira nemishonga yakawanda zvikuru. Mumwe murwere adzoserwa kumba nhasi, VaErick Madzimbamuto, vati vadzoserwa kumba vachinzi pachipatara hapana vanachiremba. Mumwe murwere anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Tawanda ati zvave pachena kuti vana mukoti havachashande sezvavanofanirwa kuita. Mukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Wencilus Nyamayaro, vati chipatara chemuChinhoyi chakaremerwa zvakanyanya sezvo varwere vematunhu madiki vachiendeswa pachipatara ichi. Mukuru wechipatara chemuChinhoyi, Dr Collet Mawire, vatiwo madhokotera anga asati ave pabasa panguva yashanyirwa chipatara ichi neStudio7. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutarisira kuti vana chiremba vachadzokera pamabasa avo nechimbi chimbi zvichitevera kumiswa kwaitwa kuramwa mabasa uku nesangano ravo reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mubati wehomwe muZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Prince Butau, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pachine zvinhu zvakawanda zvichiri kutauriranwa nehurumende sezvo zvichemo zvavo zvizhinji zvisati zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Votaura Zvimhingamupinyi Zvavanosangana Nazvo Munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS
text: Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe ichiverengwa pane dzimwe nyika dziri kukwanisa kurwisa HIV/Aids pamwe nekupa dzidziso pamusoro pekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde uye kuronga mhuri, vamwe vechidiki vanoti zvakaomera vakawanda vavo kuti vade kuongororwa ropa ravo, kurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde kana kutsvaga zvekudzivirira zvirwere izvi. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano weAdolescent Sexual and Reproductive Health Dialogue wakaitwa muBulawayo munguva pfupi yapfuura nesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health nevamwe vechidiki, wekuzeya kuongororwa ropa, kutsvaga ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri, pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kwevechidiki kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde kwevechidiki. Mumwe mukomana anoda kungoziikanwa nezita rekuti Everson, ndemumwe wevechidiki vari muBulawayo, vanodzidzisa vamwe vavo nezveHIV/AIDS, kuronga mhuri pamwe nekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde. Everson anoti nyaya yekuti muzvipatara nemumakiriniki hamuna vanamukoti vakakwana ndeimwe inoita kuti vechidiki vakawanda vatadze kuongororwa ropa ravo, kutsvaga ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde. Everson anotiwo vechidiki vanotya kubuda pachena panyaya dzine chekuita nezvepabonde nekuda kwekuti vanonyara kutaura nevanhu vanenge vari kumakiriniki kana dzimwe nzvimbo dzavanogona kuongororwa ropa ravo kana kuwana ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde. Mumwe musikana wechidiki, Muzvare Natasha Shoko, vanobvumirana nemaonero aya vachiti vechidiki vanoona vana mukoti vakawanda sevanhu vanovasarura vasingakwanise kuvanzwisisa kunyanya panyaya dzine chekuita nezvedzidziso yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde kana kuronga mhuri. VaWatson Chiwambo ndemumwezve mukomana wechidiki anoitawo zvekudzidzisa vamwe vezera rake nezveHIV/AIDS. VaChiwambo vanoti mutemo wekuti vechidiki vari pasi pemakore gumi nematanhatu havakwanise kuenda kuzvipatara kana makiriniki vari vega unokanganisa vechidiki munyaya dzekurwisa HIV/AIDS nzvimwe zvirwere zvepabonde uye kusimudzira ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri. Mumwe wechidiki anoita zvekurwira kodzero dzevechidiki, Muzvare Bertha Nyoni, vanobvumawo kuti mutemo uyu unokanganisa vechidiki. VaNhlanhla Moyo vanoshanda nesangano reYoung People’s Network mubazi reSexual and Reproductive Health. VaNhlanhla vanoti kunyange hazvo chingave chokwadi kuti vechidiki vanosangana nematambudziko akawanda mukeudza kuwana ruzivo pamwe nekurapwa HIV/Aids nezvirwere zvepabonde uye kuronga mhuri, vanoti vechidiki vanofanirwa kuzvipira kuenda kunzvimbo dzinoita izvi. Murongi wemabasa nesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaMongi Khumalo, vanoti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji, kunyanya vechidiki pachavo, vazeye nezvenyaya iyi senzira yekupedza matambudziko avanosngana nawo panyaya dzine chekuita nezvedzidziso yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde kana kuronga mhuri. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, sangano reUNAIDS rakaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti vechidiki vemuZimbabwe, kunyanya vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakumi maviri nemashanu havanyanyofarira kunogororwa ropa ravo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzeHIV/Aids dzinoti kurwisa denda iri kungabudirira chete kana veruzhinji vakaziva mamiriro ehutano hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnanagagwa Vovimbisa Vanachiremba Mari Asi Kuramwa Mabasa Kunoenderera Mberi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vakaudza bazi rezvemari kuti ripe imwe mari kuna vanachiremba avo vari kuramwa mabasa kubva kutanga kwemwedzi uno. Mari iri kuwedzerwa ndeye muripo kana vana chiremba vadaidzwa kuti vadzokere kubasa kana vachinge vapedza basa ravo, kana kuti on call allowance. Mashoko aya akaturwa kunana chiremba ava neHealth Services Board kana kuti HSB, iyo inoona nezvemabasa evose vanoshanda mubazi rezvehutano pamisangano yakaitwa nemusi weChipiri neChitatu. Asi kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuri kuenderera mberi sezvo vari kuti HSB haisi kuvaratidza mapepa acho anonzi akabva kubazi rezvemari. Kuramwa mabasa uku kwava nemazuva makumi maviri nesere pasina zvanyoreranwa pasi kunze kwekungonzi hurumende iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weHSB, Dr Lovemore Mbengeranwa, kana gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuchaenderera mberi kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neHutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vogunun'una Nekunonoka Kupihwa Mumwe Mushonga Wakakosha
text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Network of People Living with HIV, kana kuti ZNNP+, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru kuti nhengo dzaro dzakawanda hadzisati dzava kushandisa mushonga unonzi unodzikisa hukasha pamwe nekupararira kweHIV/AIDS mumuviri wemunhu anorarama neHIV/AIDS. Mumwe mukuru mukuru musangano reZNNP+, VaClarence Mademutsa, vanoti mushonga mutsva weDolutegravir, kana kuti DTG, uyo wakaparurwa muZimbabwe gore rakapfuura, hausati wava kupihwa vanhu vakawanda vanorarama neHIV/AIDS munyika. VaMademutsa vanoti vanhu vanorarama neHIV/Aids vakawanda vaifanirwa kunge vakatanga kunwa mushonga weDTG gore ra 2019 risati rapera. VaMademutsa vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kuramba vakamirira mushonga weDTG, sezvo wakanakira kuvanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS. VaMademutsa vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzesangano ravo dzanga dzichinetseka pakushandisa mushonga we Efavirenz, nokudaro chinhu chinenge chakanaka kuti vanhu vakawanda vashandise DTG sezvo mushonga uyu usina hukasha hunovhiringa hutano hwevanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS.. VaMademutsa vanoti havasati vave neruzivo rwekuti vanhu vangani vanofanirwa kunge vachipihwa DTG. Asi mumwe mudzimai asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake anoti vanhu havafanire kumanikidzwa kuti vapinde muchirongwa cheDTG, sezvo vamwe vanhu, vakaita saivo, vasina dambudziko nemishonga yavari kunwa pari zvino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kugurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kuti zvii zvakanakira mushonga mutsva uyu, uye kuti seyi vanhu vakawanda vasati vava pahurongwa hweDTG sezviri kutaurwa naVaMademutsa. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Clorata Gwanzura, vanoti mushonga weDTG mushonga mutsva unobatsira kudzikisa hukasha hweHIV. Dr Gwanzura vanoti bazi rehutano rinogara richiita ongororo dzekuona kuti ndeupi mushonga ungave nani pakubatsira vanorarama neHIV/AIDS. Dr Gwanzura vanoti ongororo yakaitwa inoratidza kuti DTG inobatsira zvikuru mukudzikisa hukasha hweHIV munguva pfupi mushure mekunge munhu atanga kunwa mushonga uyu. Zimbabwe imwe yenyika shoma dzemuAfrica dzava kushandisa mushonga weDTG uyo wakatambirwa zviri pamutemo muAmerica mugore ra 2013, mushure mokunge nyanzvi dzehutano dzaona kuti mushonga uyu waibatsira zvikuru kudzikisa hukasha hweHIV/Aids. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Ovhenekwa Chirwere CheGomarara PaChena kuMashonaland West
text: Mamwe madzimai ekuHurungwe mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasi kuwana hutano hwakakwana sezvo vachifamba mitunhu yakareba kuenda kumakiriniki nezvipatara. Vachitaura panzvimbo yeKasimure kuHurungwe, apo panga pachitariswa madzimai kuti vane gomarara repamuromo wechibereko here, Amai Bertha Zhou vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kufa negomarara rechibereko kumamisha sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa kuenda kunorapwa. Amai Zhou, avo vatariswa chibereko chavo icho changa chichivarwadza kwemakore matatu, vanoti zvirongwa zvakadai zvinofanirwa kuenda pazvikoro zviri pedyo nevanhu kwete kunzvimbo dzinokwirwa mabazi. Mumwe mudzimai atariswa nhasi, Amai Talent Katora, vanogara mumusha maVaNyarenda, vanoti vanonzwa kurwadziwa pasi peguvhu ravo izvo zvaita kuti vade kutariswa kuti vane gomarara repamuromo wechibereko here. Amai Katora vanoti vadzidzawo kuti mudzimai akapfeka mishonga yekudzora nhengo yesikarudzi yemudzimai mukana wekubatwa negomarara repamuromo wechibereko unenge wakakura. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Maudi Sengwe, vanoti kunyange vakambotariswa gomarara makore maviri apera vatariswa zvakare nhasi vachiti vanoda kuve nechokwadi kuti havana kubata chirwere ichi mumakore maviri apfuura. Chirongwa chaitwa nhasi chekutarisa kana madzimai anegomarara, chaitwa nebazi rezvehutano, vakabatana nePopulation Services pamwe neNational Aids Council avo vari kuchecheudza varume munzvimbo dzavari kufamba. Parizvino vasvika nzvimbo dzinoti Batwa, Mauya neKasimure, mangwana vanenge vari kuMagunje vozopedzisira neChirundu neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vochemachema neKukwidzwa kweMari dzeMasaisai neveDzinharembozha
text: Mamwe makambani embozhanhare anonzi akwidza mitengo yemabhanduru anoita kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuenda paindaneti nezvikamu zvinodarika gumi kubva muzana izvo zviri kutsoropodzwa nevakawanda kusanganisira vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika.
