Kambani yehurumende yeNetone yazivisa kuti yakwidza mutengo wemabhanduru anoita kuti vanoshandisa masaisai ekambani iyi kuenda pamadandemutande kana kufona vachemecheme. Netone yazivisa nhasi magwanani kuti yakwidza mutengo wemabhanduru kubva nhasi zvichienda mberi uye mabhanduru aya akwidzwa nezvikamu zana kubva muzana. Zvaitwa neNetone zvinotevera kukwidzwawo kwakaitwa mutengo wemabhanduru aya neEconet masvondo maviri adarika nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. Mumwe anoshandisa nharembozha nemasaisai eNetone, Muzvare Gracious Mangava, vati kuita zvidzidzo zvavo kuchavadhurira sezvo vachishandisa nharembozha kuita zvidzizo izvi. Sachigaro wesangano revanoburitsa mashoko paindaneti reOnline Content Creators of Zimbabwe, VaToneo Rutsito, vati kukidzwa kwemitengo yemabhanduru kuchaita kuti vatadze kushanda zvakanaka mukuwanisa veruzhinji mashoko anobata zvakawanda muhupenyu hwavo. Mutauriri weboka revechidiki muCitizens Coalition for Change, VaStephen Chuma, vati kusvitsa mashoko avo ekutsvaga rutsigiro kune veruzhinji pamberi pesarudzo kuchavanetsa sezvo vanga vachishandisa madandemutande kutaura neveruzhinji sezvo vachiti havasi kuwaniswa mukana wekushambadzira bato ravo panhepfenyuro yeZBC pamwe nemapepanhau ehurumende. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti vemapato anopikisa havasi kupihwa mukana wakaenzana newebato ravo pamhepo kuburikidza nenhepfenyuro nemapepanhau ehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevatauriri vemakambani enharembozha kuti tinzwe kuti chii chiri kukonzera kukwidza kwavaita mitengo yemabhanduru eindaneti. Asi zvichitevera kuchemachema kwaswera kuchiita veruzhinji nezvenyaya iyi pamadandemutande eFacebook, Twitter neWhatsapp, kambani yeNetone yazoburitsa mashoko ichiti iri kuongorora nyaya iyi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimboshanda mubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti makambani aya akwidze mitengo yemabhanduru. Munyori muboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaTendai Chirau, vanyora pandamutande ravo reTwitter kuti vachasvitsawo nyaya iyi kugurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha hwema computer VaJenfan Muswere. Ukuwo, VaRutsitu vatiwo vachagara pasi naVaMuswere pamwe nePostal and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe kuti vaone kuti nyaya iyi ingadziriswe sei. VaMuswere vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Mamwe Makambani Ozorwa Mafuta eNguruve Yaasina Kudya paNyaya yeKuburitswa kweMari Kunze kweNyika
text: Vamwe vana muzvinabhizinesi vari kushora zvikuru hurumende nekubudisa mazita evanhu nemakambani anonzi akabudisa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo vachiti hurumende haina kuita tsvakiridzo yakakwana sezvo vamwe vane mazita akabudiswa vasina mhosva dzavakapara. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wakokerwa neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce neChina muHarare vamwe vemabhizimusi vachiti vakasvibiswa mazita avo zvakanyanya nehurumende izvo zvokanganisa mabhizimusi avo. Mukuru weGlobal Solar LED Bulbs, VaJeffree Rugare, vati vakatoshamiswa vachiona kambani yavo yakanyorwa pavanhu vanonzi vakabuditsa mari asi ivo vachizvichenura panyaya iyi. VaRugare vaudza musangano uyu kuti chinonyanyovarwadza ndechekuti izvi zvakasvibisa kambani yavo kunyange hazvo vachiti hazvina chokwadi mukati. Mukuru weZNCC, VaChristopher Mugaga, vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti zvabuda mumusangano wavaita zvisvike kumutungamiri wenyika kuti azive kuti vamwe vevari kupomerwa kubudisa mari zvisiri pamutemo vakachena panyaya idzi. VaMugaga vatiwo mabhizimusi ari kunyunyutawo zvikuru achiti hurumende inenge iri kukoshesa mabhizimusi ekunze ichitsikirira vemabhizimusi emuZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTerence Mukupe,vati hurumende yakaita zvayaifunga kuti ndozvingabatsira nyika. VaMukupe vati vose vari kuti vakachena vanofanirwa kutora matanho ekuratidza humbowo hwekuti havana mhosva. Vachipindura kunyaya iri kupomerwa hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yekuti vanhu vakabudisa mari zhinji huye vachizivikanwa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika havana kunyorwa mazita avo, VaMukupe vati vanhu vane ruzivo nezvevamwe vakabudisa mari ngavazivise hutungamiriri pamwe nemapurisa. Gweta rine mukurumbira munyika, VaTendai Biti, vatiwo mutemo yenyika haina kugadziriswa zvakakwana kuti ubate vanobudisa mari, uye vakurudzira kuti kunyatsonyorwa mutemo unobata vanobudisa mari. Vemabhizimusi vatiwo hapana tsananguro yakazara inoratidza kuti chinonzi externalization yemari chii huye chii chinonzi nehurumende “Illicit Financial Flows.” No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Vanobviswa neMapurisa muHarare
text: Mapurisa pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru yeHarare vadzinga zvechisimba vanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa pakati peguta reHarare zvichitevera kurudziro yakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mukupera kwesvondo. Mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru yeHarare vadzinga mumigwagwa avo vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa zvaita kuti vatengesi ava vaswere vachiita hwekiti negonzo mukati padhorobha. Mumwe wevanotengesera mumigwagwa, Amai Maidei Chimuka, vati pane vanotengesera mumigwagwa varohwa zvakaipisisa vakakuvara uye vamwe vavo vanonzi vasungwa. VaMike Muvadi vati havadi kuenda kunotengesera zvinhu kunzvimbo dziri kunze kwedhorobha kwavari kunzi nekanzura vanoshandira. VaGwinyai Gandanzara, avo vanotegesawo mbatya, vati kurudziro yakaitwa naVaMugabe pakupera kwesvondo yekuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vabude mudhorobha inoratidza kuti VaMugabe havana hany’a nehupenyu hwevanhu. Zvichakadai, nhengo yeboka reTajamuka, VaDenford Ngadziore, vati vachashanda zvakasimba nevanotengesera mumigwagwa kuti vasarambe vachishungurudzwa nemapurisa pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru. Munyori muboka revechidiki reMDC-T, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vati bongozozo raitwa nemapurisa iri inzira yehurumende yekukanganisa vanhu kunyoresa kwavari kuita sevavhoti pakati pedhorobha sezvo vachiti bato ravo rine vatsigiri vakawanda mumadhorobha mazhinji. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanofanira kutengesera munzvimbo dzakatarwa dzavanenge vachibhadhara mitero kwete kuti vanhu vangomera kunge hohwa pakati pedhorobha. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inoshora SADC Pakusaita Hurukuro yeZviri Kunetsa muZimbabwe
text: Zvichitevera kupera kwemusangano wevatungamiri venyika dzeSADC pasina zvataurwa pamusoro pezviri kuitika muZimbabwe, bato guru rinopikisa, reMDC Alliance, rinoti zvinorishamisa kuti vatungamiri veSADC vakaregera kukurukura zviri kunetsa muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakaona zvakakodzera kutuma nhumwa dzavo ku Zimbabwe kunoita hurukuro pamusoro penyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Mugwaro ravatumira kuvatori venhau, vanoona nezvekudyidzana nevekunze mubato reMDC Alliance, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, vanoti hurumende yaVaEmerson Mnangagwa iri kushandisa dambudziko re COVID-19 senzira yekudzvanyirira vanhu munyika. Muzvare Hlatywayo vanoti vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vatori venhau, magweta, vanomirira vashandi nevemasangano anomirira vanhu, vemakereke nevemapato anokwikwidza vanoshungurudzwa apo vachiita mabasa avo zviri pasi pemutemo. Muzvare Hlatywayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo richaramba richiedza kuita hurukuro neSADC, pamwe chete nevatungamiri venyika dziri musangano iri nevamwe, kusvika nyaya yeZimbabwe yagadziriswa. No media source currently available  Asi sachigaro vebato re Zanu-PF muNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoramba mashoko ese ataurwa mugwaro reMDC Alliance, vachiti chirwere cheCOVID-19 hachisi chekutamba nacho, naizvozvo hurumende inoisa mirairo inodzikisa mafambiro evanhu kuti ibatsire mukuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu vayo.  VaCharumbira vanoti SADC haina kukurukura pamusoro peZimbabwe nekuti muZimbabwe hamuna dambudziko rinokodzera kukurukurwa. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Yoshushikana neDambudziko reZimbabwe
text: Chikwata chesangano reInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, icho chiri munyika kuzoongorora mashandiro echirongwa chekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika chinoti chinobvumirana nehurumende kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe haugoni kusimukira pasina rubatsiro rwemari kubva kumasangana akaita neIMF, World Bank nemamwe. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nenhengo dzedare reparemende dziri mukomiti inoona zvemari, mukuru wechikwata ichi, VaDomenico Fanizza, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nemasangano aya nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti hupfumi hwayo hufambire mberi. Vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika vachiti makore akawanda nyika isina rubatsiro kubva kunze anoita kuti zvinhu zviome munyika. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo, zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe iite zvese zvakabvumiranwa pachirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program sezvo chiri icho chinhanho chekutanga mukugadzirisa hukama hwayo nemabhanga ekunze pamwe nenyika dzinopa rubatsiro. Chirongwa ichi chinosungira kuti Zimbabwe ibate mari zvakajeka, ishandure mashandiro emabhanga pamwe nebanga guru renyika. Zimbabwe inosungirwawo kujekesa mutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema. Vati kunyange hazvo izvi zvakaoma kuita, zvinofanirwa kuitwa kana nyika ichida kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika nemasangano akaita seIMF. Asi VaFanizza vati zvinofadza kuti Zimbabwe inenge iri kutora gwara rakanaka pachirongwa ichi sezvo pane zveshanduka pamafambisirwo ari kuitwa hupfumi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo pane zvashanduka hurumende ichiri kusangana nematambudziko akawanda ayo anogona kuvhiringa hurumende nekuitadzisa kuzadzikisa chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rehomwe yehurumende sezvo iine vashandi vehurumende vakawandisa, kusashandiswa zvakanaka kwemari yehurumende pamwe nekusajeka kwemutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema. VaMuchiwa vanoti izvi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zvinogona kuvhiringa chirongwa ichi. Pabvunzwa VaFanizza kuti sei IMF isiri kubatsira Zimbabwe sezvairi kuita Greece iyo iri kutatarikawo munyaya dzehupfumi, VaFanizza vati vanobatsira nyika dzine zvikwereti, uye vanokwanisa kubatsira Zimbabwe chete kana pachinge pave newirirano pakuti ichabhadhara chikwereti chayo sei. IMF iri kubatsira Zimbabwe kugadzirisa hupfumi hwayo pamwe nezvikwereti zvayo kuitira kuti ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. VaFanizza vati izvi zvichaitika chete kana chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program chabudirira muZimbabwe. Chikwereti cheZimbabwe chemukati menyika nekunze chave kudarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora.

headline: Vanotengesa Zvinhu Mumigwagwa Voisa Zvipikiri Munzeve Dzavo
text: Vatengesi vemumigwagwa vari kushoropodza zvikuru kanzuru yeHarare iyo vanoti yakavaudza kuti ichashandisa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kuvadzinga mumigwagwa mavanotengesera. Senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheTyphoid, kanzuru yeHarare neChipiri yakapa vanotengesera zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa mazuva maviri kuti vamire kuita izvi. Kunyange hazvo mazuva aya apfuura, vatengesi ava havasati vabuda mumigwagwa uye vanoti havasi kuzobuda. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri we Sangano re Zimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, ZCIEA, iro rinomirira vanobata mabasa emaoko, Amai Olivia Songere, vashora zvikuru kanzuru nekuda kushandisa huturu pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau. Mumwe mutengesi, VaGivus Maririmba, vashoropodzawo kanzuru yeHarare nekupomera vatengesi vemumigwagwa kuti ndivo vari kukonzoresa kuti hutachiona hwetyphoid hwupararire. VaMaririmba vatiwo kutengesa mumigwagwa kuri kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemabasa VaMaririmba vashorawo mitemo inoshandiswa nemakanzuru iyo yavati ndeyehudzvanyiriri yaishandiswa nehurumende yavachena. Mukuru wesangano reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanotiwo kupomerana mhosva hakusiko kunopedza dambudziko rezvirwere zvemudumbu. VaShumba vari kukurudzira kanzuru kuti iterese mitero vanotengesa mumigwagwa, mari yainenge yawana, yoshandiswa mukuchenesa nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru ye Harare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kanzuru ichazenge ichibatsirwa nemapurisa kubvisa nechisimba vatengesi vari kurambira mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: National Aids Council Yoronga Hurongwa Hunobatsira Matunhu Madiki
text: Sangano reNational Aids Council rinoti hurongwa hwaro hwekuti matunhu madiki kana kuti madhisitirikiti azvirongere oga mashandisirwo emari inobva muhomwe ye AIDS Fund hwave padanho repamusoro soro. Mukuru anoona nezvemari musangano iri, VaAlbert Manenji, vanoti vakaona zvakakosha kuti vatore danho iri sezvo mamwe matunhu anga achichema chema kuti ari kunonoka kana kutotadza kuwana mari idzi nekuda kwezvimhingamipinyi zvinokonzerwa nekugoverwa kwemari kana ichibva kumuzinda. Vanoti pari zvino sangano iri riri kungoita zvirongwa zvakafanana kumatunhu ose, pasina kutariswa kuti zvichemo zvinogona kusiyana dunhu nedunhu. Gore rino sangano iri rakaisa parutivi mari inosvika mamiriyoni mashanu ekushandisa mukurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Matunhu makuru gumi emunyika achawana mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora iyo anozopa kumatunhu maduku zvichienderana nezvirongwa zvaanenge achiita. Svondo rino misangano yekukwenenzvera hurongwa uhwu iri pakati kuMasvingo uko humiriri hwematunhu madiki ose ari makumi masere nemashanu munoshandira sangano reNational Aids Council huri kudzidziswa. No media source currently available

headline: Seneta Rejoice Timire, Avo Vakashaya neChirwere cheCovid-19, Varadzikwa Nhasi muHarare
text: Mumwe wevanga vachimirira vakaremara mudare reSenate, Amai Rejoice Timire. avo vakashaya nezuro nedenda reCovid-19, varadzikwa nhasi kumarinda eGlen Forest muHarare. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaAmai Timire, sachigaro veNational Disability Board, Amai Mercy Maunganidze, vati vachaedza nepose pavanogona napo kuti mabasa akanaka aiitwa naAmai Timire, aenderere mberi. Vasara vakamirira vakaremara mudare reSeneti, VaWatson Khupe, vati vakaremara vasiyirwa chisveru chekuti vagare vachishanda zvakasimba sezvaiita Amai Timire. Mukuru weDeaf Zimbabwe Trust,Amai Babra Nyangairi, vatiwo vakaremara vanofanira kufambisa mberi mabasa aibatwa naAmai Timire. Hanzvadzi yaAmai Timire, Bishop Sevenzile Msiza, vati semhuri varasikirwa zvikuru. Muzvare Pamela Timire, avo vaishanda pamwe chete naamai vavo, vatiwo ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwarasikirwa nekushaya kwaita Seneta Timire. Amai Timire, avo vakadomwa kuva nhengo yeSenate muna 2018, vashaya vava nemakore makumi matanhatu nemaviri ekuberekwa, uye vasiya vana vashanu nevazukuru. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Pamwe neHurumende Zvoendeswa kuMatare
text:
Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vaendesa kanzuru yavo, bazi rinoona nezvezvicherwa pamwe nemakambani anochera goridhe mashanu mugomo reTarget Kopje, vachikumbira dare kuti rimisemabasa ekucherwa kwegoridhe sezvo ari kukanganisa dzimba dzavo pamwe nematangi emvura. Sangano reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance (MURRA), rasvitsa chikumbiro chechimbi chimbi mudare repamusoro richimirirwa naVaPhilip Shumba. VaShumba vaudza Studio7 kuti kunze kwekukanganisa dzimba nekugara zvakanaka kwevagari, vacheri ava vari kuchera pasi pematangi emvura nekudaro anogona kuwondomoka kukaita mashamu emvura vanhu vakarasikirwa nehupenyu mumusha uri pedyo. VaShumba vati pamusoro pezvo makambani mashanu anoti Lions Mining
Syndicate, Lions 2, Brossro, Edwards pamwe neGreat Zimbabwe Mining
Syndicates ari kushandisa mishonga yakaipa inogona kuuraya vanhu ikapinda mumatangi emvura. VaShumba vati vaendesa kanzuru kumatare nekuti ndiyo yakapa mvumo makambani aya. Vatiwo hurumende yaendeswa kumatare nekuti ndiyo yakapa marezenisi ekuti makambani aya aite basa rawo mumusha wevagari ve Target Kopje
pamwe neHillside. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati havasati vagamuchira
mapepa abva kudare, asi vati chero paachasvika mumaoko avo havasi
kuzopikisa kudare nekuti vakazoona kuti zviri kuitwa nekambani aya
zvinokanganisa vagari nematangi avo emvura. Vakafana kubata chigaro chemukuru webazi rezvicherwa muMasvingo,
VaMarshal Muzira, avo vatambira mapepa ekudare, varamba kutaura
neStduio 7 vachiti tibate munyori mubazi ravo kuHarare sezvo
vasingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau. Munyori mubazi rezvezvicherwa, VaOnesimo Moyo, vange vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kana kupindura mibvunza yatavatumira. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati vanotarisira kuti dare richapa mutongo unomisa mabasa ekuchera goridhe munzvimbo dzinogara vanhu.

Nyaya iyi inotasisirwa kunzwikwa mudare kana vamhangarirwa vakapikisa
zviri kudiwa nevagari mukati memazuva gumi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vanoti Vakadzinga VaMnangagwa Nokuti Vaivazvidza
text: No media source currently available Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vataura kekutanga kubva pavakadzinga mumwe wevatevedzeri vavo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti VaMnangagwa vakanga vanonokerwa nekuda kutonga zvekusvika pakuvazvidza. Vachitaura nevatsigiri vavo neChitatu pamuzinda webato ravo pamberi pemusangano wekomiti yepamusoro yebato ravo yePolitburo, VaMugabe vati vakadzinga VaMnangagwa nepamusana pekuti vakange vovazvidza. VaMugabe vati VaMnangagwa vakanga vononokerwa nekutonga zvekuti vakange vave kuenda kumapositori kunobvunzira kuti vachatora matomhu rinhi kubva kuna ivo VaMugabe. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kuita mutungamiri wenyika kunoda vanhu vakazvipira kumirira nguva vachiti rwendo rwekuti munhu azotungamira rwurefu, rwune makuva mukati uye harwuna kudimurira. VaMugabe vatiwo VaMnangagwa ndivo vaipesvedzera kuti Amai Joice Mujuru vadzingwe mubato vasingazive kuti VaMnangagwa pachavo vaifambisa tsoro yekuda kuzovatorera masimba. Amai Mujuru vakadzingwa muhurumende pamwe nemuZanu PF vachipomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura VaMugabe. Murongi wemisangano muboka revechidiki muZanu PF reYouth League, VaInnocent Hamandishe, vatiwo VaMnangagwa vakanga vazadza vatsigiri vavo mumapazi ose ehurumende, vachiti vanhu vose ava vanofanira kudzingwa mubato. Vataura vakamirira mapurovhinzi ose eZanu PF pamusangano uyu pamwe nevataura vakamirira boka revechidiki pamwe neremadzimai vati vakabvumirana kuti mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vatsive VaMnangagwa semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. Amai Mugabe, avo vataura vachiita kunge munhu aribkuparidza, vati vachaita zvinenge zvataurwa nevanhu. Vose vari kufungidzirwa kuti vari kutsigira VasMnangagwa vanga vachitsoropodzwa pamusangano uyu uyo washandiswawo nevatsigiri veZanu PF kukumbira ruregerero nekusvereredzwa kwakaitwa Amai Mugabe kumusangano wakaitwa naVaMugabe nevechidiki veZanu PF kuBulawayo pakupera kwesvondo. Zvichakadai, VaMugabe vati nyaya yataurwa yekuti mudzimai wavo agadzwe semutevedzeri wavo vachaiongorora nezvayo pamusangano wekongiresi yechimbichimbi yakatarisirwa kuitwa mwedzi unouya. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vambobuda munyika kwechinguva uye pari zvino vanonzi vari muSouth Africa.

headline: Sangano reAmnesty International muZimbabwe Ropomerwa Mhosva yeKusashandisa Mari Zvakanaka
text: Sangano rinorwirwa kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reAmnesty International, rinoti wongororo yemabhuku aro emari akaitwa kuchikamu chesangano iri muZimbabwe inoratidza kuti sangano iri rakarasikirwa nemamirioni mazhinji emadhora kuburikidza nehuwori pamwe nekusashandiswa kwemari zvakanaka. Amnesty International inoti vashandi vayo havana kubata mari zvakanaka uye vamwe vakashandisa mari zvisina kufanira, vamwe vakatora mari zvisiri pamutemo. Vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwamashoko musangano iri kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaRobert Shivambu, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuSouth Africa kuti havakwanisi kutaura nezvenyaya iyi nekuti zvingakanganisa nyaya yavo kumatare edzimhosva kwavakaiendesa. Gore rakapera, bazi reAmerica rezvekudyina nedzimwe nyika rakamisa kubatsira nemari masangano mazhinji akazvimiririra emuZimbabwe richiti masangano aya ange asingatevedzeri nzira dzinodiwa mukushandiswa kwemari yadzaivapa. Amnesty International inoti nyaya iyi inobata mukuru wesangano iri muZimbabwe, VaCousin Zilala, avo vakatosiya basa, pamwe nasachigaro wesangano iri, VaTakesure Musiyiwa. Vanoona nezvemari musangano iri, Amai Sibongile Zimbeva, vakambomiswawo basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekusaita basa ravo nemazvo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaAlois Munyaradzi Chaumba, vanoti nyaya dzekusabata mari zvakanaka dziri kuramba dzichiitika mumasangano emunyika dzinouraya tarisiro yeveruzhinji, avo vanotarisira kwaari kuti avabatsire mukuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzavo. VaChaumba vanoti huwori mumashandisirwo emari mumasangano aya hunopedzawo simba reavo vanoapa mari kuti arwire kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Mari yeDzidzo Haisi Kuzowedzerwa Kunyange Yotadza Kubhadhara Varairidzi
text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Doctor Godfrey Gandawa, vanoti hurumende haisi kuzoregedza zvikoro zvepamusoro soro zvichiita pamadiro pakuwedzera mari dzedzidzo kuitira kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro soro izvi zvikwanise kubhdhara varairidzi. VaGandawa vanoti zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinofanira kutsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekutsvaga mari dzisineyi nekuwedzera mari dzinobhadharwa nevadzidzi. No media source currently available Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ari mubepanhau reHerald ekuti dare remakurukota riri kutarisira kuzeya chirongwa chekuti hurumende imire kupa zvikoro izvi mari dzemihoro yevarairidzi. Hurumende iri kunetseka zvakanyanya kubhadhara mari kuvashandi vayo. Zvikoro izvi zvinonzi nehurumende zvinofanira kuti zvibhadhare mihoro yevadzidzisi. Hurumende ine chikwereti kuzvikoro izvi chinosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora pasi pechirongwa che cadet kana kuti vadzidzi vanenge vachipihwa mukana wekumbonoshanda. Mutungamiri wesangano reNational University of Science and Technolody Educators Association, VaAlois Muzuwe, vanoti havana chekutaura pari zvino sezvo vasati vapirwa nyaya yacho. Asi mutauriri weZINASU, VaAvoid Masiraha, vanoti havasi kuzobvuma kuti mari dzedzidzo dziwedzerwe uye vacharatidzira kana zvichibvira. No media source currently available

headline: Sarudzo dzeMakanzura Dzinoitwa kuTsholotsho neHwedza
text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Election Support Network, Zesn, rinoti ratumira vaongorori ku Hwedza neku Tsholotsho uko kwange kuine sarudzo dzema by election dzemakanzura emawadhi matatu. Zesn inoti sarudzo idzi dzaitirwa mumawadhi anoti Tsholotsho Ward 16; Tsholotsho Ward 20 neHwedza District Rural Council Ward 4. Sarudzo yemu Tsholotsho Ward 16 yaitwa mushure mekudzingwa kwaVa Ngwenya Patrick Hlakaza ve Zanu PF, vachipomerwa mhosva yekusashandisa zvakanaka mari dze Campfire, ukuwo Va Gideon Ndlovu veTsholotsho Ward 20, vakadzingwawo vachipomerwawo mhosva imwe cheteyo. Sarudzo yemu Ward 4 ku Hwedza yaitwa mushure mekushaya kwenhengo yeZanu PF, Alderman Samson Makamba. Mapato makuru maviri e Zanu PF neMDC Alliance ndiwo akwikwidza muma by – election matatu aya. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa zveZimbabwe Election Support Network, Amai Ellen Dingani, vanoti sarudzo idzi dzaitwa murunyararo, uye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, yanga ichitevedza zvinodiwa nemitemo yesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera muMigwagwa Voita Bhindauko reKutengesa Mireza yeNyika
text: Vamwe vatengesi vemumigwagwa vanoti vatora mukana wekushanduka kwehurumende kutengesa zvinhu zvakadai semireza yeZimbabwe nezvimwe zvipfeko zvine ruvara rwemureza wenyika, sezvo zviri kuvapa pundutso. Mumwe wevatengesi vemumigwagwa ava Amai Enet Mandimika vanoti bhizimusi remireza yeZimbabwe riri kufamba zvikuru uye kubva neMugovera apo pakaitwa kuratidzira muguta reHarare vanga vari kuita mari zvikuru. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo naAmai Esinath Dube avo vanoti vakatosiya zvekuhodha zvinhu zvakadai semadomasi, muriwo nezvimwewo kuti vatengese mireza. Mumwe mutengesi, VaArnold Chapungu vanoti shanduko iri kuitika munyika ndoyakavasunda kutengesa mireza yenyika, makepesi ane mireza yeZimbabwe pamwechete nemabhareta. Vatengesi vemumigwagwa ava vanotiwo vari kutarisira kuti mangwana apo pachange pachigadzwa mutungumariri wenyika mutsva VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachatengesawo zvakanyanya. Gore rapera hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kutengeswa kwemireza yenyika, zvichitevera kushandiswa kwakanga kwoitwa mureza nemamwe masangano anopikisa hurumende senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo. Chimwe chizvarwa chekuChina chakasungwa gore rapera cvhakamiswa pamberi pematare mushure mekunge chawanikwa chichitengesa mireza. Asi kubva pakatanga kuratidzira kwakamanikidza VaMugabe kusiya basa svondo rapera, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvairatidzira zvaishandisa mureza pasina munhu akasungwa. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeGweru neVagari Vopesana Pamusoro peMamita eMvura
text:
Pari kuita kusawirirana pakati pekanzuru yeguta reGweru nevamwe vagari pamusoro pehurongwa hwekanzuru iyi hwekuda kuti vagari vashandise ma-prepaid metre emvura.

Vamwe vagari vakaudza Studio 7 kuti havawirirane nehurongwa uhu nekuti kuwana mvura yakachena ikodzero yevagari isingafanirwe kutyorwa zvisinei kuti vagari vanombotadza kubhadhara mitero yemvura. Mumwe mugari uyo akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Ambuya Kurebwaseka vakati kuve nema-prepaid metre emvura kunogona kuunza zvirwere sezvo vamwe vanhu vachigona kutadza kuwana mari inenge ichidiwa kuti vakwanise kutenga mvura nguva nenguva. Mumwewo mugari, Amai Nonhlanhla Chijiya vanotiwo havatsigire nyaya yema-prepaid metre vachiti mvura yakasiyana nemagetsi ekuti vanhu vakaashaya vanokwanisa kushandisa dzimwe mhando dzemoto. Amai Chijiya vanotiwo kanzuru inofanirwa kuziva kuti veruzhinji vari kuomerwa nehupenyu vachitiwo vagari vakawanda vanoda kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavainazvo kukanzuru kunyanya zvemvura, asi vanoti kanzuru inovawomesera nekusada kutambira mari inobhadharwa muzvidimbu-zvidimbu. Kunze kwekusawirirana nenyaya yema-prepaid metre emvura mumwewo mugari VaTicharwa Ngambura vanoti vanoti vagari vanochema-chema nehwavanoti huwori hunoitwa nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru vavanoti vanovharira vagari mvura zvisiri pamutemo vachida mari yechiokomuhomwe. VaCharles Mazorodze vanove mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari reGweru Residents Forum vanoti zvakanakira vagari kuti vashandise ma-prepaid metres vachitiwo zvimwe zvikwereti zvemvura zvinonzi vagari vanazvo kukanzuru hazvizi zvechokwadi nekuti vashandi vekanzuru havatarise nemazvo mashandisirwo anoitwa mvura nevagari. Asi meya weGweru VaCharles Chikozho vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurongwa hwekuti vagari vashandise ma-prepaid metres huri kuenderera mberi vachitiwo vagari vakatambira hurongwa uhu, kunyange hazvo vakati havakwanise kupa nguva chaiyo yekuti izvi zvichaitwa riinhi. Panyaya yehuwori hunopomerwa vamwe vashandi vekanzuru vachinzi vanovharira vamwe vagari mvura vachida mari yechiokomuhomwe, VaChikozho vakakururudzira vagari kuti vasaite zvekuda kubhadhara mari yakadaro sezvo izvi zvisiri pamutemo uyewo zvisingabatsire vagari pakuderedza zvikwereti zvavanenge vainazvo kukanzuru. VaChikozho vakati vagari vane chikwereti chakakura kukanzuru vachitiwo kanzuru yavo yakazvipira kutaurirana nevagari vanenge vane zvikwereti kuti vabhadhara sei zvikwereti izvi. Vakatiwo kunyange hazvo vachitambira pfungwa yekuti kuwana mvura yakachena ikozdero yevagari, vanhu vanofanirwa kuyeuka kuti kanzuru inoshandisa mari yakawanda kuti vanhu vawane mvura iyi. VeZimbabwe National Water Authority vari kukurudzira kushandiswa kwema-prepaid water metre vachiti munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika vachiti izvi zvinobatsira kuti vanhu vakwanise kubhadhara mvura yavanenge vashandisa chaiyo kwete kubhadharira inenge yaita zvekufungidzirwa. Harare nderimwe remaguta ari munyika akatanga kukurudzira vagari kuti vashandise ma-prepaid metre emvura mune dzimwe nzvimbo muguta iri.
Asi vamwe vanoti kushandiswa kwema-prepaid metre kunogona kuwomesera vanoshaya. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veMuChinhoyi Vofarira Kugadzirwa kweMigawagwa
text: Vagari vakawanda vemuChinhoyi vanoti vari kufara nekugadzirwa kuri kuitwa migwagwa yeguta ravo iyi yange yaipa nekuda kwekupedza nguva isina kugadziriswa. Vazhinji vataura neStudio 7 vanoti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaoma kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvinhu zvinobatika sekugadzirisa migwagwa iyo yanga yave nemakomba makomba akawanda izvo zvanga zveve kukonzera njodzi uye kuuraya motokari dzavo. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari inotakura veruzhinji VaMacdonald Chareya vanoti zvinofadza kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira migwagwa izvo vanoti zvave kuchengetedza motokari dzavo uye kusasimuka kwehuruva iyo inokonzera zvirwere. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaLazarus Tembo avo vanoti motokari dzavo hadzichafa nekuda kwekufamba mumakomba. VaChareya vanoti dambudziko ravepo nderekuti vamwe vatyairi vave kumhanyisa motokari sevari pamakwikwi nekudaro vanoti paiswe mahambu mumigwagwa. Meya weguta reChinhoyi VaDyke Makombe vebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vanoti vave kukwanisa kugadzira migwagwa nemari iri kubva kubazi rinoona nezve kugadzira kwemigwagwa munyika reZimbabwe National Road Authority kana kuti ZINARA. VaMakombe vanoti kanzuru yavo yave kushandisa mari yeZINARA pabasa ravanenge vapihwirwa mari kwete kuishandisa zvimwe. Asi mumwe mugari Amai Mercy Tapfumaneyi vanoti vanotenda maruva vadya chakata sezvo kanzuru ichimbotanga zvinhu asi yotadza kupedza nekuti kwavanogara kuWhite City hakusati kwagadzirwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru VaTichaona Mlauzi vanoti nzvimbo dzisiri kugadzirwa gore rino dzichagadzirwa munaNdira gore rinouya sezvo vakapihwa mari inosvika miriyoni nechidimu neZINARA yekushandisa gore rinouya. VaMlauzi vanoti parizvino vari kushandisa mari inosvika miriyoni kugadzira makiromita mapfumbamwe. Zvichakadaro mune imwewo nyaya sachigaro webato reZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakazivisa nezuro kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachatanga kutenda vanhu nekuvavhotera kwavakaita. VaZiyambi vanoti VaMnangagwa vachatanga nekutenda vanhu vekwaZvimba neMugovera sezvo vainge vasingafungidzire kuti vanokunda mudunhu iri sezvo kuri kumusha kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe.

headline: America Inobatsira Dzimwe Nyika neMushonga weNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Pamusangano wakaitwa nenyika dzakabudirira dzeG7, nyika idzi dzakazvipira kubatsira dzimwe nyika nenhomba yeCovid-19. Nhomba idzi, pamwe chete nezvakavimbiswa kubva muna Kukadzi 2021, zvichasvitsa rubatsiro rwemushonga rwese urwu pabhirioni remadhora mugore riri kuuya, America ichibatsira nehafu yemushonga iyi. Mugwaro ravakabudisa, vatungamiri venyika dzeG7 vakati chinhu chekutanga chavanoda kuitira dzimwe nyika dzepasi rose kuona kuti mushonga wakanaka uye unoshanda uwanikwe nenyika dziri kubudirira sezvo kubaiwa nhomba kwavanhu vose pasi pano chiri chinhu chakanakira vagari vose pasi pano. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakafara nekuzvipira kwakabvumiranwa uku, zvikurusei sezvo kwakauya mushure mekutaura kwavo kuti America ichatenga mishonga yePfizer/BioNTech inoita zviuru mazana mashanu kuti ipiwe kunyika dzinoita zana. Sekutaura kwakaita VaBiden, America iri kutenga mushonga wekupa dzimwe nyika unopfuura wakambotengwa nenyika ipi zvayo. VaBiden vakati, “Zviuru mazana mashanu zvemushonga wenhomba uyu zvichatanga kuendeswa kunyika dzakasiyana siyana mumwedzi waNyamavhuvhu gore rino. Zviuru mazana maviri zvemushonga uyu zvichaendeswa kuned zimwe nyika gore rino, uye zviuru mazana matatu zvichaendeswa mumwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga mugore ra2022.” Kuzvipira kweAmerica kubatsira dzimwe nyika nemishonga yenhomba yePfizer inoita zviuru mamirioni mazana mashanu kuri kuwedzerwa pamusoro pe mishonga inoita mamirioni makumi masere akavimbiswa dzimwe nyika naVaJoe Biden, avo vakazvipiravo kubatsira nemari inoita mabhirioni maviri emadhora eku America ekubatsira sangano rinobatsira dzimwe nyika mukuwana mushonga wenhomba. Chivimbiso chakaitwa nenyika dzeG7 chinoratidza kuti kubva muna 2020, nyika dzeG7 dzakazvipira kubatsira dzimwe nyika nemabhirioni maviri emushonga wenhomba. Nyika dzeG7 dzakazvipiravo kubatsira dzimwe nyika mukugadzira mushonga wenhomba munyika dzayo dzichishanda neQuad Vaccine Partnership yeAmerica, Australia, India neJapan. VaBiden vanoti zviri pachena kuti nyika dzeG7 dzinobvumirana kuti zvadzakavimbisa izvi hazvisi izvo zvese zvadzichaita, vachiti kubatsira uku kuchaenderera mberi kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yopomera Vari Kunze Mhosva yeKufurira Vari Kumusha Kuti Varatidzire
text: Panonzi pave nekukandirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigere munyika nezvimwe zvigere kunze kwenyika pamusoro pekuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa nebato reMDC, vari munyika, zvikuru veZanu PF, vachiti kuratidzira uku kuri kukuchidzirwa nevari kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo mapurisa munyika yose ari kurambidza kuratidzira uku kuburikidza nekuzara mumigwagwa pamwe chete nemauto akamirira kuparadza vanenge vaungana vachida kuratidzira. Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, VaBelieve Gaule, vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vari kufurira hama dzavo kuti dzipandukire hurumende vachidzityisidzira kuti havazotumira zvakare mari kumusha kana vakasapinda mumigwagwa. VaGaule vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vanenge vagere zvavo pamutambarakede, vachishandisa vari kumusha ava. Vamwe ndivo vari kunyora pamadandemutande vachikurudzira vari kunze kwenyika ava kuti vadzoke kumusha munguva dzekuratidzira idzodzo vachibatana navo, kwete kuita vana tinhadzirwe. Asi mumwe wevari kunze kwenyika, vari sachigaro webato reMDC mudunhu reDC-Maryland-Virginia, VaCharles Mutama, vanoti vanogona kunge vari kunzi vari kufurira vari kumusha asi chavari kuda kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika. VaMutama, avo vanove zvakare mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy, vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vanokurudzira hama neshamwari dzavo kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira senzira yekugadzirisa zvinhu.  No media source currently available

headline: ZIMRA Yonetsana neveMabhizimisi paNyaya yeMitero Inonzi Ibhadharwe neDhora rekuAmerica
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemaIndastiri VaMangaliso Ndlovu nemusi weMuvhuro vakaita musangano nevemaindusrty muHarare vachivakurudzira kuti vadzikise mitengo yezvinhu. Asi VaNdlovu vakaudzwao nevemabhizimisi ava kuti havasi kufarawo nemimwe mitemo yehurumende inosanganisa danho rakatorwa neZIMRA rekuti vanenge vatengesa zvinhu nedhora rekuAmerica vabhadhare mutero nedhora iri kwete RTGS kana bond. Mutungamiri wesangano reRetailers Association of Zimbabwe VaDenford Mutashu avo vakapinda mumusangano uyu vanoti vakakumbirawo VaNdlovu kuti vaende kunotaura negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube panyaya yeZIMRA yekuti vamwe vabhadhare mutero nemadhora ekuAmerica. Sangano reZIMSTATS svondo rapera rakaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti mitengo yezvinhu yainge yakwira nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi maviri kubva muzana. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura naVaNdlovu sezvo vati vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZIMRA Amai Faith Mazani. No media source currently available

headline: Vatori veNhau Vocherechedza Zuva reKuremekedzwa kweKodzero Dzavo Vachiti muZimbabwe Vari Kushungurudzwa
text: Vatori venhau neMuvhuro vakacherechedza zuva rekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzavo kana kuti World Press Freedom Day vachichema chema kuti makore makumi matatu mushure mechibvumirano chekuWindoek Declaration vachiri kushanda vakamanikidzika munyika. Mumwe mutori wenhau, VaEliah Ntali vaudza Studio 7 kuti chibvumirano chakaitwa kunyika yeNamibia muWindhoek, chinozivikanwa nekuti Windhoek Declaration chinokurudzira kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka hachisati chazadzikiswa munyika vachipa muenzaniso wekusungwa nekumbunyikidzwa kwevatori venhau. Mumwe mutori wenhau John Cassim atsinhirawo mashoko aya vachiti pakapidigurwa hurumende yamushakabvu Robert Mugabe nemauto muna 2017, zvinhu zvakamboita nani pakapinda VaEmmerson Mnangagwa panyanga asi iko zvino hazvichisina kumira zvakanaka. Mukuru we Media Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe kana kuti Misa-Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vatiwo basa rekutapwa kwenhau harisi kufamba zvakanaka vachitiwo vatapi venhau vari kushungurudzwa, kusungwa uye kune dzimwe nyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica vari kuurayiwa. VaMoyo vatiwo panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19 vatapi venhau vanofanirwa kupiwa zvinovadzivirira pavanenge varikubasa vakarumbidza hurumende yeZimbabwe nekutenda kuisa vatori venhau pavanhu vakatanga kubaiwa nhomba. VaMoyo vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuisa mitemo inokurudzira kufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka vakatiwo mitemo irikuda kuiswa yakadai seCybersecurity and data protection Bill inodzorera shure kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka Mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations (ZACRAS), Muzvare Vivenne Marara vakurudzirawo hurumende nevatori venhau kuti vawanise veruzhinji ruzivo rwakakwana kuti vatore matanho akakosha muhupenyu vaine ruzivo rwakakwana. Vatori venhau vemuZimbabwe vanotiwo chirwere cheCovid-19 chasiya vazhinji vavo vave parumananzombe sezvo mamwe makambani enhau onetsekana kubhadhara vashandi. Mugwaro ravo rekucherechedza WPFD, Amnesty International yatiwo kumabudazuva nekuchamhembe kweAfrica vatori venhau vari kumbunyikidzwa izvo zvosanganawo nedenda reCovid-19 . Amnesty International yati Zimbabwe irikushungurudzawo vatori venhau kuburikidza nekusungwa pamwe nekukanganiswa pakushanda. Mumwe mutori wenhau wekuManicaland, Sydney Saize akasungwa mugovera achiita basa rake. Asi hurumende iri kuramba mashoko ekuti iri kushungurudza vatori venhau ichiti iri kutoisa mitemo yekurerutsira vatori venhau. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane mitemo yakawanda yadzikwa kurerutsira vatori venhau. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau, rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti hurumende inofanira kumisa tsika yekumbunyikidza kodzero dzevatori venhau sezvo zvichikanganisa nyaya yehutongo hwejekerere. Zuva reWorld Press Freedom Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa 3 Chivabvu gore rega rega uye gore rino ririkucherechedzwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekukosha kwekuburitswa kwemashoko kuruzhinji kana kuti “information as a public good." No media source currently available

headline: Nyika Yoita Sarudzo dzemaBy-Election Dziri Kunzi neVanopikisa Kutungana KweMbudzi
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission amai Rita Makarau vanoti sangano ravo ragadzirira kuita sarudzo dzemaby-elections dziri kuitwa kuMbire, Epworth neMarondera Central. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa mubato reZanu-PF kwaVaDavid Butau uye VaRay Kaukonde kuMarondera Central. Vaviri ava vaipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika amai Joyce Mujuru vakadzingwawo mubato. KuEpworth kuri kuitwa sarudzo mushure mekushaya kwaVaAmos Midzi veZanu-PF. Vanhu varikukurudzirwa nezec kuti vauye nemapepa chaiwo ekuvhota kwete madrivers license. Amai Rita Makarau sachigaro weZEC vanoti vavhoti vanofanira kuuya nezvitupa zvinoonekwa kwete madrivers license. No media source currently available  Tichiri panyaya iyi mutauriri wesangano rinoongorora sarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Election Support Network Amai Ellen Dingane vanoti zvinhu zvirikufamba zvakanaka parezvino. No media source currently available Mapato achakwikwidza kuEpworth anosanganisira Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe neZAPU. KuMarondera kuchakwikwidza Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe, Freedom Front ne National Constitutional Assembly uye kuMbire kuchakwikwidza Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe neNCA. Asi mapatao akaita seMDC ne People’s Democratic Party ari kuramwa kupinda musarudzo idzi achiti mitemo yesarudzo iripo yakarerekera kubatsira bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF kuti rikunde. Asi bato reZanu-PF rinoti zviri kutaurwa izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Bato iri rinoti veMDC vanotya kukundwa musarudzo.

headline: Mutumbi waVaMugabe Wotarisirwa Munyika neChitatu Masikati
text: Mutumbi wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, uchasvika muHarare neChitatu masikati uye ndipo pachaziviswa hurongwa kwekuradzikwa kwavo. Izvi zvaziviswa negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwamashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota. Amai Mutsvangwa vati pane makomiti ehurumende ari kugadzirira hurongwa kwekuradzikwa kwaVaMugabe. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei zviri kutora nguva kutaura kucharadzikwa VaMugabe, Amai Mutsvangwa pamwe nekugurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vati hapana chinoshamisa pane zviri kuitika vachiti hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwavo huchaziviswa mushure mekunge mhuri yaVaMugabe, iyo iri kuSingapore, yasvika munyika. Vati hurumende nemhuri yaVaMugabe zviri kuronga pamwe chete hurongwa uhu. Ukuwo mutauriri wemadzimambo edzinza raVaMugabe, Mambo Katizagombo, avo vanonzi Gibson Jenami, vati hapachisina makakatanwa pamusoro pekuvigwa kwaVaMugabe sezvo hurumende, ichitungamirirwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yave pamberi pezvose zvichaitwa. Ukowo Major General Trust Mugoba, avo vakashayawo svondo rapfuura, vacharadzikwa neChitatu panzvimbo inovigwa magamba yeHeroes Acre muHarare. Mune imwewo nyaya hurumende inoti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zana nemakumi manomwe nezvisere zvakabatwa batwa nemhirizhonga iri kuitika kuSouth Africa uye pane vanhu vaviri vekuZimbabwe vakashaya mumhirizhonga iyi. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kuronga kuunza vanhu ava nemitumbi yevaviri ava kumusha. Hurumende inotiwo vashandi mubazi rezvehutano kusanganisira vana chiremba vakatobhadharwa mari yakawedzerwa neezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana yekuti vabatsirikane uye nhasi dare remakurukota raita chisungo chekuti bazi rezvehutano nemari zvigare pasi kuona kuti vashandi ava vapihwa mari dzinofadza. Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vati vachagara pasi nebazi rezvemari kuona kuti chisungo chedare remakurukota chatevedzwa. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa svondo rapfuura vachitsutsumwa kuti mari dzavo dzemihoro hadzina zvadzichabatsira. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzotyira Kuti Hutachiwana Hwakatanga kuIndia Hungandai Hwave Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neCovid-19, uye vamwe makumi maviri nevashanu, vaviri vavo vari vakabva kuIndia, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri. Vamwe vanomwe pavanhu ava vanhu vanonzi vakasangana nevakabva kuIndia ava. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika kubva zvachatanga hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe, kana kuti 38 491 uye vanhu vafa vasvikawo pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu ane makumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 582. Kuwanikwa kwevanhu vakabva kuIndia vaine chirwere ichi kunonzi nenyanzvi yezvehutano uye vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, chinhu chinotyisa zvikuru pachitariswa kuti nyika iyi iri kutambudzwa nehutachiwana hweB.1.617, uhwo hunonzi hwakatanga kuonekwa ikoko uye huri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation, W-H-O, rinoti hutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu hunotapuriranwa nyore kudarika humwe hwose. Pari zvino nyika dzemuAfrica nomwe dzinoti Algeria, D-R-C, Kenya, Uganda, Morocco, Nigeria neSouth Africa dzinonzi neW-H-O dzakatove nehutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana, kana kuti 24 million, vabatwa nedenda reCovid-19 muIndia kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi, uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri, kana kuti 262 000, vafa nacho munyika iyi. Asi Dr. Munatsi vanoti hazvishamisi kuti hutachiwana uhwu hunogona kunge hwave munyika pachionekwa kuti pane vanhu vakatobva kunyika iyi vakabatwa vaine Covid-19. Vanokurudzira kusimbiswa kwenyaya dzekuvhenekwa kwehutachiwana uyewo kuti pateverwe vose vangadai vakasangana nevanhu ava senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana uhwu. No media source currently available Mukuru anoona nezvekurwiswa kweCovid-19 munyika, Dr. Agnes Mahomva vanoti pari zvino vari mubishi kumhanyamhanya kuvheneka zvavainazvo kuti vaone kuti hutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu hwapinda here muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Dr. Mahomva vanoti zvisineyi nekuti hutachiwana hwabva kuIndia here kana kupi, vanhu vanofanirwa kungoramba vachitora matanho ekugeza maoko nemvura nesipo, kusaungana, vachiti zvese izvozvo zvinobatsira kuvharidzira chirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe kana kuti 21 000 vakabaiwa nhomba nezuro wakare. Vanhu zviuru gumi nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 10 078 vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga, kuchiti vamwe zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe, kana kuti 11 577 vachibaiwa nhomba yepiri. Huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi hwakasvika pazviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nezvipfumbamwe zvine mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 559 875. Vanhu zviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe nezana nemakumi mana nevashanu, kana kuti 192 145, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri kusvika nemusi weChina.

headline: Zimbabwe Yovimbiswa neChina Nhomba yeChirwere cheCovid-19
text: China yazivisa kuti Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika gumi neina dzichatanga kuwana rubatsiro rwemajekiseni enhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 pasi pechirongwa chayo chekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira kuti dziwane mishonga iyi. Izvi zvaziviswa nemutauriri webazi rekuChina rinoona nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaWang Wenbin, avo vati mishonga iyi yakagadzirwa munyika mavo uye zvavari kuita izvi kuzadzisa chitsiidzo chaikaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika yavo, VaXI Jingpin. China yatiwo ichabatsira zvekare dzimwe nyika dzichiri kubudirira makumi matatu nesere pachikamu chinotevera uye ichapinda muchirongwa cheWorld Health Organisations cheCOVAX. Nyika iyi inotiwo mishonga yakaita seichapihwa Zimbabwe iyo yakagadzirwa nekambani yeSinopham neSinovac, yakatoendeswa kunyika dzakaita seUnited Arab Emirates, Brazil neChile. VaWenbin vati nyika dzepasi rese dzinofanira kubatana mukurwisa Covid-19 vachiti China icharamba ichibatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira nedzinotambura nemishonga. Vatiwo vanovimba kuti nyika dzakabudirira dzichaita zvimwezvo kuitira kuti munhu wese awane mushonga wekudzivirira Covid-19. Muchiziviso chavo, VaWenbin havana kuzivisa kuti Zimbabwe ichawana mishonga yakawanda zvakadii pasi pechirongwa ichi. Dzimwe nyika dzichawanda rubatsiro neZimbabwe in Pakistan, Brunei, Nepal, Philippines, Myanmar, Cambodia, Laos, Sri Lanka, Mongolia, Palestine, Belarus, Siera Leone neEquatorial Guinea. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kudivi rehurumende sezvo mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa edenda reCovid-19 mumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vange vakabatikana panguva yataenda pamhepo. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners Association of Zimbabwe, Dr Johannes Marisa, vati zvaitwa neChina zvakanaka nekuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inogona kunge isina mari yekutenga mishonga inokwanira munhu wese. Vati mabatirwe ari kuitwa vanhu nehutachiwana hweCovid-19 anoratidza kuti mishonga yenhomba iyi ndiyo yakakosha pakubatsira kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vakazvipira kushanda nehurumende mukudzidzisa vakoti vevamwe kuti mishonga iyi inoshandiswa sei. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti zvipatara nemakirinika zvitange kugadzirira nzvimbo dzekuchengetera mishonga iyi sezvo ichinzi inofanira kuchengetedzwa panotonhora. Zvichakadai, vaimbove nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, VaPrince Dubeko Sibanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo zviri kuitwa neChina zvakanaka, zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende haisati yazivisa veruzhinji kuti hurongwa hwayo pakutenga nekupa vanhu mishonga yeCovid-19 hwakamira sei. VaSibanda vatiwo hapana kuchejeka pakushandiswa kwezvinhu zvinenge zvapihwa pachena nedzimwe nyika. Mashoko eChina anouuya apo hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti masangano anopa rubatsiro ari kubatsira nyika nemari inoita mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemana emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica kurwisana neCovid-19 pamwe nezvirwere zvakaita seBP neDiabetes. Mari iyi inosanganisira mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe nemadhora ekuAmerica yakabva kuGlobal Fund iyo yave kutoshandiswa kutenga zvekudzivirira varapi kana kuti Personal Protective Equipment, mishonga pamwe nezvinoshandiswa kuongorora hutachiwana hweCovid-19. Hurumende pachayo inoti ine mamiriyoni zana emadhora ekuAmerica ekutenga mishonga yekudzivirira Covid-19 munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nenshanu, kana kuti US$15 million. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reNCA Rokwirira VaMugabe Dare
text: Bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, rinoti ratuma magweta aro kuti akwire kudare repamusoro soro reConstitutional Court, achimisa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kugadza vatevedzeri vavo vaviri richiti zviri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri webato iri, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti bumbiro remitemo idzva rinoti VaMugabe vaifanirwa kunge vakadoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri sarudzo dzichangopera, kwete kuzozviita kwapera gore sarudzo dzaitwa. VaChivasa vanoti bato ravo riri kutevera Sixth Schedule paragraph 14 sub-paragraph iyo vanoti inoti VaMugabe vaifanirwa kudoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri pasina kunonoka. Imwe nyaya inonzi naVaChivasa iri mugwaro ravo riri kuenda kudare ndeyekuti hutungamiri hwenyika hwaVaMugabe nevatevedzeri vavo vaviri hahunawo munhukadzi sezvinotarisirwa munyika ine vanhukadzi vakawanda kudarika vanhurume. VaChivasa vanoti magweta avo eMbidzo, Muchadehama and Makoni achaendesa mapepa aya chekutanga neChishanu mangwanani. VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kutoresa mhiko VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe naVaPelekezela Mphoko sevatevedzeri vavo vaviri. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo inodzidzisa paKent University kuBritain, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti nyaya yeNCA inonakidza kutevera. Vanoti chikamu chemutemo chiri kushandiswa nebato iri nechinonzi chakashandiswawo naVaMugabe zvinonetsa kunyatsonzwisisa asi vanoti dare repamusorosoro iri rinogonawo kuramba kutambira nyaya iyi. Zvichakadaro, bato reMDC T rinotiwo riri kuronga kuroverera VaMugabe nemhosva yekutyora bumbiro remitemo nekudzinga kwavakaita mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Joice Mujuru, kubva pachigaro richishandisa nhengo dzaro mudare reparamende. Mutauriri webato iri, VaObert Gutu, vaudza bepanhau reNewsDay kuti VaMugabe vakazvidza bumbiro renyika nekudzinga kwavakaita Amai Mujuru, vachiti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika anofanirwa kudzingwa chete pachiteverwa bumbiro renyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vorega Kunotora Mari Dzavo dzeMudyandigere
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzemudyandigere kana kuti Insurance and Pension Commission-IPEC, inoti kune mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe isati yatorwa nevanhu vakaenda pamudyandigere. Vachitaura nhasi muChinhoyi pamusangano waitwa nekomisheni iyi nevanochengeta mari inobhadharwa nevashandi yemudyandigere mukuru anoona nezvekudyidzana mukomisheni VaLlyod Gumbo vanoti vari kushushikana nekusatorwa kwemari yakawanda zvakadaro. VaGumbo vanoti mari iyi inofanirwa kubhadharwa kuvanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana mashanu. VaGumbo vakurudzira vose vakambobhadhara mari yemudyandigere asi vasina kuzoitora kuti vaende kwavaibhadhara mari kana kukambani dzavaishandira vanobvunza nekuti mari iyi hapana munhu anogona kuitora kunze kwemuridzi wayo chete. Mumwe mushandi apinda mumusangano wanhasi VaPrince Mpala vanoti mari dzemudyandigere dziri kupihwa vanhu ishoma zvichienzaniswa nemari yavanenge vabhadhara uye vanopihwa mari isisina huremu. VaMpala vanoti mari dzemudyandigere dzakabhadharwa iri mari yekuAmerica dzinofanirwa kubhadharwa dzichishaswa reti (rate) inenge ichishandiswa nguva iyoyo yeInterbank rate Gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Sekai Nzenza vakatenda kuti mari dziri kutambirwa nevashandi dzishoma uye vakati vanoda kuita hurukuro negurukota rezvemari muzvinmafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti mari idzi dziwedzerwe. Mumwe mukuru weKomisheni iyi VaJosphat Kakwere vanoti vashandi vanofanirwa kutaurira mhuri dzavo kuti vari kubhadhara mari yemudyandigere kwete kuvanza sezvinoita vakawanda. VaGumbo vanoti mari iyi ikagara makore mashanu iri muPension Fund isati yatorwa inozoendeswa muGuardian Fund uko inogara kwemakore makumi matatu yakamirira kutorwa nemuridzi wayo.

headline: Munyori Mukuru weMDC VaHwende Vomiswa Pamberi peDare Vachinzi Vaida Kupidigura Hurumende
text: Munyori mukuru webato rinopikisa, reMDC, VaCharlton Hwende, vamiswa pamberi pedare nhasi gweta ravo, VaHarrison Nkomo vachiti nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vaida kupidigura hurumende iraswe. Asi vachuchusi vehurumende vatsika madziro vachiti nyaya iyi izotongwazve rimwe zuva. Dare rati nyaya iyi izonzwikwa musi wa 2 mwedzi unouya. Vanoona nezvemutemo muMDC, VaInnocent Gonese, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirikuitwa nehurumende hazvina kunaka uye hazvisi pamutemo. VaGonese vati VaHwende vakasungwa musi wa 6 Kurume gore rakapera asi varikuramba vachingonzi vadzoke kudare redzimhosva zvinoratidza kuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa ndeye manyepo. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro bato reMDC, pamwe chete nesangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions vari kupomera mapurisa mhosva yekuvarambidza kuita misangano yavo munyika. Izvi zvinotevera kurambidzwa kwemutevedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC, VaJob Sikhala, kuita musangano nevanhu vavanomirira kuZengeza West uye kurambidzwa kweZCTU kuita musango nenhengo dzaro kwaMutare nemusi weChitatu. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa haana simba rekubvumidza kana kurambidza misangano. No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera Anodarika Mazana Mana Anodzingwa Basa, Mitumbi Ichiorera Mumamochari
text: Hurumende inonzi yadzinga basa vana chiremba mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevashanu basa vari kuramwa mabasa pakusvika mukuvira kwezuva remusi weChitatu. Madhokotera aya ari kudzingwa basa zvichitevera kuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekutyora mitemo yebasa nekomiti inoranga vanokanganisa pamabasa. Sangano reHealth Service Board rinoti madhokotera aya arikudzingwa basa pachitevedzwa mitemo inobata vashandirwi nevashandi vavo. Sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health rinoti zvitunha zvave kuworera mumamochari emuzvipatara zvehurumende nekushaya vanachiremba vanovhiya kuti pabude chirwere chinenge chapa kuti murwere afe. Sachigharo wesangano reHealth Service Board, Dr. Paulinus Sikosana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti matare ekunzwa mhosva dziri kupomerwa vanachiremba ava kuzvipatara zvavo ari kuenderera mberi uye vakawanda vari kutarisirwa kudzingwa basa pamusoro pevadzingwa basa ava. Panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora mabasa evari kudzingwa ava, Dr. Sikosana vati vainge vanyora tsamba kumunyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr. Agnes Mahomva, kuti vaone kuti zvipatara zvingashande sei. Asi Dr. Mahomva vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo,apo taedza kunzwa divi ravo. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi wa 3 Gunyana vachiti mari dzavari kutambiriswa hadzisi kuvakwanira. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vamwe vanhu vave kungorwara nekufira kumba vamwe vachienda kuzvipatara zvinenge zvichiri kushanda zvakaita seKaranda Hospital kuMt Darwin. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vangatungamire AU neSADC Zvisina Dambudziko?
text: Kunetsana kunotyisa kuri kuenderera mberi mubato reZanu-PF kwave kupa kuti dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziti zvichanetsa kuti mutungamiri wenyika akwanise kubata husachigaro hweAfrican Union neSADC uko bato rake nenyika zvichibvira. African Union, iyo iri kuita musangano kuAddis Ababa, Ethiopia iri kutarisirwa kudoma VaMugabe sasachigaro sezvo pari zvino vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro. Kazhinji mutevedzeri wasachigaro ndiye anowanzotora chigaro chasachigaro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaBlessing Vava, avo vakambotungamira sangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe Natioanl Students Union, vanoti mutoro uyu mukuru kuna VaMugabe vava mukweguri. VaMugabe vari kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nerimwe mwedzi unouya Kukadzi. VaVava vanoti VaMugabe vachapedza nguva yakawanda vachitarisa matambudziko ekunze kwete emuZimbabwe. No media source currently available Asi nhengo yePolitburo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti VaMugabe mutungamiri ane njere anokwanisa kuita mabasa aya ose. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votarisirwa Kutanga Kubayiwa Nhomba yeSinopharm neMusi weChina
text: Hurumende iri kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 nemusi weChina uye inoti vachabayiwa pachikamu chekutanga chechirongwa ichi vanosanganisira machiremba, vakoti nevamwe vashandi vezvehutano. Izvi zvinotevera kupedza nemusi weChitatu kwekudzidziswa kwemashandisirwo enhomba iyi kwaitwa vashandi vehutano munyika yose. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemshoko, Seneta Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti vashandi vehutano vange vari kudzidziswawo zvinhu zvakaita sekuti mishonga iyi inochengetwa sei. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dziri kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi munyika yose. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevamwe vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi asi VaDongo vati hapana chakanyanyooma pazvidzidzo izvi sezvo vakoti vagara vachibaya nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere. Vati vange vachitarisira kuti zvidzidzo izvi zvivape vakoti ruzivo pamusoro pemashandiro enhomba yeSinopharm. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota neChipiri manheru, Amai Mutsvangwa vakati nhomba iyi ichaendendeswa kumatunhu pachishandiswa nzira dzinoendeswa mimwe mishonga. Vakatiwo kunze kwevashandi vehutano, vamwe vachabayiwa pachikamu chekutanga mauto, mapurisa nemagadhijere uyewo vashandi veZimbabwe Revenue Authority pamwe neAgritex. Pachikamu chechipiri pachabaiwa varairidzi vezvikoro zvepasi nezvepamusoro uye vamwe vese vachabaiwa pasi pechikamu chekupedzesera. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti vese vachabaiwa vachanyorwa mazita avo pasi uye vachaudzwa kuti vachazobaiwa riini zvekare sezvo vachifanira kubaiwa kaviri. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi izvo zvichaita mari inodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana manomwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica. South Africa yakaparura hurongwa hwayo hwekubaya nhomba iyi neChitatu mutungamiriri wenyika iyi, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vachibaiwa veruzhinji vachiona. . No media source currently available

headline: VaTony Blair Vanoti Vakagadzirira Kuita Hurukuro naVaMnangagwa Asi Vachiti Ngavawandudze Zvinhu
text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain VaTony Blair vanoti vakagadzirira kuita hurukuro nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa asi vachivakurudzira kuti vawandudze zvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Zimbabwe parizvino iri kushorwa zvakanyanya neUnited Nations nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu, uye kuva nechekuita nekupambwa kwevanhu nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. Asi hurumende iri kuti pane vari kukurudzira kuti ipidigurwe nechisimba. Vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeCNBC Africa, VaBlair vanoti Zimbabwe ine mukana wekuti ive pakati penyika dzakabudirira. Hurumende yaVaBlair muna 1997 yacheka hukama neZimbabwe mushure mekutadza kuwirirana panyaya yekugoverwa kwevhu kuvatema. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaSibusiso Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti nhaurirano hadzina kuipa asi kuta kuti hurumende yeZanu-PF ivandudze zvinhu mutoro mukuru. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti MDC Alliance Ndiyo Ichaumba Hurumende Itsva
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti mubatanidzwa wavo weMDC Alliance ndiwo uchaumba hurumende itsva mushure mesarudzo dzegore rino. Vachitaura kuzviuru zvevanhu vaungana munhandare yePfupajena muChegutu, VaChamisa vati zviri pachena kuti ndivo vachaumba hurumende itsva mushure mesarudzo dzegore rino. VaChamisa vati havasi ivo vega vari kuzviziva vachiti vari muhurumende, nemunhu wese ari kuzviziva nekuzvinzwa vachiti vangomirira nguva yekuti zvizadziswe. VaChamisa vati zvavari kutaura pamisangano yavo zviri kunzwikwa nevakuru vakuru muhurumende vanosanganisira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vave kuzvitevedzera. VaChamisa vati hapana chakaipa kuti vechidiki vatonge nyika ino sezvo VaChiwenga nevamwe vavo vakaenda kuhondo vari vadiki. VaChamisa vati manifesto yebato reZanu PF yakaparurwa zviri pamutemo neChishanu, ipfungwa dzavo dzavaitaura dzakatorwa nebato iri, asi vati chakasiyana ndechekuti bato reZanu PF harigone kuita zvarakanyorwa mugwaro iri. VaChamisa vati ndosaka nhengo dzavo dzaitsvaga rutsigiro rwesarudzo dzema primary adzo vaiti vakavhoterwa vachagadzirisa migwagwa, vachikanganwa kuti ndivo vari panyanga vari kutadza kugadzirisa migwagwa yacho. Mumwe apinda musangano uyu, VaNorman Waze, vati zvataurwa naVaChamisa zvinoitika sezvo zvakaitwa nedzimwe nyika uye vakazviita panyaya yenharembozha pavanga vari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa. VaChamisa vatiwo vachange vari mhiri kwemakungwa naVaTendai Biti neChipiri vachitaura nevemabhizinisi kuti vagadzirire kuuya kana vaumba hurumende yavo mushure mesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhindauko Oraramisa Vamwe Vari Kunze kweNyika
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvakabuda munyika zvichinotsvaga mafuro manyoro munyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe, zviine tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichakasika kunaka kumusha zvodzokera. Asi tarisiro iyi inenge yaramba chave chiroto chisingabatiki, izvo zvoita kuti vamwe vakaita saVaLovejoy Chinhema, avo vari kuMaputo, kuMozambique, vatange mabhindauko anopa raramo. VaChinhema vanoti vakabatana nevamwe vana veZimbabwe vakavhura zvitoro zvinotengesa zvinhu zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbatya nemagumbeze. VaChinhema vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vatanhatu vanotenga zvinhu kuSouth Africa neSwaziland zvavanozotengesa kuMozambique. VaChiinhema vanoti vane vashandi vavakatopinzawo mabasa vanove zvakare vana veZimbabwe. Asi VaChinhema vanoti kudhonha kwemari yekuSouth Africa kwakambozunguza bhizimusi ravo zvishoma sezvo vakanga vasisakwanisi kunotenga zvinhu zvemuzvitoro zvavo kuZimbabwe nekuti mari yekuAmerica inonzi ndiyo iri kunyanyodiwa muZimbabwe yakange yave nesimba rakanyanya. Asi vanoti vari kukwanisa zvavo kuraramisa mhuri dzavo zvichienzaniswa nekunge dai vari kumusha. “Tinonyanyohodha ma duvet nembatya zvinozotengeswa mumarukisheni nevanhu vatakapawo mabasa,” VaChinhema vanodaro. Vanoti madzimai avo kumusha akasara achiitawo mabhindauko ekusona mbatya dzekutengesa. Asi vanoti chishuvo chavo chikuru ndechekuti dai zvinhu zvakasika kunaka kuitira kuti vadzokere kumusha. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuwanisa Mishonga Inodzivirira Kudzoka kweGomarara repaZamu Kune Vanenge Vambobatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Nyanzvi mune zvegomarara remazamu dzinoti zvakakosha kuti pawaniswe mishonga inodzivirira kuti vanenge vambobatwa nechirwere ichi vasazodzokororwe nacho, ukuwo hurumende ichi kurudzirwawo kuti itore matanho anoitwa kuti kurapwa kwemagomarara kuve nyore munyika. Izvi zvabuda neChishanu apo nyanzvi mune zvegomarara dzasangana pachipatara cheParirenyatwa icho change chichitambidzwa mapiritsi eTamoxifen akatsvagwa nesangano reCancerserve ayo anobatsira kuti vanenge vamboita gomarara remazamu vasazobatwe naro zvekare. Vachitaura mushure mechiitiko ichi, nyanzvi mune zvekurapwa kwechirwere chegomarara, uye vari ivo vakatanga sangano reCancerserve, Doctor Anna Mary Nyakabau, vati mushonga weTamoxifen wakakosha mukudzivirira kudzoka kwechirwere chegomarara rezamu. Asi vati pane vamwe vasingakwanisi kutenga mushonga uyu, uyo unonwiwa kwemakore ari pakati pemashanu negumi, nekudaro zvakakosha kuti vanoshaya cheuviri vabatsirwe mukuwana mishonga iyi. Vachitambira mushonga uyu pachiitiko ichi, mukuru weRadiotherapy pachipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals, Doctor Nothando Mutizira, vati mushonga weTamoxifen unopiwa mushure mekunge munhu arapwa akapora. Dr Mutizira vati mishonga iyi yakakosha mukurwisa denda regomarara remazamu kuti risadzoke zvakare. Vachitaurawo pachiitiko chanhasi ichi, VaItai Mabasa Bopoto, avo vakatobviswawo rimwe zamu nekuda kwegomarara iri uye vatove pamishonga yeTamoxifen, vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende itore matanho anoita kuti chirwere chegomarara ichi chirapwewo pachena munyika pamwe nekuona kuti michina yekushandisa iripo. VaBopoto vati vakatozopona kubva kuchirwere ichi nekuda kwerubatsiro rwavakawana kumhuri neshamwari dzavo, vakati kurapwa kwechirwere ichi kunoda makunun’unu emadhora. Vati nguva zhinji michina mishoma iri kuzvipatara zvehurumende zvakadai seParirenyatwa inenge yakafa. Izvi zvinogarochemwa chemwa nazvo nevanhu vakawanda vanobatwa chirwere chegomarara. Vataura pachiitiko ichi vakamiririra munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Aspect Jacob Maunganidze vati hurumende inokoshesa zvakanyanya kudzivirirwa kwechirwere chegomarara remazamu uyewo vakati vari kushandawo nevamwe vanobatsira kuti mishonga yakaita seTamoxifen iwanikwe pachena munyika. VaMaunganidze vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzirisa dambudziko remichina. Mishonga yapiwa chipatara cheParirenyatwa inonzi ichabatsira vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere (380), avo vasingakwanisi kutenga mishonga iyi kwegore rese. Gomarara rezamu rinobata zvese vanhukadzi nevanhurume asi kumadzimai rinonzi ndiyo mhando yegomarara inotevera gomarara rechibereko mukuuraya madzimai zvakanyanya munyika. Mwedzi uno waGumiguru mwedzi wekuyeuchidzana pamusoro pechirwere chegomarara repamazamu, kana kuti breast Cancer Awareness Month. Vanhurume munyika vanonzi vari kukurudzirwawo zvakanyanya kuti vaende kunoongororwa kana vaine gomarara repamazamu sezvinota vanhukadzi senzira yekuti dzivirira kana kukasika kurapwa kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19 Chakapinda muZuva Retatu Panguva Iyo EU Ichiti Ichawanisa Zimbabwe Imwe Nhomba
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu kuti kusvika nenguva dzeina dzemasikati, vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19 vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nevana, kana kuti 2 074, vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nyika yose. Izvi zvakaitika apo chirongwa chekubaya nyika yose chakapinda muzuva retatu. Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti vanhu vasere vakafa kana kuti 8, uye vamwe makumi mashanu kana kuti 50, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu chiuru nemazana masere nevana, kana kuti 1 804, vakavhenekwa. Vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 154, vakanga vari muchipatara pakupera kwezuva musi weChipiri. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 nyika yose hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhtatu, kana kuti 35 960, kuchitiwo vanhu vafa kubva patanga chirwere ichi nyika yose vakasvika pachiuru nemazana mana ane makumi mashanu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 456. Zvichakadaro, sangano reEuropean Union rinoti Zimbabwe munguva pfupi inotevera iri kutarisirwa kuwana nhomba inodarika miriyoni imwe chete kana kuti 1, 152 million, pasi pechirongwa che Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations, kana kuti COVAX. Izvi zvakabuda padandemutande reTwitter reEU. Chirongwa cheCOVAX chinotungamirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization richibatsirwa nemasangano akasiyanasiyana, kunyanya reEuropean Union, uye chakanangana nekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira. Pari zvino Zimbabwe yakapihwa nhomba zviuru mazana maviri, kana kuti 200 000, kubva kuChina, iyo yakatanga kubayiwa muHarare svondo rapera uye mamwe matunhu kutanga neMuvhuro. China yakazivisa neChitatu kuti ichapa Zimbabwe imwe nhomba zviuru mazana maviri. Zimbabwe inoti yakatenga imwe nhomba zviuru mazana matanhatu kubva kuChina inosvika mukupera kwemwedzi uno. Asi vakuru mubazi rezvehutano vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vanhu vari kuuya kuzobayiwa vachiri vashoma. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr. Brighton Chireka vanoti vanotenda bazi rezvehutano nedanho rayakatora rekuti vashandi vezvehutano vave pakati pevanhu vakatanga kubaiwa nhomba munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshora Hurumende Iri Kuda Kuomesera Vashandisi veMadandemutande
text: No media source currently available Nyanzvi dzinoti hurumende inogona kuvhara madandemutande kana kushungurudza vanoashandisa sekuvimbisa kwayakaita asi izvi zvinosvibisa chimiro chenyika pamwe nekuti irasikirwe nebhizimisi rakwanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemashoko nematongerwo enyika dzinoti veruzhinji vanofanira kutora mashoko ehurumende zvakadzama sezvo hurumende ichikwanisa kuita zvairi kutaura. Mudzidzisi wezvekutapwa kwenhau pachikoro cheChristian College of Southern Africa, VaDonald Mukota, vanoti pane dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatombovhara madandemutande kana kusunga vanoashandisa, saka zvinogona kuitika muZimbabwe. Asi vanoti izvi handizvo zvingaite kuti vanhu vatadze kushandisa madandemutande. Asi vanotiwo vanhu vanofanira kushandisa madandemutande mune zvakanaka. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti hazvibatsiri kuvhara madandemutande uye kana hurumende yaita izvi, inenge yaratidza pachena kuti haidi hutongo hwejekerere. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti zvekuvhara madandemutande zvinoitwa nehurumende dzine hudzvanyiriri uye dzine zvadzinoda kuvanza. Vanoti zvinoda mari yakawanda chose kuvhara madandemutande uye hurumende dzisina mari dzakaita seyeZimbabwe dzinogona kunetsekana kuita izvi. Asi vanoti Zimbabwe inogona kuwana rubatsiro rwekuita izvi kubva kunyika dzakaita seChina. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuronga kuomesera vanhu vanoshandisa madandemutande iyo iri iyo nzira yave kushandiswa neveruzhinji kufambisa mashoko pamwe nekunzwa nhau kubva mukati nekunze kwenyika. Muzvare Majama Nyoni, avo vachangobva kumusangano we Forum on Internet Freedom in Africa wakaitirwa kuSouth Africa svondo rapfuura, vati zvakabuda pamusangano uyu zvinoratidza kuti nyika inorasikirwa nemari yakawanda chose kana madandemutande akavharwa kana kuvhiringwa. Sangano reCollaboration on International ICT Policy for East and South Africa rinoti kuvharwa kwemadandemutande kwakaita kuti nyika dzeSub Saharan Africa dzirasikirwe nemari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora.

headline: Hurumende Yoendesa VanaHutsana kuRufu neKune Mamwe Magungano Kuyedza Kurwisa Cholera
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakaudza dare reparamende kuti hurumende ichange ichitumira vanahutsana kumachechi, kurufu nepamwe pose panoungana vanhu zvikuru muChegutu nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza kuti vaona kuti chirwere cheCholera hachirambe chichipararira. Vanhu vana vanonzi nehurumende vakafa nechirwere ichi uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nemashanu vanonzi vanifungidzirwa kuti vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi. Doctor Fortune Nyamande vanoti zviri kutaurwa naDr Parirenyatwa panyaya yavana hutsanana ndizvo chaizvo zvinofanira kuitwa kuti cholera isapararire munyika. Vakurudzirawo vanhu kuti kana vakafungidzira kuti munhu abatwa nechirwere ichi vamupe mvura ine munyu netsvigiri kana kuti "salt sugar solution" apo vanenge vachienda naye kuchipatara.

headline: MDC Inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa Yotsamwiswa neKusungwa kweVakuru veZCTU.
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti haisi kufara nemabatirwo aitwa nhengo dze ZCTU. MDC inoti dzimwe nyika nemasangano akaita se European Union ne United Nations, anofanirwa kuona hutongi huri kushandiswa munyika nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Bato rinopikisa iri rinoti mabatirwo ari kuitwa vanhu nehurumende haana kunaka. Mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiri ve MDC, VaMorgen Komichi, vaudza Evans Zininga kuti dambudziko guru riri munyika inyaya yekusatambirika kwehurumende yaVaMnangagwa iyo yavanoti yakapinda panyanga zvisiri pamutemo. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyiika vachidzidzisa ku Tshwane University of Technology, Doctor Ricky Munyaradzi Mukonza, vanoti mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika anoda kuti zvematongerwo enyika zvigadziriswe. Doctor Mukonza vanoti hapana shanduko yakanyaya yavanoona muhurumende yaVa Mnangagwa vachiifananidza neyaVa Robert Mugabe avo vakasiyiswa basa nemauto gore rakapera muna Mbudzi. Vanotiwo vimbiso dzehurumende hadzisi kutevedzerwa sekusungwa kwadzinenge dzaitwa. Vanoti nyika yave kudzokera kumatambudziko egore ra 2008 iro rakange rakaremera vazhinji.

headline: Mutongo paChikumbiro ChaVaSikhala neVamwe Chekubvisa Mari yeChibatiso Wotarisirwa neChishanu
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzebato reCitizens Coalition for change VaJob Sikhala, Zengeza West, naVaGodfrey Sithole, Chitungwiza North dzange dziri mudare ramejastiriti nhasi dzichikumbira dare kuti dzipihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Magweta avo anoti vagarisa mutirongo uye mhosva yavari kupomerwa haina kunyatsori tsvikiti. Mutongi wedare ramejastiriti VaStanford Mambanje vati vachapa mutongo wavo nemusi weChishanu. Asi mapurisa ange akapakatira zvombo adzinga vatsigiri vebato iri vange vauya kuzotsigira vasungewa ava. VaSikhala naVaSithole nevamwe vatsigiri vebato iri vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime mushure mekupondwa kwenhengo yebato ravo Muzvare Moreblessing Ali. Asi vebato reCCC vanoti vari kkatyamadzwa kuti sei mapurisa asina kusunga vamwe vaZanu-PF vakabuda pamavhidhiyo vachipesvedzera mhirizhonga. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana akamhan;ara nyaya yacho. VaSikhala, VaSithole nevamwe vatsigiri vebato iri vakanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare ramejastiriti vachinzi vanogona kuramba vachikonzera mhirizhonga. Mune imwe nyaya, mutauriri webato reCCC Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vati sachigaro wevechidiki mubato kuChitungwiza South VaEphrage Gwavava vatorwa nevanhu vange vachizviti mapurisa ekudema mangwanani. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi.

headline: Zimbabwe Haisati Yavhura Mabhodha Ayo?
text: Vamiriri vehurumende kumuganho weBeitbridge neSouth Africa vanonzi nezuro vakazivisa kuti nyika haisi kuzovhura miganho yayo nhasi, zuva riri kuvhurwawo miganho yenyika yeSouth Africa, sezvanga zvakatarisirwa nevakawana. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross-Border Traders Associationa, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vakaudzwa nezvedanho iri nezuro pamusangano wavakaita nevamiriri ava. South Africa inonzi yakazivisa kuti yaizovhura miganho yayo nhasi, izvo zvakapawo vana veZimbabwe tarisiro yekuti nyika yavo yaizoitawo zvimwechete. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe yakagara yazivisa zvayo kare kuti yaizovhura chete nhandare dzendege musi wa 01 Gumiguru, unove nhasi. Miganho pamwe nenhandare dzendege zvakavharwa muna Kurume senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kanawo munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, kunyange hazvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichirira. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vatiwo vanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya iyi. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaJuru. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzonwa Mushonga Unodzivirira Korera
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzapihwa mishonga yekudzivirira korera senzira yekukurudzira kuti vaparidze kunzvimbo dzavo nyaya yekudzivirira chirwere chekorera. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapurirana mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Portia Manangazira, vaudza Studio7, kuti vafara chose kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichida kuziva pamusoro pekorera nezvimwe zvirwere zvemudumbu. Vatiwo vanovimba kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzichavabatsira kusvitsa mharidzo yavo kumachechi anorambidza nhengo dzawo kuti dzinwe mishonga yekudzivirira zvirwere. Imwe nhengo yeparamende zvakare vari sachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Tabitah Khumalo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vachakurudzira vanhu munharaunda dzavo kuti vaitewo sazvavaita nhasi. Mumiriri weMbizo, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vatiwo vatora mushonga senzira yekukurudzira vanhu vemunzvimbo kuti vazvidzivirire kukorera. Nynzvi munyaya dzehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vamwe mushonga wekudzivirira korera, uyo uri kupihwa pachena. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere chekorera icho chinorapika nyore. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mapfumamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi.

headline: Kanzuru yeHarare Yotsvaga Rubatsiro RweKutakurwa kweMarara Kune Veruzhinji neMakambani
text: Kanzuru yeHarare neMuvhuro yakaburitsa gwaro rekukumbira rubatsiro kune vemakambani pamwe nevagari kuti ibatsirwe kugadzirisa motokari dzayo pamwe nemichina zvinoshandiswa mukutakura pamwe nekuraswa kwemarara muguta iri. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya veguta reHarare, VaStewart Mutizwa, vanoti kanzuru yavo yakatora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti yoga haingakwanise kubvisa marara munzvimbo dzose dziri kuunganidzwa marara mukati meguta pamwe nemumisha inogara vanhu nechikonzero chekuti motokari dazvo zhinji dzakafa. Vanoti vari kukumbira kuti vabatsirwe nechero chinokwanisa kuita kutimarara atakurwe uyewo kuti motokari dzavo nemichina zvigadzirwe zvakare. VaMutizwa vanoti yavo kanzuru ine mari inodarika mabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora emunyika iri muvanhu, makambani pamwe nehurumende, iyo vanoti dai vakwanisa kuiwana yairerutsa ndima mukumutsiridza motokari dzekanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mutewedzeri weMutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, Vanobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vabhadhariswa zviuru gumi zvemadhora emuZimbabwe semari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekurova mumwe mudzimai. VaBiti vari kupomerwa mhosva yekurova Amai Tatiana Aleshina vekuRussia muHarare svondo rapfuura. Mutongi wedare Amai Vongai Muchuchuti vati VaBiti vagare pakero yavakapa kudare uye havafaniri kupindira pakuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi. Vachuchisi panyaya iyi havana kupikisa kuti VaBiti vabhadhare mari yechibatiso uye vanzi vadzoke kudare musi wa18 Ndira gore rinouya apo pachatanga kunzikwa nyaya yavo. Gweta raVaBiti, VaAlec Muchadehama, vaudza dare kuti VaBiti havana mufaro nemasungirwo avakaitwa uyewo vaigona kubatwa neCovid- 19 nekuti pavakasungirwa paHarare Central Police Station hapana kana maSanitiser, ma mask nezvimwe zvinodzivirira denda reCovid 19. Pazvichemo zvavo, VaBiti vanotiwo vakanyimwa chikafu uye segweta, nhengo yeparamende nemhunhu ane mukurumbira, hazvaikodzera kuti vadzikisirwe pasi nemabatirwo avakaitwa nemapurisa. Dare rati nyaya yaVaBiti inofanira kuongororwa uye zvinenge zvabuda muongororo iyi zvounzwa kudare musi wa18 Ndira gore rinouya. Zvichakadai, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vati kunyange hazvo VaBiti vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso, havasi kufara nemabatirwo avakaitwa nemapurisa. Mune imwewo nyaya, mumwe mushandi mukuru wekanzuru yeHarare, VaKainos Chingombe, avo vakasungwa nezuro vachipomerwa mhosva yekusashandisa mahofisi avo zvakanaka apo vakatenga motokari yaidhura zvakanyanya, vanzi nedare vadzoke nemuvhuro. Gweta ravo, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati VaChingombe vanoramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Mune imwezve nyaya, mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, varangarira Amai vavo, avo vakashaya nguva pfupi yapfuura. Nyaradzo iyi yaitirwa kumusha kwavo kuGutu South mudunhu reMasvingo. No media source currently available

headline: VaChari Vanoti Vatumira Vana Chiremba Kunobatsira Vakakuvadzwa neCyclone Idai
