text: Mumwe wevanhu vakatanga hurongwa hwekutsvaga mari yekubatsira mudambudziko reCyclone Idai, VaFreeman Chari, vanoti mari yavakwanisa kuunganidza pari zvino yave kudarika zviuru makumi masere nezvina zvemadhora. VaChari vanoti vakatanga hurongwa hwe GoFundMe vaine chinangwa chekuunganidza zviuru zana zvemadhora. VaChari, avo vanogara muAmerica, vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano akazvimirira, pamwe nevanhu vemumatunhu akatarisana nedutumupengo iri. VaChari vanotiwo pane vana chiremba makumi maviri vaendeswa kumatunhu aya kuitira kuti vanobatsira vanhu vanoda rubatsiro zvichitevera kukuvara kwavakaita mutsaona yemvuramupengo. "Tiri kushanda nevanhu vari mumatunhu akabatwa nedambudziko iri. Chishuwo chedu ndechekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi pasina zvekumbomirira kuwana mvumo kumamwe mahofisi. Pari zvino tinofara nevatiri kushanda navo nekuti zvese zvatiri kuita zviri kuitwa pajekerere," VaChari vaudza Studio7. VaChari vanoti rutsigiro rwavari kuwana kubva kunezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri pasi rose rwunodadisa nekuti dambudziko iri neremunhu wese. Vanoti vakatanga chirongwa ichi mazuva apfuura uye vanoshuwira kuti vanhu varambe vachibatsira nepavanokwanisa sezvo dambudziko iri richiri rakakomba. VaChari vanoti kune dzimwe dzvimbo rubatsiro harusati rwasvika sezvo kusiri kufambika asi varikushanda nemasangano akawanikwa vachiwunza zvikopokoko munzvimbo iyi kuti vatakurewo chikafu nemishonga zvichieswa kune avo vakatarisana nedambudziko iri. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveHutano Roongorora Vanhu Vakabva Kunyika Dzine Chirwere cheCoronavirus
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe vakabva kunyika dzakabatwa vanhu chirwere che coronavirus vari kumboongororwa munyika kusvika musi wa7 Kukadzi kuti vaonekwe kuti havana kutapurirwa chirwere ichi here. Vanhu ava vakasvika munyika pakati pa25 na28 Ndira, unove mwedzi uno, vachibva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzabatwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi, kusanganisira China, uko kwachakatangira. Chirwere ichi chauraya vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi manomwe kuChina kwakare uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu vabatwa nacho kusvika pari nhasi munyika iyi. Kunze kweChina, chirwere ichi chawanikwawo kunyika dzinosvika gumi nesere dzinosanganisira America, France, Germany, Japan neVietnam. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vanoona zviri zvinhu zvakanaka zvekudzivirira vanhu kuti chirwere ichi chisapararira. Doctor Madzorera vanotiwo vanoona zvakakodzera kuti vanhu vari kutarisiswa ava vange vachimbogara vari kudzimba dzavo vachiongororwa sezvo pasati pave nemunhu abatwa nechirwere. Vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu mune zveupfumi, Zimbabwe haizokwanise kuita sedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzinonzi dzakatovaka zvipatara zvekuchengetera vanhu vari kuongororwa kana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: MDC T Yoronga Kutsvaira paAthlone muHarare neMugovera
text: Bato reMDC T rinoti vechidiki varo mudunhu reHarare vachabata kubatana neMugovera kuti vatsvaire pamwe nekuchenesa nzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeAthlone iri mumusha weGreendale muHarare East, senzira yekuratidza kwavo kuti havana kungomirira kuita zvematongerwo enyika chete. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu vanoti nhengo dzebato ravo dzichaungana na 8 dzemangwanani, voswera vachiita mabasa akasiyanasiyana ekuchenesa nzvimbo, uye vakatozivisa mapurisa nezvechirongwa chavo ichi. “Sezvo uchiziva Jonga kuti hatikumbire mvumo kumapurisa, tinongovazivisa chete. Saka nekuvaremekedza uye kuremekedza mutemo, takazivisa mapurisa emumusha uyu, saka vakatipa mvumo,” VaGutu vanodaro. Vanoti mapurisa akavabvumidza kuungana kubva na 8 dzemangwanani idzodzo kusvika na 3 masikati. Vanotiwo izvi zvichapa mukana kunhengo dzavo wekuti dzisangane nevagari vemumusha weHarare East panguva yavanenge vachiita basa ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vochema Zvichitevera Kuputsirwa paVanotengesera
text: Sangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, (VISET) rinoti riri kushoropodza zvikuru danho rekanzuru yeguta reHarare rekuparadza kwayakaita misika yevanhu pamwe nekuparadza zvinhu zvavo panzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeBudiriro 5 svondo rino. Mugwaro raraburitsa, sangano iri rinoti rakawana humbowo hwekuti kuparadzwa kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera uku kwakapiwa mvumo nekanzuru pamwe neboka reEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, uye VISET inotiwo ine humbowo hwekuti zvakaitwa izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reEMA panyaya iyi. Izvi zvinoitika mushure mekunge kanzuru yatora danho rimwechetero svondo rapera payakaputsa zvivakwa zvevanhu vaitengesera paKamunhu Business Centre kuTafara/Mabvuku, uye kuedzawo kuputsa nzvimbo inoitirwa mitambo yeMoto Republik iri mukati meHarare. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru VaMichael Chideme vanoramba mashoko ekuti kanzuru yavo iri kuputsa zvinhu zvavanhu, vachiti chiri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuchenesa guta. VaChideme vanotiwo kanzuru yavo ine hurongwa hwekusangana nevaridzi veMoto Republik kuti vaone kuti vangaenda mberi sei. Izvi zvinotevera kupera kwemazuva manomwe akanga apiwa nekanzuru ekuti varidzi veMoto Republik vaparadze voga zvivakwa zvavo. VaChideme vanoti kambani iyi yakanga yaisa zvivakwa zvayo zvema container izvo zvisingabvumidzwi nemutemo wekanzuru yavo. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Zimbabwe Ngaibhadhare Misaririrwa yeZvikwereti Zvose Kuti Inzwirwe Tsitsi neIMF
text: Mumiriri we International Monetary Fund, IMF, muZimbabwe, VaChristian Beddes, vanoti bhodhi rebhanga ravo ndiro rine shoko rekupedzisira panyaya yekuti Zimbabwe yopihwa chimwe chikwereti here kana kuti kwete. Mumiriri we International Monetary Fund, IMF, muZimbabwe, VaChristian Beddes, vanoti bhodhi rebhanga ravo ndiro rine shoko rekupedzisira panyaya yekuti Zimbabwe yopihwa chimwe chikwereti here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko agavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, ekuti Zimbabwe iri kutarisira kuwana chimwe chikwereti kubva kuIMF mumwedzi mishoma inotevera mushure mekubhadhara mari yayakabvuma kuti ichabhadhara nguva dzose ichidzosera chikwereti ichi. Mari isati yabhadharwa kusvika pari zvino yasvika pabhiriyoni rimwe nemazana masere ezviuru zvemadhora. Gore rapera Zimbabwe yakaudza musangano wepagore weIMF neWorld Bank kuLima, Peru, kuti yaizobhadhara mari iyi muna Kubvumbi asi ikozvino yave kuti iri kutarisira kubhadhara muna Chikumi. Zimbabwe iri kukwanisa kungobhadhara mari inosvika zana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora pachikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi maviri nemana emadhora kubhanga iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanirawo kuumba hukama neAmerica nekuti ndiyo ine masimba akawanda mubhodhi re IMF neWorld Bank. Mutevedzeri wemukuru weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti Zimbabwe ichakwanisa kuwana mari yekubhadhara zvikwereti izvi kuitira kuti ichitanga kukwereteswa patsva. No media source currently available

headline: Vatungamiri muZimbabwe neAfrica Voyambirwa Kuti Vatonge Zvakanaka Kuti Mauto Asarambe Achipidigure Hurumende
text: Nemusi weSvondo mauto emuGuinea achitungamirwa naColonel Mamady Doumbouya akapidigura hurumende yaVaAlpha Conde. VaConde avo vakavandudza bumbiro remutemo kuti varambe vachitungamira nyika iyi vakasarudzwa gore rapera musarudzo dzainge dziine mutauro wakanyanya. Izvi zvave kureva kuti muAfrica mauto apindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica achiyedza kana kutopidigura hurumende kanodarika mazana maviri. Burkina Faso ndiyo ine mauto akapindira zvakanyanya kanosvika gumi ichiteverwa neNigeria kasere. Mauto akapidigurawo hurumende muZimbabwe muna 2017 kanova kekutanga zvichiitika munyika. Panyika dzemuAfrica makumi mashanu nenhatu, nyika makumi mana dzine mauto akapindira mukupidigura hurumende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri kuitika izvi zviri kudzosera Africa kumashure munyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere kunyangwe yange yambopemberera zvakaitika kuZambia uko kwakatambidzanwa masimba murunyararo. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe neAfrica vanofanira kukoshesa zvido zvevanhu kuti mauto asapindire munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF uye vaimbotungamira bato rinopikisa reDare vaGilbert Dzikiti vanoti chakakonzera kupindira kwemauto kuGuinea inyaya yekupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica kunoita France. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance neMasangano Anorwira Kodzero Voshoropodza Mapurisa neKusasunga veZanu PF Vanonzi Vakakonzera Mhirizhonga kuMasvingo
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC- Alliance pamwe nemamwe masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari kushoropodza mapurisa kuti haana kuita basa rawo nemazvo uye vakatora divi apo vaitarisa vasingasungi vatsigiri veZanu PF vaiita mhirizhonga munzvimbo dzakashanyirwa nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa iri VaNelson Chamisa svondo rino. Motokari dzechikwata chaVaChamisa dzakatemwa nematombo dzikapwanyiwa vamwe vatsigiri vebato ravo vakarohwa zvakaipisisa uye nezuro MDC-Alliance yakapomera vatsigiri veZanu PF kwaGutu mhosva yekuisa muhunhapwa vechidikiri vayo kwemaawa anpfuura mashanu vachivarova. Vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mapurisa anofanira kuita basa rawo asina kwaakarerekera, osunga vanenge vapara mhosva, asi izvi hazvina kuitika pamhirizhonga dzakaitwa kwaCharumbira, kwaChivi, kuChiredzi, Zaka nekwaGutu nezuro. Vechidiki veMDC vanosvika vashanu kusanganisira, kanzura wekuBulawayo, VaAnord Batirayi, pamwe naVaAdmire Mufamba, vakapambwa vakaendeswa mugomo paMpandawana umo vakandorakashwa kwenguva yakareba. VaBatirayi vanoti vakaendeswa kubhesi vakandorohwa zvakaipisisa. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri we MDCA, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vanoti havasi kufara nemapurisa eMasvingo ayo akaratidza kuti akarerekera kumusangano unotonga sezvo vasina kusunga vatsigiri Zanu PF vaiita mhirizhonga. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika reCirisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaEdgar Gweshe, vashoropodza mapurisa vachiti mutemo unofanira kushandiswa pasina kusarudza vanhu munyika. Vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti zvakaitwa muMasvingo zvinoshamisa nekuti dai vairatidzira vachirova vanhu vaiva vemapato anopikisa vaisungwa nechimbi chimbi. Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyati vati vange vakabatikana vari mumusangano wepadandemutande. Tazama kuramba tichivabata asi vange vasingabatiki. Asi mukuru webazi rezvekufambiswa kweMashoko muZanu PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati MDC-Alliance inongochemachema nhema uye iri kutsvaga kusvibisa zita rebato ravo nehurumende apo nhumwa yebazi reUnited Nations yayakosha, Amai Alena Douhan, vari kutarisirwa neMvuhuro unouya kuzoita ongororo yekuti zvirango zviri kukanganisa zvakadii raramo yevanhu munyika. Munyori mubazi revechidiki reMDC-Alliance muMasvingo, VaGilbert Mutubuki, vanoti ivo mhirizhonga yakagara iri muropa reZanu PF kubva kare uye vachadzivirira vakuru vavo kana vachinge vatangwa sezvo mapurisa asingasungi vebato rinotonga. VaMutubuki vanoti vatsigiri vavo vechidiki nevakuru vavo vakarohwa nekutemwa vakakuvara vanopfuura gumi kusanganisira vakapambwa kwaGutu nezuro asi hapana kana munhu mumwe akasungwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaNkosana Moyo Vanoti Huori, Kwete Zvirango, Ndizvo Zvauraya Nyika
text: Mutungamiri webato ronopikisa reAlliance for the People's Agenda kana kuti APA, Doctor Nkosana Moyo, vanoti nyaya yehuori kwete zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika ndiyo yakonzera kuti nyika ipinde mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Doctor Moyo, avo vari kufamba vachisangana nevanhu pakutsvaga rutsigiro vasingaite misangano mukuru, vanoti vari kufara nezvavari kuita uye vanofunga kuti vachakunda musarudzo. VaMoyo vanotiwo havana hurongwa hwekubatana nemamwe mapato sezvo vachiti zviri kuvanhu veZimbabwe kuti vasarudze mutungamiri wavanoda kwete kuti vatungamiri vemapato vapanane zvigaro. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoparura Hurongwa Hwekupa Vana Nhomba yeMhetamakumbo
text: Zvichitevera kutanga kupararira kwechirwere chemhetamakumbo kune dzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, Zimbabwe nhasi yaparura hurongwa hwekupa vana nhomba yePoriyo kana kuti National Polio Vaccination Campaign. Chirongwa ichi chiri kutanga zviri pamutemo mangwana chopera musi wa 30 mwedzi uno. Chinangwa chebazi rezvehutano ndechekupa vana zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 95% pavana mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu nemazana masere kana kuti 2, 556, 800 vari pasi pemakore mashanu. Vachiparura chirongwa ichi muHarare nhasi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vaudza vatori venhau kuti chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa pachiitwa mushandira pamwe nenyika ddzinoti Zambia, Tanzania, Malawi neMozambique. Chirwere cheporiyo chakatobata vana kuMalawi nekuMozambique. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati vane chivimbo chekuti vachapa vana vakwanda nhomba iyi sezvo vari kufamba mudzimba. VaMujiri vanoti vachapa mushonga kunyange kune vana vakambopihwa sezvo dzokororo iine simba. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vanoti nyaya yenhomba yekudzivirira mhetamakumbo inofanirwa kushambadzirwa zvakakwana nyika yose kuti pasawanikwe mwana anotadza kupihwa mushonga. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemumwe chiremba uye vari mumiriri weChinhoyi mudare reparamende Dr Peter Matarutse. Sezvo chirongwa chekudzivirira mhetamakumbo chiri kuitwa munyika dzose dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr George Kambondo vanoti vari kushanda pamwechete nevehutano munyika yeZambia kuti vana vose vanenge vachidarika nepamuganhu wenyika mbiri idzi vadonhedzerwe mushonga. Zviratidzo zvekutimwana abata chirwere ichi zvinosanganisira kupindwa nechando, kuneta, kurutsa, kuoma kana kurwaziwa mutsipa uye kurwadziwa maoko nemakumbo. Nyika yakapedzisira kuita chirwere chemhetamakumbo mugore ra1998 uye ikanzi haina chirwere ichi zvachose mugore ra2005 nebazi guru reWorld Health Organisation. Chirongwa chechipiri chekudzivirira chirwere chemhetamakumbo chichaitwa kubva musiwa 1 kusvika musiwa 4 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga Guru Rinoparura Hurongwa Hutsva hweMari
text: Bank guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe (RBZ), raparura hurongwa hwemari hutsva kwekuti mabhanga munyika atange kutenga mari yekunze izvo rinoti zvichauraya musika mutema. RBZ inoti hurongwa hutswa uhu huchaita kuti mari yekunze iwande munyika, kudzikisa mutengo wemari yekunze, pamwe nekudzikisa mitengo yezvinhu izvo zvange zvave kuvhiringa raramo yevanhu munyika. Vachiparura hurongwa hwawo hweMonetary Policy, gavhuna weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vati kuti izvi zvitange kuitika, mari yese yeReal Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) nemabhondi iri mumabhanga, yave kutorwa semaRTGS dollars uye mari iyi ndiyo ichange yave kuchinjwa nemadhora ekuAmerica kana dzimwe mari dzekunze. Vati mari iyi ndiyo ichange yave kushandiswa kutenga mari yekunze pamusika wemumabhanga kana kuti Inter-Bank Foreign Exchange Market. VaMangudya vati bhanga ravo ratora matanho ekuti mutengo wemari yekunze hausi kuzokwira zvakanyanya uyewo vati vachange vachiongorora kuti mabhanga ari kutenga nekutengesa mari yekunze zviri pamutemo. Vatiwo veruzhinji vachange vave kukwanisa kutengesa mari yavo yekunze mumabhanga. Vatiwo vaya vanotumirwa mari kana kutambira mari kubva kunze kwenyika vacharamba vachipihwa mari dzavo ari madhora ekuAmerica. VaMangudya vati vanoona sekuti matanho avatora achabvisa musika mutema wemari, kudereredza mutengo wemari yekunze, izvo vati zvichaderedza mitengo yezvinhu munyika. Vatiwo izvi ndozvange zviri kudiwa nevemabizimisi. Muzvinabhisimisi, VaOswald Binha, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa naVaMangudya ndizvo chaizvo zvavange vakatarisirira sezvo zvange zviri pachena kuti huremu hwema bond notes hauenderani nehuremu hwemadhora ekuAmerica. Asi vati pachine mamwe matanho anofanira kutorwa nehurumende kuti zvinhu zvinyatsofamba zvakanaka munyaya dzemabhizisimisi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaPersistence Gwanyanywa, vaudza Studio7 kuti danho ratorwa neRBZ rakanaka chose uye zvinogona kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze yakawanda. Asi vati RBZ inofanira kushanda zvakanyanya kudzivirira zvipingaidzo zvinogona kumuka apo matanho aya anotanga kushanda. VaMangudya vati vemakambani vakawanda vange vave kutenga mari yekunze pamukoto kuitira kuti vatenge zvinhu zvinokosha. Pari zvino dhora rimwe rekuAmerica rinokosha mana mana kana kudarika pamukoto. VaMangudya vati matanho avatora achaderedza mutengo uyu zvakanyanya uye kana izvi zvaitika, mitengo yezvinhu ichadzikirira. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemari, uye vaimbove gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zvataurwa nehurumende zvinoratidza kuti dhora remuZimbabwe radzoka pachishandiswa rimwe zita. VaBiti, avo vakayambira nyika kuti hurumende iri kuda kudzosa dhora remunyika nerweseri, vanoti havasi kufara nehurongwa hwagavhuna webhanga guru, sezvo mari dzevanhu dziri mumabhangi dzasiyiwa dzisina kuchengetedzwa nehurongwa hwaturwa nhasi. VaBiti vanotiwo vanhu vanofanirwa kutarisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu uye kushaikwa kwezvinhu zvizhinji munyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMandiwanzira Vobvuma Kuti Potraz Ndiyo Yakatara Mitengo yeDhata
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, vadududza pamashoko avo ekupomera Econet mhosva yekukwidza dhata rembozhanhare vachiti zvakaitwa nekambani iyi zvainge zvatambirwa neboka rePotraz. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko pamitengo yedhata, VaMandiwanzira vati Potraz yakapa makambani aya mvumo yekukwidza mitengo yedhata mushure mekunge makambai aya achema chema kuti ainge ari kurasikirwa nemari yakawanda sezvo vanhu vaive vave kufona mahara pamwe nekushandisa madandemutande akaita seWhatsApp, Twitter, Skype nemamwe. Vati makambani anoti Econet, NetOne neTelecel aitoda kuti hurumende irambidze kushanda kweWhatsAPP, Skype nezvimwe sezvo zvaiatorera mari asi hurumende yakaona kuti izvi hazviite uye ndosaka yakazobvuma kukwidza mitengo yedhata. Vati sezvo vanoshandisa WhatsApp nezvimwe vachishandisa dhata kukwidza mutengo waro kwaizoita kuti makambani aya awanewo mari kubva pakushandiswa kwedhata. Kunyange hazvo veEconet vakaudza komiti iyi svondo rapfuura kuti vainge vaderedza mutengo vega mushure mekunge mamwe makambani atadza kukwidza mutengo, VaMandiwanzira vaudza komiti iyi kuti ndivo vakaderedza mutengo uye vati vePotraz vakuongorora kuti chii chingaitwe kuti makambani aya arambe achishanda zvakanaka. Panyaya yema promotions kana kuderedzwa kwemutengo yedhata zvakanyaya uko kwakamiswa nevePotraz gore rapfuura, VaMandiwanzira vati izvi zvakaitwa nechinangwa chekuona kuti makambani aya ainge ari kurwira vatengi uye zvaikanganisa bhizimisi. Asi nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzati hapana zvakaipa kana veruzhinji vachibatsirikana nemutengo wakaderera. Panyaya yekunetsana kwavo nekambani yeEconet, VaMandiwanzira vati ivo segurukota rehurumende vanoshandira munhu wese uyewo vanotsigira makambani ese kusanganisira Econet vachiti ikambani yemuno inobhadhara mutero pamwe nekupinza basa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda. Vati kunyange hazvo kambani yeEconet yakaburitsa mashoko ekuvatukurira zvichitevera kuderedzwa kemutengo wedhata, ivo vacharamba vachishanda nekambani iyi. Zvichakdai sachigaro wePotraz VaOZias Bvute, vati vapedza kugadzira hwaro hwemaPromotions uye vachange vachigara pasi nemakambani kuti vavatsanangurire nezvehwaro uhwu. VaBvute varambawo mashoko akataurwa nemukuru we|Econet ekuti maPromotions akamiswa mushure mekunge veruzhinji vatanga kushandisa matandemutabde akaita seWhatApp neFacebook panguva yakaparurwa chirongwa che #This Flag naPastor Evan Mawarire gore rapfuura. Komiti yeparamende iyi iri kuita ongororo iyi nechinangwa chekuda kuona kuti ingadzirise sei kuti mutengo wedhata urambe uri pasi kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kushandisa mbozhanhare nemacomputer mumabasa ebudiriro. Komiti iyi yakatotaura neveEconet, Netone pamwe neTelecel uye ichataura navose vanoita zvedhata isati yatura hwaro rayo kuparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veChitungwiza Voenderera Mberi Vachiramwa Mabasa, Asi Kanzuru Ichiti Vari Kushanda
text: Vamwe vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vanosanganisira vanamukoti nevari muboka rezvehutano, vari kuramwa mabasa vachinyunyuta kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro zvinovadzivirira kubva kuCoronavirus, kana kuti ma Personal Protective Equipment, uyewo mari dzekubatsirikana munguva ino yeCOVID-19. Vanamukoti mumakiriniki ekanzuru ose vanonzi vari kungogara zvavo pabasa vasingashande vachizongobatsira chete vanenge vaine pamuviri panoda rubatsiro rwechimbi-chimbi. Vamwe vari kuramwa mabasa vanonzi vashandi vekudivi remvura pamwe nevekudivi rinoona nezvekuraswa kwetsvina. Vachipindura mubvunzo wedu, vakafanobata chigaro chamabharani wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, Doctor Tonderai Kasu, vati mashoko avawana nhasi anoratidza kuti vanamukoti vari pamabasa avo uye vari kushanda semazuva ose. Doctor Kasu vatiwo vari kutowana chikumbiro kubva kuvashandi vari kushanda usiku chekuti vawaniswe chekufambisa. Asi vati mamiriro ezvinhu haasati anyatsogadzikana uye vachiri mushishi kugadzirisa zvichemo zvose zvakasimudzwa navamukoti. Asi sachigaro vesangano rinomirira vashandi reChitungwiza Municipality Workers’ Union, Reverend Ephraim Katsina, vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kukoshesa hutano hwevashandi vayo kuitira kuti ivo vapewo vagari hutano hwakakodzera, zvikuru munguva ino yeCOVID-19. Nekudaro, Reverend Katsina vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kuita musangano wechimbi-chimbi nevamiriri vevashandi kuitira kuti dambudziko iri rigadziriswe vashandi vadzokere mumabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Ine Vakuru Vanozivikanwa neNyaya dzeMhirizhonga?
text: Studio7 neMedia Center dzabatana muchirongwa chaunganidza vatori vrnhau pamwe neveruzhinji vachikurukura mafambiro akaita sarudzo pamwe nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Hurukuro idzi dzaburitsa pachena kuti mhirizhonga icharamba ichiitika musarudzo dzemuZimbabwe nekuti vamwe vari kupinda musarudzo idzi vanhu vanozivikanwa munyaya dzemhirizhonga. Vachitaura pamusangano wekuzeya sarudzo dzichangobva mukuitwa neramangwana reZimbabwe dzaitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti “Which Way Zimbabwe After 2018 Elections, mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Divine Destiny, Bishop Ancelimo Magaya, vati hazvingoni kuti Zimbabwe iite sarudzo dzisina mhirizhonga nekuti vanhu vanoponda vanhu munyika havarangwi uye vanoramba vachiita mabasa avo akaipa. Bishop Magaya vati Zimbabwe ine nhoroondo yemhirizhonga kubva panguva dzeGukurahundi, hondo yeminda, sarudzo dza2008 uye vamwe vaipomerwa mhosva munyaya idzi vakaita semutungamiriri weZanu PF, nemutevedzeri wavo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa naVaConstantino Chiwenga havasati vakumbira ruregerero kana kubvuma mhosva dzavanopomerwa. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo havana kukatyamadzwa nekuurayiwa kwevanhu nevamauto svondo rapfuura. Vati chinodiwa kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena kuti vatungamiriri vanopomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga vabude pachena, votaura chokwadi nekukumbira ruregerero. Asi VaMagaya vati havawoni vakuru vakuru vemuZanu PF vachiita izvi. Asi Bishop Magaya vati sezvo paine gakava pane zvakabuda musarudzo, zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa naVaNelson Chamisa veMDC Alliance, vataurirane kuti munyika muve runyararo. Asi vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu, VaRichard Mahomva, vesangano reLeaders for Africa Network, vati runyararo rwakakosha, asiwo nhaurirano dzinofanira kuitwa vanhu vachiremekedza zvakabuda musarudzo. Mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira pamwe neZimbabwe Council of Churches anoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kushanda naChamisa muhurumende yavo. Asi vamwe vakaita mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti zvehurumende dzemubatanidzwa hazvina zvazvinobatsira uye Zanu PF neMDC dzakatomboshanda pamwe chete muna 2009 kusvika 2013 asi hapana chakabuda. VaMangagwa naVaChamisa vakasiyana nezvikamu zvishomana musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika uye VaChamisa vanoti vachaenda kumatare kunopikisa zvakabuda musarudzo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Votemesa VaMnangagwa Musoro
text: Bepanhau reStandard nemusi weSvondo rakaburitsa mashoko ekuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakaudza vanhu vakauya pamhembererero yebhavhudhe ravo kumba kwavo kuBorrowdale kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vainge vavakumbira kuti vaite navo musangano. VaMugabe vanonziwo vakati mhuri yavo iri kushungurudzwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. Vakatiwo vainge vakatorerwa vashandi nedzimotokari uye mudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe vari kugara vachichema. VaMugabe vanotiwo havana kubva nekuda asi vakashandisirwa mauto. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMugabe VaGeorge Charamba kana mutauriri webato reZanu-PF. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaEarnest Mudzengi vanoti VaMnangagwa havadi kuti VaMugabe vafukure hapwa nekuti zvinozopa kuti hutongi hwavo huiite sehwechiuto. No media source currently available

headline: VaMudede Vanoramba Kudura Makore avo kuKomiti yezveKudzivirirwa kweNyika
text: Mabharani mukuru wenyika, kana kuti Registrar General, VaTobaiwa Mudede nhasi varamba kutaura makore avo ekuberekwa kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika uye vati vanogona basa ravo zvakanyanya zvekuti vakatodomwa kuve sachigaro wemaRegistrar-General ose emuAfrica. VaMudede vazivisisawo kuti munyika mune vanhu vane zvitupa 10.3 million uye vanhu 1.7 million vakafa kubva pakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2013 kusvika pari zvino. VaMudede avo vange vakokwa nekomiti iyi kuzopa humbowo maererano nebasa ravo rekupa vanhu magwaro ekuzvarwa, zvitupa pamwe nezvimwe, vati makore avo haaneyi nebasa ravo. Vati vanogona basa ravo zvakanyanya zvekuti sangano reAfrican Union pamwe neUnited Nations akatotuma nyanzvi dzavo kuti dzizodzidza kubva kubazi ravo. VaMudede vaudza nhengo dzekomiti iyi kuti kana dzichida kunzwa makore avo ekuzvarwa dzinofanira kubvunzawo vamwe vashandi vese vari muhurumende. Vatiwo pane vechidiki vakawanda muhurumende vari kutadza kuita basa ravo uye makore haaneyi nekugona kunoita munhu basa. Nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzange dzichida kuziva kuti sezvo VaMudede vakura havasi kuremerwa nebasa here. Zvichakadai VaMudede vaudza komiti iyi kuti munyika mune vanhu 10.4 million vanokodzera kuvhota uye 5.4 million vanhukadzi. Vatiwo pane vamwe vanhu vakawanda vasina zvitupa. Vatiwo pane vanhu 1.7 million vakashaya kubva pakaitwa sarudzo dza2013 kusvika pari zvino. Nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzaudza VaMudede kuti hadzisi kufara nemashandiro anoita mahofisi avo vachiti vanhu munyika yese vano netseka kutora magwaro ekuzvarwa, zvitupa nemapasipoti. Mumiriri weMusikavanhu muNational Assembly, VaProper Mutseyami vanogarotaura zvedambudziko iri asi hapana chiri kuitwa naVaMudede. Asi VaMudede vati vanoziva matambudziko anosangano nevanhu zvikuru sei kunzvimbo dziri kumiganhu nedzimwe nyika uye vari kuita zvese zvavanogona kuti vaagadzirise. Panyaya yekuti pane vanhu vakawanda vakabatwa-batwa paGukurahundi vari kunetseka kutora magwaro, VaMudede vati vanonyoresa vanhu munzvimbo idzi uye havana kuona vanhu vane dambudziko iri. Vati bazi ravo rine mahofisi munzvimbo dzese idzi uye vanhu vakasununguka kunonyoresa kuti vapihwe magwaro avanoda. Vatiwo vanhu vanofanirawo kuziva kuti vanotevedza mutemo kana vachipa vanhu magwaro uye dzimwe nguva vanhu vanotobvunzurudzwa vasati vapihwa magwaro aya. Vatiwo pane vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika vanoda kuwana magwaro emuno zviri kunze kwemutemo, uye bazi ravo rinoita basa nehungwaru kudzivirira izvi. VaMudede vatiwo nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakasununguka kuzowona michina yavanoshandisa pakupa vanhu magwaro. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaTshinga Dube, vaudza VaMudede kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kunetseka kuwana magwaro uye vanofanira kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweMadzimai Akazvitakura Ari Kuonekwa neNyanzvi Hwokwira
text: Madzimai akazvitakura muZimbabwe anonzi ave kukoshesa kuenda kune vezveutano kunoongororwa nhumbu dzavo inonzi pachirungu Antenatal Care visits zvichienzaniswa nemakore akare. Mumwe chiremba, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti madzimai akazvitakura vave vachinoonekwa nguva nenguva kuitira kuti kana pane zvinonetsa zvigadziriswe. VaNyamande vatiwo madzimai akazvitakura ari kunoongororwa sezvinotarisirwa asiwo vakati pachine mamwe madzimai anononoka kunyoresa pamuviri kana vasinganoongororwi. Izvi zvatsigirwa naDr Nicholas Wazadza avo vatiwo zvakakosha kuti madzimai akazvitakura apote achinoongororwa vachiti izvi zvinodzikisa hupenyu hwemadzidzimai nevana hunorasika. Mumwe mukuru musangano rinoshanda nemadzimai munyaya dzehutano oasi rose, reUnited Nations Population Fund, Amai Abigail Musemberi, vati madzimai mazhinji ava kukwanisa kunoonekwa kana vabata pamuviri. Amai Musemburi vati zvimwe zvezvipingaidzo zviri kutadzisa kuenda kwemadzimai akazvitakura kunoongororwa inyaya yemufambo unenge uripo. Madzimai aitarisirwa kunovhenekwa pamuviri kana kusvika vabatsirwa asi sangano reWorld Health Organisation rakakwidza kuti madzimai achive achishanyira zvipatara kasere pavanenge vakazvitakura. Amai Musemburi vanoti vachiri kuongorora kuti madzimai ari kuzvigona here ikana kuti kwete zvekuonekwa kasere apo anenge aine pamuviri. No media source currently available

headline: Britain Yorambidza Ndege Dzinobva kuZimbabwe Kuti Dzimhare Munyika Iyi
text: Hurumende yeBritain yazivisa kuti yambomisa kuti ndege dzinobva muZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika shanu dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica kuti dzimhare munyika iyi kusvika nemusi weSvondo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kweimwe mhando yehutachiwana hweCovid 19 kuSouth Africa nekuBotswana. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muBritain, VaSajid Javid, vati hurumende yavo yambomisa kumhara kwendege munyika yavo kubva nhasi masikati kusvika nemusi weSvondo dzinenge dzichibva kunyika dzinoti Zimbabwe, Botswana, Lesotho, South Africa, Namibia pamwe neEswathini. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kweimwe mhando yeCovid 19, kana kuti new variant, muSouth Africa pamwe nemuBotswana pakutanga kwesvondo rino iyo iri kudaidzwa kuti B.1.1.529. VaJavid vati hurumende yavo yatora danho iri uku ichinyatsoongorora kuti mamwe matanho aingatore ndeapi kuti new variant iyi isapinde munyika. Israel inotiwo icharambidza zvizvarwa zvayo kushanyira nyika nhanhatu idzi kusanganisirawo Mozambique nekuda kwechikonzero chimwechetecho ichiti zvakare icharambidzawo vanhu vari kubva kunyika idzi kuti vapinde muIsrael. Mumwe mukuru muEupean Union Commission, VaUrsulavon der Leyen, vabuditsawo mashoko padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti European Union ichatorawo matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwe new variant iyi munyika dziri mugungano reEU. Vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvehutano muSouth Africa vanoti new variant yeB.1.1.529 iyi ine hukasha hwakanyanya uye hurumende yeBotswana yaburitsawo mashoko kuvatori venhau ichiti vanhu vana vose vakawanikwa vaine new variant iyi muBotswana, vakanga vakabaiwa nhomba dze Covid 19 kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vanga vachitaura pavavhura zviri pamutemo kongiresi yavari munezvehutano ye Health Profesions Authority, vatiwo hurumende yakavhura ziso rayo kuti new variant iyi isapindewo munyika. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kugara yakagadzirira zvakakwana nekuti ma variant aya acharamba achingouya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kutyira kuti chirwere cheCovid 19 chinogona kupararira zvakanyanya pachange pachifamba vanhu vakawanda munguva yezororo reKisimusi pamwe negoredzva. Doctor Madzorera vakurudzirawo kuti miganhu yenyika ivharwe sezviri kuitwa nedzimwe nyika ukuwo vanhu vachiongororwa zvakasimba. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vakurudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBotswana kuti zviregedze kuuya kuzororo reKisimusi negoredzva zvisina kubaiwa nhomba senzira yekuderedza mukana wekupararira chirwere cheCovid 19. VaRusike vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji havachatevedzera nzira dzakatarwa dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Asi VaChiwenga vati hurumende iri kuita zvese zvainogona kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira uye vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasamire kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid nezuro zvabva zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nevana (4704) kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi. Bazi iri rinotiwo vanhu vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro vakasvika zviuru gumi nezvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevanomwe (18687) izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yose pamamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nezvinomwe nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu (3 737 463). Vanhu vakabaiwa nhomba yechipiri nezuro sezvinokurudzirwa vakasvika zviuru zvinomwe nemazana nana nemakumi masere nevatanhatu (7486) izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiri munyika yose pamamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvna zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe (2 774 929). Huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira pachaziviswa zvabuda muongororo dzaitwa nebazi iri muzuva ranhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid 19. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanenge Vakundwa Ngavabvume Kukundwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti vanhu vanenge vakundwa musarudzo vanofanirwa kubvuma kukundwa voshanda nekupembera nevanenge vakakunda kuitira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo. Vachitaura nhasi muBanket apo vanga vachitsvaira marara mumusha unogara veruzhinji weKuwadzana, VaMnangagwa vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuwirirana munyika, uye kuti kana munhu akundwa musarudzo, haafanirwe kuita zvemhirizhonga asi kuti anofanirwa kupembera nevakakunda kuti munyika muve nerunyararo. VaMnangagwa vati kana munhu akundwa anofanirwa kusiya zvinenge zvamukundisa zvemhirizhonga, uyo anenge akunda sezvavakaita, oramba achiita zvinoita kuti arambe achikunda. VaMnangagwa vati bato ravo reZanu PF rinokunda nokudaro richaramba richiita zvinokundisa zvekuenda kunonzwa zvichemo zvevanhu nekuzvigadzirisa sezvavakaita zvekuunza mabhazi anobhadharwa mari shoma yekufambisa. Kunyange VaMnangagwa vasina kudoma bato nezita, vazhinji vanoti ibato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ranga richitaurwa. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati bato ravo harisi kuzobva pachokwadi chekuti VaMnangagwa vakabirira sarudzo izvo vanoti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yakabvuma nekuchinja zvakabuda musarudzo katatu. Panyaya yehutsanana VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichaisa mutemo wekuti motokari dzose dzinotakura veruzhinji zvikuru mabhazi dzive nemabhini ekurasira marara sezvo zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanenge vari mudzimotokari vanorasa marara nepamahwindo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuBanket asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti kuchenesa nzvimbo hakufanirwe kumirira zuva rinotsvaira mutungamiri wenyika sezviri kuitika muBanket umo makatsvairwa nezuro nekuti VaMnangagwa vari kuuya. VaMnangangwa, avo vasvika muBanket nguva dza 8 manganani dzavanga vachitarisirwa, vaudza vanhu kuti vakurumidza nekuti vari kuenda kuAdis Ababa, KuEthiopia nhasi kumusangano weAfrican Union. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoramba Kuti Pane Vanhu Vari Kupambwa Kana Kushungurudzwa Munyika
text: Hurumende inoti munyika hamuna dambudziko rekutyorwa kwedzokero dzevanhu ichi vanoti pane dambudziko iri ndevaya vasingazive zviri kuitika munyika pamwe nevanopikisa hurumende neshamwari dzavo dziri kunze kwenyika. Asi mapato anopikisa nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti pane humbowo hwakawandisa hunoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati manyepo kuti munyika mune dambudziko rekutyorwa kwekodzeo dzevanhu vachiti mashoko aya ari kubva kuvavengi veZimbabwe vanozivikanwa mukati nekunze kwenyika. Vati hurumende iri kuchengetedza runyararo munyika nekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. VaMangwana vati hurumende haisi kuzorega vanhu vachiratidzira panguva ino yeCovid-19 kuti vaparadzire chirwere sezvainge zvarongwa svondo rapfuura. Vati vanhu vari kutaurisa pamusoro peZimbabwe ngavanyarare vachiti kunyika dzakaita seIndia neSouth Africa kwakatofa vanhu vakawanda hurumende dzeko dzichiedza kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid. VaMangwana vati dzimwe nyika dzepasi rese dzapindira kutaura zvisina maturo pamusoro peZimbabwe nekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe ndizvo zvakatanga kurova bembera zvichitaura manyepo pamusoro penyika yazvo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vaudza Studio 7 ichokwadi kuti mauto nemapurisa ari kurova, kutora zvinhu zvevanhu pamwe netyora kodzero dzavo achivanda nekuti ari kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vati hapana munhu angataura kuti munyika hamuna mhirizhonga ivo vanhu vari kusungwa, kubhinywa, kurohwa pasina chikonzero zuva zuva.  VaBiti vatiwo veruzhinji vane humbowo hwekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero nehurumende uhwo vari kutora vachishandisa mbozhanhare dzavo mazuva ose. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika, vati mashoko ehurumende ndeekuda kuramba zvinhu zviri kuitika munyika asi vakati hazvishamisa nekuti hurumende yagara isingakoshesi kodzero dzevanhu. Vatiwo kana makomisheni ehurumende anoti Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission neNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission akataura nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti munyika muri kuitika zvinhu zvisina kunaka panyaya yekodzero dzevanhu. VaKika vati vana veZimbabwe vanofanira kuramba vachitaura zvichemo zvavo kudzamara hurumende yatevedza mitemo nezviga zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu zvayakabvuma kutevedza pasi pemasangano eSouthern African Development Community, African Union neUnited Nations. Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti dzimwe nyika nemasangano akasiyana siyana pasi rese vave kutoudza hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti irege kumbunyikidza vanhu. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iro riri kumirira vanhu vakawanda vari kusungwa pamwe nekurowa, rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu vakasungirwa kana kuroverwa nyaya ine chekuita nekuratidzira kwainge kwakarongwa kuitwa musi wa 31 Chikunguru.  Bato riri kutonga kuSouth Africa reAfrican National Congress pamwe nehurumende yenyika iyi, United Nations nevanyarikani pasi rese, vakatotaura kuti zviri kuitika muZimbabwe hazvina kunaka uye vari kuedza kutaura nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa kuti isiyane nezvairi kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Vochemachema Nekushaya kweKutengesera
text: Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kushushikana kwazvo nekushaya kwekutengesera sezov vakawanda vavo vasati vawana kwekutengesera mushure mekubviswa mukati meguta. VaWadzayi vanoti vamwe vavo vakanga vaenda paCobacabana asi zvakazoitika svondo rapera zvekuparadzwa kwemisika yavo zvakasiya nhengo dzavo dzisisina kwekuenda, kunyange hazvo dzakanga dzabviswa mukati meguta dzichinzi dzitengesere munzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru. Vanoti semaziviro avo, Copacabana ndeimwe yenzvimbo dzacho dzakatarwa kunzi dzitengeserwe, asi vakazoshamisika voparadzirwa midziyo. Vanoti kusvika pari nhasi vanhu ivavo havasati vapiwa kumwe kwekuenda, izvo zviri kuita kuti mhuri dzavo dzitambure. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaMichael Chideme kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi as vachitaura pane imwe nyaya ne Studio 7 vanoti vese varikuisa zvivakwa munzvimbo dzisingabvumirwi vari kupedza nguva nekutambisa mari yavo nekuti zvicharamba zvichipunzwa kusanganisira vemisika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Zana neMakumi Mashanu neMumwe (151) Vafa neChirwere cheMalaria Chopararira muNyika
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe pamwe nekurapwa chirwere chemalaria icho chiri kuramba chichiuraya vanhu munyika. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati kusvika parizvino vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe vafa nechirwere cheMalaria gore rino chete. VaMujiri vati ongororo yavo yezvirwere yakaratidza kuti pavhiki ra17 kusvika 23 Gumiguru vanhu churu chimwechete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vazhinji vari vekuMashonaland East kwozotevera Mashonaland Central province. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vana vakafa panguva imwechete iyi nechirwere vaviri vari vemuHarare. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi vatiwo kunyangwe muHarare manga musina dambudziko rechirwere ichi ravemo. Dr Chonzi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaongororwe chirwere ichi vakaita zviratidzo zvekuti vabatwa nacho. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti zvikamu zvinodarika gumi nezviviri kubva muzana zvevari kubatwa nechirwere chemalaria munyika vana vari pasi pemakore mashanu.VaChonzi vati vana ava vanowanzobatwa nemalaria sezvo vachinyanyotambira panze uye vasingagoni kukurumidza kutaura kana vachidzimbikana nemuviri. Dr Chonzi vatiwo kuzvipatara zvekanzuru kuongororwa malaria kunoitwa pachena uyewo mishonga yechirwere ichi inopiwa pachena. Nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vaimbova gurukora rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vati chirwere chemalaria chirwere chinorapika. VaMadzorera vati hurumende inofanirwa kupfapfaidza mishonga munogona kuberekera humhutu kudzivirira ndufu dzechirwere ichi Dr Madzorera vatiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekuzvivhara muviri kana vachinge vari panze husiku uyewo kushandisa zvinodzinga humhutu kana vari mudzimba dzavanorara. VaMujiri vatiwo hurumende yakatotanga chirongwa chekupfapfaidza dzimba kumatunhu makumi maviri nemashanu uye vari kutarisira kubatsira vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 2.8 million. Bazi rezvehutano ririkukurudzira kuti avo vanopihwa mambure ekudzivirira humhutu vanofanirwa kuashandisa sezvinotarisirwa vachiti vamwe vanoguma voshandisa mamwe mabasa vachizviisa panjodzi yekubata malaria. Ko munhu anoziva sei kuti abatwa nechirwere ichi? Nyanzvi dzinoti anotanga kupisa muviri, kurutsa, kutemwa nemusoro, kuneta. Manyoka nekungorwadziwa nemuviri. No media source currently available

headline: ZESN Yotaura Pamusoro peSarudzo Dzaitwa kuGlen View South neMangwe
text: Sangano rinoongorora mafambisirwo anoitwa sarudzo munyika, reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, rinoti ratumira vaongori varo munzvimbo dzanga dzichitirwa sarudzo muGlen View South muHarare, neMangwe kuMasvingo, uye sarudzo dzekutsvaga kanzura weMasvingo Rural District – Ward 1. Sangano iri rinoti ratumira vaongorori makumi maviri nevanomwe kuGlen View South vange vachiona mafambiro ange achiita sarudzo panzvimbo yega yega yange ichivhoterwa, uye zvikwata zviviri zvange zvichifamba zvichiona zviri kuitika munzvimbo dzanga dzichivhoterwa. ZESN inotiwo kuMangwe yatumira vaongorori gumi nevashanu vange vari panzvimbo yange ichivhoterwa, uye chikwata chimwe chete change chichifamba chichipinda munzvimbo dzanga dzichivhoterwa. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muZESN, Amai Ellen Dingani, vanoti vari kufara kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yanga yakaisa panze penzvimbo dzekuvhotera magwaro emazita evanhu vanofanirwa kuvhota. Amai Dingani vanoti izvi zvaita kuti vanhu vakwanise kuziva kuti vanovhotera kupi. Asi Amai Dingani vanoti vashushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vanga vachibatsirwa kuvhota pa St Francis Secondary School kuMangwe nepaGlen View 6 Primary. Amai Dingani vanoti vanhu makumi mana nevaviri vabatsirwa kuvhota kuMangwe, uye vanhu makumi masere nevatatu, vabatsirwawo kuvhota paGlen View 6 Primary School. Amai Dingani vanoti vanozviziva kuti vanhu vane kodzero dzekutsvaga munhu anovabatsira kuvhota kana vasingakwanisi kuvhota vega. Asi vanoti vamirira kunzwa kubva kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission kuti ichapa tsanangudzo yakadii padambudziko rekubatsira vanhu vasingakwanisi kuvhota vega. Sarudzo yemuGlen View South yaitwa zvichitevera kushaya kwemumiriri wenzvimbo iyi muparamende, Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java. MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa iri kumiririrwa naVaVincent Tsvangirai, mwanakomana wamuchakabvu akavamba bato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, ukuwo Zanu PF ichimirirwa naVaOffard Machuwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Voita Ongororo Inobata Kushaikwa kweMari Munyika
text: Apo veruzhinji vari kuramba vachinetseka nekushaya mari mumabhangi rimwe sangano revechidiki muBulawayo ratanga chirongwa chekuita ongororo yematambudziko akasiyana siyana ari kusangana nevanhu nekuda kwekushandiswa kwema bond notes munyika. Vechidki ava vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuzoendesa tsvakurudzo yavo kubhanga guru renyika senzira yekuedza kubatsira kupedza matambudziko aya.\n\nMukuru wesangano reYouth Economic Forum, VaFarikai Masiyamhuru, vanoti sangano ravo raona zvakakodzera kuita tsvagiridzo pamusoro pematambudziko ari kutarisana neveruzhinji kubva mukushaikwa kuri kuitwa mari mumabhangi. VaMasiyamhuru vati vakazivisa Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe nezvechirongwa chavo vachiti zvakakosha kuti vanhu munyika vaise misoro pamwe chete mukuedza kuwana nzira dzekupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. VaMasiyamhuru, avo vanoshandira imwe kambani hombe inogadzira nekutengesa mbatya, vanoti vakatanga sangano reYouth Economic Forum nevamwe vavo gore rakapera nechinangwa chekupa vechidiki mikana yekuti vazeye nezvemagariro evanhu uye nezvehupfumi ukuwo sangano iri richishanda sechipangamazano munyaya idzi. VaChirenje Moyo avo vanove nhengo yesangano reYouth Economic Forum vati senzira yekuita ongororo yavo vanenge vachitaura neveruzhinji vachivabvunza zvavari kusangana nazvo zuva nezuva mukutsvaga mari kumabhangi. VaMoyo vanoti kunze kwekunetseka kuwana mari mumabhanga mamwe matambudziko avatonzwa kubva kuvanhu munguva pfupi yavatanga chirongwa chavo anosanganisira kuti vakuru vakuru vemabhangi akasiyana siyana havautaure nevanhu vachivatsanangurira zvizere pamusoro pedambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Vatiwo vakawanda vari kuchema nerekuti mukutsvaga mari kumabhangi vari kurasikirwa nenguva yakakura pamwe nemari shoma yavanenge vainayo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kana kusangano reBankers Association of Zimbabwe. Nyika yakatanga kushandisa mari yemabond notes muna Mbudzi gore rapera mushure mekunge mukuru weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vachiti iyi yaive nzira yekubatsira kugadzirisa kushomeka kwemari yekunze munyika uye zvaizoitika kwenguva pfupi. VaMangudya vakatiwo ma bond notes akatadza kushanda zvakanaka, vaizosiya basa. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari yekunze mugore ra2009 mushure mekunge mari yemunyika yapera simba rekutenga. VaMasiyamhuru vati maonero avo ndeekuti nyika inofanirwa kuve nemari yayo asi mari iyi inofanirwa kuunzwa kana mamiriro ezvehupfumi agadziriswa uye veruzhinji vachinyatsoziviswa zvizere pamusoro penyaya iyi. VaMasiyamhuru vati vanotarisira kupedza ongororo yavo mukati memasvondo maviri vobva vaendesa zvavanenge vawana kuRBZ. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement, vachitaura semuongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira ega, VaButler Tambo, vanoti vanhu munyika vane tsika yekufira mumbereko semwana asingacheme vachiti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kutaura pachena pamusoro pematambudziko avakatarisana nawo kunyanya panyaya yekushaikwa kwemari munyika. Vanhu munyika pavakabvunzwa kuti vanoda kuti mabond notes ashandiswe here kana kuti kwete, vakawanda vakati kwete asi hurumende yakaenderera mberi nekuunza mari iyi ichiti izvi zvaizobatsira kushaikwa kwemari munyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaDabengwa Voradzikwa kuNtabazinduna neMugovera
text: Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvaungana muWhite City Stadium muBulawayo zvichionekana nemutumbi wegamba renyika, VaDumiso Dabengwa, avo vachavingwa kuNtabazinduma neMugovera. Vanhu vakawanda kubva kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana siyana, kusanganisira mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vaungana muBulawayo vachirangarira mabasa akaitwa naVaDabengwa vachiri vapenyu. Hama neshamwari dzaVaDabengwa, kusanganisirawo vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika kubva kuSouth Africa, vanosanganisira VaJacob Zuma, vataura pagungano iri vachirumbidza mufi serimwe ramagamba makuru akarwira kuti nyika iwane kuzvitonga. Vanhu ava vatsanangura VaDabengwa vemunhu akaramba akazvipira mukurwira muhutongi hwejekerere kusvika mukufa. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havana kuenda kugungano iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, kuti seyi vanga vasipo sezvo vanga vasingabatike parunhare rwavo. Munin’ina waVaDabengwa, VaSijabuliso Dabengwa, vati mukoma wavo aive munhu aisadududza pane zvinhu zvaavnenge azvipira kuita zvisinei nekuti izvi zvaigona kuzomupinza munjodzi. Imwe yeshamwari dzaVaDabengwa, Muzvinafundo Regis Austin vatsinhira zvimwe chetezvo vakatiwo VaDabengwa vaive munhu aisatya kutaura paanenge awona kuti pakanganiswa chero nevakuru vakuru mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vati vanoyeuka kuti VaDabengwa ndiye mumwe wevanhu vekutanga kupokana nedanho rekuda kuunza hutongi hwebato rimwe chete munyika kana kuti one-party state. Mumwe wevaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko pasi pemauto eZipra, VaJeremy Brickhill, vati VaDabengwa vakapira hupenyu hwavo kurwira rusununguko nehutongi hwejekerere vachiri vadiki. Vati mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika pari zvino anoratidza kuti hamusati mave nerusunguko ruzere vakakurudzira vechidiki kuti vatore muenzaniso waVaDabengwa vaenderere mberi nehondo iyi. Vachitaurawo pagungano iri, mumwe murwiri wehondo yerusununguko, VaBaster Magwizi, vati kudomwa kwakaita hurumende VaDabengwa segamba renyika, kungozadzisa chirevo sezvo zviri pachena kune veruzhinji kuti VaDabengwa nderimwe remagamba makuru enyika. VaMagwizi vati VaDabebgwa vanga vari mushishi yekuedza kuti midziyo kusanganisira zvivakwa pamwe nemagwaro enhoroondo yehondo zvebato reZapu zvakatorwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe zvidzorwe kubato iri. Vatiwo VaDabengwa vange vaine shungu yekuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe nemazvo vakati VaDabengwa vangazorora murugare kana hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ikagadzirisa zvose izvi nekukasika. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZapu, VaIsaac Mabuka, vashora zvakaitwa nevamwe vamiriri veparamende vebato reZanu PF vakaramba kupa ruremekedzo kuna VaDabengwa vachiti vakawanda vevavnhu ava vanofanirwa kutenda vanhu vakaita saVaDabengwa nebasa guru ravakaita kurwira rusununguko. Vaimbove nhengo yepolitburo yebato reZanu PF, avo vakadzingwa mubato iri, VaRugare Gumbo, vati nhoroondo yehondo yerusununguko haingave yakakwana kana kusina kutaurwa nebasa guru rakaitwa naVaDabengwa. VaGumbo vati zvinorwadza kuti VaDabengwa vakafira kunze kwenyika nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muzvipatara zvemunyika. VaDabengwa, avo vaizivikanwa nerekuti The Black Russian, vakashaya nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera muNairobi guta guru reKenya vachibva kuIndia uko kwavairapwa. VaDabengwa vari kuvigwa neMugovera kumusha kwavo kuNtabazinduna kunze kweBulawayo muri mudunhu reMatabeleland North. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reZPP Roshushikana neChirongwa Chiri Kunyoresa Vanhu
text: No media source currently available Sangano re Zimbabwe Peace Project, ZPP, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nehurongwa hwe Biometric Voter Registration, BVR, uhwo rinoti hauna kudzidziswa zvakakwana vanhu vanofanirwa kunyoresa. Sangano iri rinoti rafamba munzvimbo dzakawanda rikaona zviri kuitika muchirongwa ichi. Ratiwo vanhu vari kunetsekana kuwana magwaro ekunyoresa ma affidavit, zvikuru kumaruwa akaita se Mutoko, Chipinge, neChimanimani uko rinoti vanhu vari kuratidza kusaziva zvavanofanirwa kuuya nazvo kuti vanyorese kuvhota. ZPP inotiwo sangano re Zimbabwe Electoral Commssion rinofanirwa kusimudzira dzidziso yevanhu, uye kujekesa mari inofanirwa kubhadharwa nevanhu kana vachida kusainirwa magwaro avo nemadzishe, kanawo vamwe vakuru mumatunhu avanogara. Mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vanoti kunyange havo vachigutsikana nezvavaona muzuva rekutanga iri, pane zvavanoda kuti zvigadziriswe nekukurumidza zvinosanganisira kuti vanhu vasanzi vabvise mari kuti vaitirwe chii zvacho chine zvekuita nekunyoresa kuvhota.
